26b7(dkon brtsegs): mches pa dang / ting nge 'denas mchis pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas mam ches pa dang / shes rab ma mchis 'dang / shesas kyi dpar po ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par grol ba'o'o
26b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mchis pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshigades chos kyin ma grang sa 'di sa 'ongs pa'i dus lu brgya man la 'i kri na spyod pa 'gyur cig/ batsham ldan 'das bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub se
27a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sbyin pa stsol bar mi bgyid/ tshul khrims spang bar mi bgyid/ 'dod pa grub par 'i 'byir/ bson 'phrul rtsom par mi bgyid/ bsam gtan rnams sgom par mi 'gyid/ shes rab
27a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod par mi 'arjid/ byang chub don du gnyer bar me babyed/ yang ka' la 'jug par mi bgyid/ byang chubathob par mi babyed/ skyobs rnams tho 'apar mi bgyid/  'jigs pa rnams thob par ma bgyid
27a3(dkon brtsegs): bang po rnams thob par mi bgyid/ sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob par mi bgyid/ chos kyi 'bar lo skor bar mi bgyid/ sems can grol bar mi bgyid/ smra bar mi 'gyid pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig
27a4(dkon brtsegs): des ngos kyi ram grangs 'dil 'ongs pa'i dus su brgya bldan yangs bu'i kring na spyod par gyur cig// de nas de'i 'i stong gsum gyi stong can po'i 'a garten te khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rabatu ga yos par gyur to// 
27a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsom to// bcom ldan 'da' 'jig rten du dgam tshor gsos par gyur pa 'di'i rgyu'i nang la cu 'i rkyen ni gang panas/ dend ces ga
27a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bya chub sems dpa' byams pa' 'di skad ces bka' stsa to// byams pa dman pas mos pa'i sems can 'di dag 'dzin par mi 'gyur nam legs kyis thong zhig/ de skad ce
27a7(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la 'de' dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don gyi slad dul
27a8(dkon brtsegs): du 'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis pag 'phrul pa/ bya pa kyis pa 'don sa khyo pa da nyid dus gyim byab pa/ ben 'dum phrag lan cu ba'is brgyad te/ mamapa cad du yang 'a sa
27b1(dkon brtsegs): ko/ su ga ba dang / lha'i batho mo pa gnas kyi thub po// byams pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang mdapa gnon du gyur pa dang / ka'i barmo nas kyi cho kyi rnam thangs dathon napa'i bye
27b2(dkon brtsegs): ka/ bcom ldan 'das nyes bka' stsal pa/ byams pa rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis bskal pa grangs sad pa phrag 'jam 'das pan de bzhin gshegs padun nas ma tog mngon par 'phags pa seng ge'i rtsas kyi
27b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi nas grangs 'di' shad pa na sems can kang+gA klung gi kyis snyed dag blan med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de'i
27b4(dkon brtsegs): dar byed kyis ni bying mi ldog pa'i bzod pa mang gro// de nyis byung snyed kyis na chos rnams pa chos kyi mig dul me cing dri ma dang bral la rnam par dran no// com ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dgas
27b5(dkon brtsegs): da dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur kur pa dang / lhab su blo gros ral gnas dang /  Ar 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / gnas brtan 'od
27b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri ra bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ma mngon par bstod de// / 'phags 'dagan mchog brtsegs pa chen po 'chos kyin
27b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bre kra gros rab gnas kyis gus pa zhes bya ba'i'i skyes cacu drug pa rdzogs so// sde chu'i rgyam mtshan gyis lus pa/ @// 'phags pa dkon mchogs
27b8(dkon brtsegs): nam sa kyinam gangs me'i slong bran 'argya ya la sum kun bdun pa snyel gas pa seng gis su / ga sa/ shwe ts+yai/ 5// rgyag na du/  metan pa ba n+dan pas can kuH/ 
28a1(dkon brtsegs): du/ gas pa skye nam//  sa/  tsug masapa 'a ma // de dus shes
28a2(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung 'i des dge slong stong tes bcu lnga bcu dege slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thapas gcig tu banags te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang
28a3(dkon brtsegs): yang thabs gcig sa// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// rgyal ba gang rag mtshungs pa med// rgyal po ma skyes dgra li bu// seng ga zhes ni grags pa zhig/ tshong dpon bu po ny+dza
28a4(dkon brtsegs): du bad bye lhan cig tu// rgyal po'i ba nas de byung nas// rgyam po'i 'byor pa chen po yis// gser las byam pa'i gdugs sogs te// dzags sangs rgyas kyi gan song nas// zhalas la mgo bos phyug 'tshal te// 
28a5(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya ba las gdugs de dag/ tshang bar gruba'i chel phu la// sran kyang byang chub don du zhugs// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyim bu'i men// de dag ma 'jig sa skyes gyur nas// mang shes pal mo sbyar byas te// ngo/ 
28a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'grus ni//  chub sems dpa'i spyod pagag// de ni 'dren pas bdag lagasangs// gang ni yongs sar 'gyur ba gas// gang gis rdzus te skye bar bzus// skye badran pa dang shA rtsa/ 
28a7(dkon brtsegs): chen pos 'angasastan gsol// dedag drug bsam pa shes kyis// sakhyen nas sangs rgyas lung bstan pa// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa shwa san khyod kyis dris paca bstan to// bzod pa yis ni mangs kyi
28a8(dkon brtsegs): / tsang rabar spyad pas la hoste// rkyes kyi sbyin pas bye bad// gshin du dastsapa zhesam gyis nagang gis sa can dasas tsha/  khyed 'arang po can du dang // gse mdo 'dra ba'i lus 'gyur de// 
28b1(dkon brtsegs): tsha mams cad dga' 'grug/ khyed bcan gyis panas snang// byams pas de ba na myed 'arnyang// semam sa can pa byems nyam pas// rgyam bags kyi don 'das kya// 'as / 
28b2(dkon brtsegs): thob pa gyur// gang nas ting badzin bye 'gyur lags// gzang ba'i tshig tugang zhe thar// mubs chen pos yang bstan gsapa// cos pa dod pasagazangs nas la 'thob// sems sgoms pa can ti
28b3(dkon brtsegs): bal ba'i chog rnams yang byan// gzung bar 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur// dran dang ldan par de ltar 'gyur// grub 'di ltar tho'as na// se thos spyod 'gyur ba lags// skyes bdam pa chungs sa 'gyur/ 
28b4(dkon brtsegs): pa' rjen 'ang 'gyur// den lasams pas rlobs can// bas dang bcas pasacho spyod 'byung/ mtshan nyid tu/ sa 'as ma khas/ ga gnyen mnan 'i kun snga na// las gang 'di skyer 'gyur// 'dzin
28b5(dkon brtsegs): mgon gyi mngon snga padu/ bu krub nges pa byang / ga she co gyi sbyin pa la/ gdas yang ba da ni de 'anasu mas 'de rkyen gan dang brang pa pa rgya/ gang shes sos spong mgyur/  des
28b6(dkon brtsegs): yong sa ci 'gyu shes/ kye nas bye na// bgam chis par da sa pa gyur// dadapas me yo sbyong ra gyur// rgyal 'ims gyis ni 'ang yo 'o// stong nyid ni 'anos byas na// ga tu bgan na
28b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// nub ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams// dbyer bas rnams dga'ar gyur// de kAng bdud kyi gis mi thogs// ji lta chos kyis yongs su spong // nasal thol bas nas 'an// brtson 'du
28b8(dkon brtsegs): da dul 'gyur// cizlas de 'den byed pa de// cho gyis song ba gro 'ab chub// das par na'i blas dang // ra ma 'i byung sa pra sa 'byas// bral yol na
29a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gis dgapa// den pa skal pas tshang sa ba'i dbyangs// ngag ba skangasasasu na stan grug da wa rnams// spangs pas sems can dgra ba gyur// de
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung lags// thon dkyang bar dade ltar 'gyur// rnam pa dren 'gang gis / gsog las dmas ni mi byed ku dra/ gcon pa mi byed ce ring 'gyur// me che babazhin kyang 'gyur// mim thun bdag bskums byas sa// 
29a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yog 'khor rnams ni mi phyed 'gyur// don rnams ji ltar 'khru' 'gyur lags// gang gis longs spyod mi nyams 'gyur// gang dang gang du skye ba der// dbang chen grags pa ji ltar 'gyur// chags pa med pas don rnams
29a4(dkon brtsegs): ser sna med pas longs spyod 'phel// gang dang gang du skye ba der// phrag dog med pas dbang cher grag sa// ji ltar lha'i mig 'jor 'gyur// lha yin yang tur 'jog// sems can 'chi po skye 'ad// 'dren pa gang gis 'tshal bar
29a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mar me byin pas min 'thob 'gyur// rol mo'i klu yis napa 'dag/ 'chi po ni shes le gas kyis// de dag de ltar 'grub par 'gyur// 'dren pa kyang chub sems dpa' yi// rag la gang gis phas par 'gyur/ 
29a6(dkon brtsegs): rabs spa na cis 'gyur lags// rnga 'phrul ci yis 'thob par 'gyur// bzhon pa phyir pas rdzu 'phrul 'thog/ dran pa bsgoms pas rjes su dran/ namathar gnyis rab tu spad byas na// bgapa zad par reg par
29a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis zhing ni thun su mchogs/ cis ni dge 'dun phun su mchogs/ gang gis pan su mchog sa 'od 'gyur// gdags phyogs 'dur byung de dag 'asu smon las kyi sred su zhing / bsrubs dge 'dun panasum
29a8(dkon brtsegs): 'ad na den gagags ma sa// phyogs su sus ldangs gyur// tsa rnams thams da rdzun// tshog pa se 'gyul// nga dag rgya zhes/ byang chub sems dpa'adas
29b1(dkon brtsegs): A ba ma //  chu bdon mas cad pa// dman mas bsgru cho/  sa sa yongs kyar// gras se batha'as padang// sems na // 
29b2(dkon brtsegs): ba yis// thub pa chen po khyod 'dra ba'i// skyed pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur// sems can sa sus thams can la/ namanyam pa'i sems nyid bslabs pa dang // mnyam par sems ni bsgoms pas na/ 
29b3(dkon brtsegs): nA kun tu byang chub sems// rmi lam na yang sems de de// 'dor mi 'gyur nam nya ye// smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis gyur// grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am// 
29b4(dkon brtsegs): du gnas pa'i yul rnams sa// byang chub la ni yang dag 'jun// des na sems 'do mi 'gyur ro// gang dang gang byeb yang // ji ltar b+ha la mni cer 'gyur shing // d+had kyi mthul pa 'phags pa dang // bdud rnams
29b5(dkon brtsegs): gas 'gyur// di ni nang po ga // skrag 'i dzi/ na // na ga du rgyal nga// de ni mas sani che rba he// tu tshul la gas pa dang // 'dun rnams kyi
29b6(dkon brtsegs): /  ba sems dpa'i spyod pad// 'dog rten mnan gyim mngonas ma du// nga bstan pa 'di sas la// mau na pa ni dga' pa gyur// ye thos yas / 'di da kyin chog / 
29b7(dkon brtsegs): napa bstan pa 'di la ni// bdag cag rjes su bslab par gyi// de nas sangs rgyas 'dzum mdzad de// stong gsum po yang g.yos gyur nas/ 
29b8(dkon brtsegs): chen lung ba gan gsol zhes zhus// de ma dgu bzhul pa dang // mkham pa la sangs rgyas kyis// 'di na ces ni 'gara' stsas te// dang gi phyir ni 'dum yang dag// ma 'amang las 'dir nyin cig/ sangs
30a1(dkon brtsegs): ba ba rgyad cu dang // gzhan yang / theg phrag bcug/ byang chum don du 'dus nas ne// me'i 'dren pa rnams la mchod// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ 
30a2(dkon brtsegs): / ma 'i kyis gnasapa/ ma so la na ma pa la phru gyu / dag pa// rnam pa ldan pa
30a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa rnams su 'gyur// 'di dpag med kyi bkod pa ltar// de dag gi yang de 'dra 'gyur// byams pa nas ni bzud nas su// bskal pa sam
30a4(dkon brtsegs): ban// de seb rgyas kun du// gan sangs rgyas phrad pa kya// 'di dag kyang rgya thong ba yi// rang ni gang sus thos pa rnam sa// de da ga thams cad 'a / tenA // sanam khyen kyang rag mtshungs med
30a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// ga she/ lung bstan 'di bas nas// mos pa skyed par byed yi// 'dzi/  rten gsum po 'dedagan// de dang mtshungs pa'i sa ma nams med// gang gis banal 'bya/ stod du// 
30a6(dkon brtsegs): de rnams thams cad du// rin chen rnams kyis bkang byas nas// byang chub phyir 'dir byin papas// gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di// bos nas byang chub phyir 'dug na// sngar smos pa yi bsod
30a7(dkon brtsegs): // grangs dang char yang mi bod do// chos 'di ba shad pa'i chen ni// 'jig rten mgon po'i margya yis ni// g+ha rnams me tog char pa 'bebs// stong gsum po yang g.yos par gyur// se
30a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa lnga phob nas// nyin bdun par du mchod byas nas// bstan pal ni rab tu byung // de dag kun gyis ting 'dzin 'thob// zad mi shes pa'i gzungs
30b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnabs ma don byed de// 'angs rgyas chos la 'dzud par byed// chos kyi nas grangs 'dibastan pa nasams can kya 'a phrag brgyad cu byang chub mchog la zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis den
30b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsas nas/ seng ge grogs dang bcas pa dang / lha dang me dang lham yin dang / dri bar las pa'i 'jig rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bskyod do// // 'phags pa
30b3(dkon brtsegs): kon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs leru stong phrag brgya pa las seng ges zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa bdun pardzogs so// !d+ya kar gyi mkhan po dAn shI la dang / rba ni bar ma dang
30b4(dkon brtsegs): 'u mer gyi lo d+ha ba 'an de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag
30b5(dkon brtsegs): cad sa kyis kyigapa tshul ma pa da na pa dam ya so// / 
30b6(dkon brtsegs): dum thA ha kyo d+hal klog kya tA nod ti ba d+has drwa bar po rgya pa ba ta rnam pa ldan spaH/ 'di gad du/ 'phags pa langs rgyas thams cad kyi gas min pa'as la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
30b7(dkon brtsegs): dmapa pa zhus pa'i le'u zhes bye ba rdeg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod
30b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dkapar ban/ slob pa dang mi slob pa med ge slong brgyad stong na do slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpapa chen po khri drug stong sas
31a1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag dang thabs gcig tu 'khrugs te/ des nas bcom ldan 'das phye ba red kyi dus kyi tshe dang du yang dag 'dog las bshings nas ring po malon par 'khor 'a
31a2(dkon brtsegs): phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas cas ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ tho ma dab/ yang du na pa/ tham dge ba/ den pa'ang po// nachog 'bruba'ang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su ngo/ 
31a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// 
31a4(dkon brtsegs): yis dpa' sems dpa' chen mo la shes dam bstan las langs te thagos drag pa gcig tug par nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la bcu ga te/ bcom ldan 'das da/  'dol gas su bal mo sbyar ba btud nas
31a5(dkon brtsegs): ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
31a6(dkon brtsegs): dga'ar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig tu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
31a7(dkon brtsegs): ka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod ci dang ca 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal 'ad
31b1(dkon brtsegs): bcos ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa ye shes dam pas 'des ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs la
31b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa zhes bkyen thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa lags/ de skad ces
31b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dmapa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang rol yin pa drang
31b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo bang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams kyi skye bo lal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
31b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi shes pa rjes su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 'das pa dang / mabyon padang / da lta dbyung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i cho
31b6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la ma khas pa yongs su dri par sems pa ni rigs kyi bu yang khyod legs so// rig
31b7(dkon brtsegs): bude'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zung shig dang / ngas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thab pa la mkhas pa spyod la bshad par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sem
31b8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gseral te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan 'dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang
32a1(dkon brtsegs): nungs pa 'durgya' sems dpa' chen po 'bral pa las pa ni rang khas gcig tsam yang sems can thams cad la skyed par byed de/ daci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyis 'dil kyang / 
32a2(dkon brtsegs): bdapa sems pa cher po 'as la lams eg shi du pa lag tsug pa yang na pa mas ca khyon pa da nga ldan pa
32a3(dkon brtsegs): na 'a byed pa she pade yang sems ca thams dkyis sangs rgyas kyisas yongs sa ngogs pa byu yongs su pa pa'i bye// rgyun nyis gyis na sems can thams cid pa yongasas
32a4(dkon brtsegs): byed // N+DI ga zhen/ khams padum khyen 'ad kyi semasadang / stongs su 'grolal ma ma pa nyid rjes te/ bad rgya tshu sem pa dpa' sems pas chen po ma
32a5(dkon brtsegs): sa chub sem ma khyer la den kyi she rgya ngon pa sa rgyas sa me sa skye cing / rjesas
32a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems ca thams cad pa yongs su bskon btang ste yongs su bsngo ba yang byed do// de thams cad lakhyen pa nyid du 'ongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sbyin pa
32a7(dkon brtsegs): d+ha/ sbyin nas na pa nal mi na da byed/  ba sem
32a8(dkon brtsegs): 'i'atsal la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi rugagan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thab sal mkhas pa ni phyags bcu gan me nyod go zhing ljon pa dang / bras kyi zhing ljon pa dang/ 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): tog dang / me tog phreng dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag ker ma byas shing yongs su ma bzung ba gang je snyed pa de dag thams cad 'asam pas yongs su bzung zhing yongs su bsdus nas sangs rgyas
32b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'grul bar byed ci dges de yangasaris can thams cad la gtong bar byed de/ yongs su btang nas kyang thams cad mkhyedan pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed do//  gas bcud gan po rtog
32b3(dkon brtsegs): zhe sngon pa dang / spos kyi shing ljon pa dang / me tog dang / me tog phreng dang / sbas dang / phye ma dang / byug pa bdag gi dang bcas shing yongs su bzung ba dang / nus pa gang ji med pa de dag thams ca
32b4(dkon brtsegs): ta'apa'i dang de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sangs rnal thams cad la 'bul bar byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bdag dang / sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen
32b5(dkon brtsegs): dayongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar byed do// de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang
32b6(dkon brtsegs): dam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dpag tu med pazang par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas la yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
32b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgan sems can sdug bsngal kyi tshor ba myong bar gyur pa gang ji snyed pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' thal
32b8(dkon brtsegs): khams pa sems can de dgagesug pa lnga gyi tshor ba de da ga thams cad baphrul te 'chags par byed cing / 'di ste sems can de dag gsug pardzi rtse ra rab shing dag yin pa de thams cad 'dag gis
33a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'aba' par 'gyur 'i sems can de dag bdebar gyur cig ces go mgyon par yang byed do// phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dgan sems can bdeba'i tshor ba
33a2(dkon brtsegs): 'a byung ba gang dag pan 'di dag la kyang chub sems dpa' thal la ya mos pas de dag yang dag pangs sus te rjerdzas su yi sa byed cing / rjems pa rang nas kyang thams cad ma khyen pa nyid la dmas
33a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar byed do// 
33a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad rnams 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' se
33a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod pabyas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de
33a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba dang / tshul khrims gcig pa dang / ting nge 'dren gcig pa dang / shes rab gcig pa dang / rnam par grol la gas
33a7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig pa dang / ye shes gcig pa dang / rig pa gcig pa yin no zhes so sor rtog par byed do nades demar po sor btags nas 'di ltar shes par byed de/ 
33a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa gcig sa phyag byas/ bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'ams cad la phyag byas pa dang / bkur sti byas
33b1(dkon brtsegs): bachod ga sung ra 'gyur ba gang dag yon pa de dag paras cad bsam pas yongs su bzung nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo byed de/ rigs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chenapa
33b2(dkon brtsegs): //  banananas byang chub sadapa' sems dpa pa'i mas la di ga gis N+DI 'a gyu nal sa sa kyi khyong gsod pa 'i cing / sum pa
33b3(dkon brtsegs): ba des na tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad la gcig tsam la yang 'jug par byed cing de 'di ltar so sor rtogs par yang byed de/ tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig po 'di'i don gang yin pa den gsung bar tu gtogs
33b4(dkon brtsegs): babams cad byed na yin nonas pa sor rtog par byed do// des de ltar chen poni tshogs sa bcad pa gcig sa ton du 'phralas nas bum pa med pa'i sems kyis snying rje rkyen po skyed de/ rked pa dang / bar ste dang / 
33b5(dkon brtsegs): grags pa 'dod pa med pas grong dang grong khyer dang / grang rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu skyebo mang po la cheg bzhi 'a'i tshigs su bcad pa dem cher ya drag par ston par byed cing 'di ltar rjem
33b6(dkon brtsegs): lam 'debs par yang byed de/ sems can gang su dag gis bdag gi tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
33b7(dkon brtsegs): 'debs par yang byed do// dadage ba'i rtsa ba zhabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa des sems can thams cad kun dga' bo ltar bang du'ib bar 'gyur nang 'angs rgyas gyi sa bum ma nyid bya las sas tu
34a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi 'ad yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i ja'al la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' semam da'a' chen po'i nam/ 
34a2(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa ni gal te brgyal brgyalam na dbul par gyur na yang des zan gzhan gyi las kyang byas te// khabs nal le gang tsam yang blangs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis da ge 'dun nam/ gang rag la 'phrul
34a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bayang byed do// phul nas kyang de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems rgya chen pos byin na sbyin pa yang rgya chen por 'gyur de zhes gsungs pas na 'di ltar bdag gi kyi
34a4(dkon brtsegs): de/ thams pa' byas kyid kyi sems kyis byin pas ga da ya kyang san yong byed do// de sa na nyid kyi semam pa med par gyur ba po la pamanapa
34a5(dkon brtsegs): ma'o de sbyin par byed cing // bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad 'di lta ste dper na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
34a6(dkon brtsegs): shAkya thub pa ji lta ba bzhin du skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro broba'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhing lag na rina'i che grub par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
34a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngos pa des byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyi sbyin nga las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang zil gyis gnon par 'gyur la/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i
34a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ lagan ri po che yang 'grub par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas 'a yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
34b1(dkon brtsegs): bem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni nal te nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par gyur
34b2(dkon brtsegs): dgal dga' bar mi byed cing / gas te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang langs rgyas rnams la bsnyen pakur lhag padag yod la/ bdag la de lta ma yin par mthong na yang de rgyug kyi
34b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' las nges par byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las nges par byung ba ni
34b4(dkon brtsegs): sa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yin no snyam du bdag nyid la rtog par byed cing / de 'di ltar so sor rtog par byed de/ 'di dag la bsnyen bkur ba lhag pa dag yod mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir ni bdag nyid shin du mchog
34b5(dkon brtsegs): shin du gtso ro yin gyi/ 'di dag ni ma yin no// 'di dag ni bdag gi sa'i nor gyi phung ba la yongs su spyod par byed pa ma yin pas bdag gis 'di dag la dga' bar yang me byal/ 'di dag la phrag da kyang mi byan ma
34b6(dkon brtsegs): nga rtog par byed do// des sdug pa'i bsam pas sems bskyed pa des gang gis de bzhin gshegs papa bsnyen par byas kyang 'dres par mi 'gyur la/ bsnyen pa kur ma byas kyang bum par mi 'gyur nang sa
34b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la thugs mnyam pa kun du 'dzin par mdzad pa lta bu'i rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spang rab 'thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkha
34b8(dkon brtsegs): ma do// gas kyi gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa' ma sa dpa' can pa mal la la sa padi sbyid paskyed pas sa tu rkyen bdun pa yoms cad yongs su ngas pa byed do// dzin sa
35a1(dkon brtsegs): skye na/  lta chub semapa da' byem pa da gyu mas pa shA ni mam mang ba de ma myen pa nyid ya ma
35a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub la bgad per byed pa gang yin pa de ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byams pa'i sems dang / par pa'i sems dang / ma'i dres pa'i sems dang / ma bstsags pa'i sems dang / 
35a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / snyoms pa'i sems kyis sbyin pasbyin par byed pa gang yin pa don de'i bzod pa'i 'od tu phyin pa yin no// baba' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btu
35a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bajug pa dang / kyang bdag la mngon par gus pa yang dag par sgrub par byed cing stsol por byed pa dang / lus kyis zhal ta byed pa dang / sems kyis nag byed pa dang / ldang ba dang / 'grob dang / 'ong bar/ 
35a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa gang yin pa de ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// byin pa gang yin pa de la sems rtse gcig pa nyid dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i bsam pa dang / rnam par
35a6(dkon brtsegs): ni yang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// sbyin pa byin nas chos nyid kyi rdzas su yang dag par gsol bar byed de/ lus byid/ yul byin/ ci zhig byin/ 'di'i rna
35b1(dkon brtsegs): ra srin du sus myong bas su namams nyid kyi rjes su yang dag par gnol ba byed cing des de ltar yongs su bcug nas kyang gang gis byin pa dang / gang la byin pa dang / cani da byen pa dang / de'i rnam par rna
35b2(dkon brtsegs): de byed pa gang min pa'i tshon 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa da ni dang shes rab kyi rog tu bye padzin to// dgas de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po babs la mchis
35b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa sbyin pas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol te/ 
35b4(dkon brtsegs): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de//  byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkham pas sbyin pa gang gis sems can rnams kyang 'khor ba las yongs su 'dzin par bgyid la/ sbyin pa de nyid kyi sas
35b5(dkon brtsegs): N+yar N+DI chos thams cad kyang ri ngas su 'dzin par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa de ni ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rin
35b6(dkon brtsegs): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la la thabs pa ni thabs la mkhas pa dang / thabs pa mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas sbyin bcung du yang che
35b7(dkon brtsegs): byedapa/ chen po ni dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyis
35b8(dkon brtsegs): gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgyal brgyal sa na sdig pa'i grogs po'i dab ngangam/ sems yun du rmongs pas nyes pa byung na yang de 'di ltar sa sor tshu
36a1(dkon brtsegs): gal te bdag phung po dang / khams dang / sem ched 'di dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bya nan de ltan 'dag gis yongs su gdung bar bya dgos par 'a
36a2(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag gis 'di ltar go cha bgo bar byaste/ bdag sems can rnams yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir phye ma'i mtha'i bu'i bar du 'khor bar 'khor bar bya ba la bdag gis sems bum par mi bya
36a3(dkon brtsegs): rdegs par mi bya/ sems skrag par mi bya/ yongs su gdung bar mi bya zhing / ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / nyes pa 'di yang chos
36a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhid du phyir bya zhing byen chad nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang / bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las dbyung ba phyir chos bstan par bya'o zhes gimatshon par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'ongs
36a5(dkon brtsegs): su brtag pa na bar bzung na byang chub sems dpa' rar tu byung ba ni gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung ba gyur na yang thobs la mkhas pa des sem par byed na/ rigs kyi bur ni byang chub sems/ 
36a6(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan
36a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nongs pa dang bcas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa la slob par skye
36a8(dkon brtsegs): nabaskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyi legs par smras pa dang / nyes par smras so cog bzod par byed du zin kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga
36b1(dkon brtsegs): 'i med la byed pa dag gis gnas par gyur na/ rigs kyi bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtsa ba'i nyes pa lci ba zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang rag rtsa la'i nyes pa byung bar gyur
36b2(dkon brtsegs): pani phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i nga
36b3(dkon brtsegs): khyed pa dag ma bshags ma spangs kyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med cing sangs rgyas kyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'i skal
36b4(dkon brtsegs): / med de de ni gnas med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi ston
36b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhyen pa'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs su mchud pa'am/ mngon sum dum ya da bcung bad mi mnga' lags mod kyi/ 'od kyang de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad ces dge slong
36b6(dkon brtsegs): sa te byung ba khyo na bcas par mi bya ba tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dgags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar smros shig ces bka' stsas pas/ bdun pa bcom ldan 'das
36b7(dkon brtsegs): bdag mnan mod ge thong khyer chen por bar chags supa ma goms kyi srid du ma pa na/ gro kyi gzhan gagan byang chub sems depa'i rogs can dbu mcho ga rgyal ba zhes patho ba zhi'i steng ni 'ad med
36b8(dkon brtsegs): na sa sa la yang ba dadang byam pa pa dang ldan pa dang / na #ma ldan 'das man tsham chags so// ya ldan pa can ga po cho 'dum
37a1(dkon brtsegs): s+ya/ gsol nas ring po ma lon par de nas de'i yod las chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe byang chub de bas dpa' tshogs can pa mchog
37a2(dkon brtsegs): bos bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar srung gi bar snangs tal bdun srid tsam du 'phags te 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di sad ces smras so// me dang ldan pa kun dka' bo 'di
37a3(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa bar snang la 'dug par nus snyam 'am/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos
37a4(dkon brtsegs): / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo sngon kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du b+har la 'dil bi ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyes pa'i chos dang ldan pa dris shi// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo zur tshwa
37a5(dkon brtsegs): dgyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis natso bo chen po 'di lta bu la nongs pa yongs su glengs pa
37a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa'i nongs pa la nongs par 'chags shing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnongs pa la nongs par bshags pa gang lags pa nongs pa 'i nongs par yongs su gzung drug so
37a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa dag la nyes pa'i 'du shes ma skye
37a8(dkon brtsegs): // kun dga' bo 'di ste ste/ dper na nyan thos kyi theg papa'i gang bag gcig bla bla med par ni gnas kyi gnas pas gnas par byed pa ni zag pa zad pa mngon sum du bya ba la bar chad med par 'gyur
37b1(dkon brtsegs): shin du/ bud dada' 'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thobs la mkhas pa 'bas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldar pa bud med kyi 'bor dam pa'i nang na 'dug cing dga' ba dang
37b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dka' mgur dod par byed pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar du gcod pa med par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir nan/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37b3(dkon brtsegs): po thabs la mkhas pa ni dkon mchog gsum mo// gsum gang zhen/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
37b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub la ma bkod pa'i g.yog 'khor gang yin pa de mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo gang gi tshe khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thams cad ma
37b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyi sebs dang ma bral ba 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse ba dang / dga' ba dang / dga' mgur spyod par byed pa mthong na kun dga' mo khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa sa
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bu'i dbang po lnga dang ldan ning gnas pa yin par shes par bya'o// kun dga' ba gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po khrigacig gi steng na bud med dang lhan cig 'dug par gyi
37b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ya cad ci// kun dka' bo bud med de ni 'das pa'i dus na tshe rabs lnga brgyar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po'i chung ma dkur te/ 
37b8(dkon brtsegs): de la lhag par sems kyis 'brel par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po de'i dpal dang / ga re brjid dang / tshul khrims kyi
38a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas ngan len gyi tshig brjod par mnus nas de gcig 'a dben par 'dug pa na 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ gal te byang chub sems dpa'
38a2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pan rab mchog rgyal po bdag dang lhan cig khrig cig gi steng na 'dug par gyur na bdag gis kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o snyam mo
38a3(dkon brtsegs): dang kyang chub sems dpa' tshogs cad rab mchog rgyam thos sring ba da'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de nyid kyi mtshon mo 'das pa dang snga dri'i dus kyi tshe shem pas
38a4(dkon brtsegs): ngachos gos bgos te lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba na sring mo
38a5(dkon brtsegs): sa gal ba der zhugs nas nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / phyi rom gyi sa'i khams gang min pa'i sa'i khams de dag ni gcig pa yin pa'i chos kyi sgo 'das sems sa dang mnyam pa'i sems
38a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lag pa g.yas pas sring po de bzung ste khri gcig la 'khod do// 'khod ma thag tu ngas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// sangs rgyas 'dod pa bsngags mi mdzad// de ni
38a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul min// 'dod la sred pa spangs byas na// mi mchog sangs rgyas rnams su 'gyur// kun dga' bod na sring mod pa tshigs su bcad pa de bos nas dga' ba dang mchog
38a8(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba skyes te/ wad las bangs nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgya mapo'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// 'dod gang
38b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas smad ba dag/ srud chad don du gnyer mi bgyid// 'dod pa sred pa spang bgyis nas// ma chag sangs rgyas thub gyur cig/ bdag gi sems kyis gang ba sams pa'i// no
38b2(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod pa 'chags// srog chags sanas smyan slad du// bdag ni byang chub bdu pa skyed// kun dga' bo de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal pos thabs la mkha
38b3(dkon brtsegs): pa des sring mo de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par gzangs bstod/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par rab tu bzhag nas stan las langs te
38b4(dkon brtsegs): // kun dga' ba da'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad por la ltos/ kun dga' bar ni sring mo 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus bsgyur te bskal pa grangs med pa 'jam phrad dbub cu rtsa dgu 'das pa
38b5(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing des byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas
38b6(dkon brtsegs): de na sems can me dge ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar rung ston to// kun dga' ba rnam zengs des kyang 'di ltar byang chus sems dpa' ni la
38b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bzung na log par ltung ba'i chos su 'gyur ba de 'dzin par mi byed par rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyal po bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das
38b8(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas mi thabs la mkhas pa dang snying rje chen po la gnas par bgyi
39a1(dkon brtsegs): lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dis bdag ni 'di snyam du gal te byang chub sems dpas ni sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i slad
39a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos pa byu bas ni da sa byung bas bsam pa ma 'dzid pam man rgya na pa zag par gyu yang / ldan pa la ma ldan 'das rgyang chu sems
39a3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba da da / sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngas dem smra bar bgyi lags kyi// sems san gcig po da'i dgeb la yongs su gtang ba la ni ma lags po// ma du bemam pan
39a4(dkon brtsegs): danami mam ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs can rab mchog rgyam po ma legs so zhes bya ba byid te/ la budam pa legs mo legs so// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen por
39a5(dkon brtsegs): ga ba dang ldan pa ni nyes the'i chos dang ldan par yang mi 'gyur la/ nyes pa thams cad spong bar yang byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rigs kyi grangs mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa/ 
39a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bal yang rgyas pang da// dpag tu med pa/ bsapa kyis mi grub pa/  chis par rang gyu pab de'i de'i dusan kya 'i'i yanas bya ba ni ga byung
39a7(dkon brtsegs): sa po bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du nags 'dab dag tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa byas nas de lo bzhi khri nyes stong po de dag 'das pa dang rgyal po'i pho brang legs 'byor ces bya bar zhugs so// 
39a8(dkon brtsegs): na po dang zhugs pa ni tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bstani sdug pa mthong nas de 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis kun nas dkris pa'i sems ces
39b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i rtse 'u de'i bdun du rab tubatugs te nang pa la gtugs so// rigs kyi thad nas tham pa'i khye'u gar ma des bu pa de la 'din ces smras so// snying po khyod ci 'dod das del 'dreskad ces smras so// 
39b2(dkon brtsegs): / shA sas smras pa// thang thamab dod sa / man 'angs par smod pa yin/  dis sa
39b3(dkon brtsegs): ri kye'u kal te khyod dang lhan cig tu 'grogs par mi 'gyur bstan bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so// de nas bram ze'i khye'u skar pa 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyes stong gi bar du
39b4(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa spyad nas deng bdul zhugs gzhig pa 'din bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des bu mo de mthus spangs to bar nas gom pa bdun bor ba dang / de'i gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe snying rje skyes
39b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur nas 'di ltar bdag gis brtul zhugs bshig ste sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ba de bzod par bya zhing bu po 'di bde bar 'gyur ba dang / 
39b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dri ba'i dus byed par me 'gyur bar byakor ma chag sbrum mo// rigs kyi bu de nas bram ze'i khye ru skar mad de nas phyir log ste/ lag pa g.yas pas bu mo 'azung ste/ de la 'di skad ces smras so// babang po
39b7(dkon brtsegs): shig dang kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bzhin bya'o// de nas bram po'i khe'u skar mde lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du de'i khyi mar gnas nas yang mngon par byung ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas de nas shi 'pho
39b8(dkon brtsegs): ma cag tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rted du skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu na me 'i dus na tha bar bye' ska ma zhes bya bar gyur pa de gnan min sa pa du byed ring gnyis dang thecom pa bar gyur na pyod ces de ltar
40a1(dkon brtsegs): the ban 'o// dbya'i phyir zhe na/ nganyid de'i tshe de'i dus namam ze'i khye'u skang ma zhes bya ba de gyu go// shAkya'i bu mos 'tsham ni dam che de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi 'byor chu
40a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi 'angs snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bsrud pa das cung bad tsam nig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang ba skal pazir mthor ba bskel cing spangs par 'gyur ro// 
40a3(dkon brtsegs): nakazhan dag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur bya la ltos/ de nas
40a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi shes dam pal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi thugs te dge slong shA ba pa dang / mau dgas kyi bu dag thabs
40a5(dkon brtsegs): pakhas pa yin par gyur na ni dge slong ko ka lig yang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi thungs mngon par shes pa'i phyir te/ sngon 'das pa'i dus
40a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la dge slong dri med ces bya ba chos smra ba zhig byung bar gyur to// de dgon pa'i phug zhig ma
40a7(dkon brtsegs): so// de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na drang srong lnga brgya zhig kyang gnas te/ de'i tshe na dus ma yin par sprin chen po 'dus shing mar chen po babs par gyur to// de nas bud med gnyis shig grong bar
40a8(dkon brtsegs): dri med gnas pa'i phug tu zhugs te// phrag dri nas phyir byung ba dang / drang srong lnga brgyas ma 'dri dag gis bud med de gnyis dge slong dri med
40b1(dkon brtsegs): da phyir byung ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong lnga brgyam pa po de dag 'di snyam du e ma'o dge slong dri med 'di ni sdig pa 'dod pa mi tshangs par spyod pa yin no snyam nas za ba dang zhe sdang gi 'du shes skyes par gyur
40b2(dkon brtsegs): / de nis dge slong dri med kyis drang srong lnga brgyarnam po de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas de'i tshe steng gi bar snang kinas mkhanya la tal bdun srid cem du mngon par 'gas te/ 
40b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dug pa drang srong de dag gis mthong nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi bstan bcos dag las mi tshangs par spyod pas ni steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug par mi nus so zhes 'byung
40b4(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas/ de dag gis de'i mod la dge slong dri med kyi rkang pa la yan lag lngas gtugs te nyes pa la zhes par bshags so// rigs kyi bu kas te dge slong dri med de de'i tshe steng gi par snang la mngon par 'ab
40b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dug par ma gyur na ni drang srong lnga brgya tsam po de dag rang rang gi lus de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba chen por ldang bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di de snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong dri med ces
40b6(dkon brtsegs): bya bar gyur ba degazha deg sen snye du khyod pa dgan pa dang yo bar bar gyur na khyod cis de ltar ma blta'o// deci'aphyir na na/ byang chub sems dpa' byasas pa 'di de'i tshede'i dus da dge slong dri med ces bya
40b7(dkon brtsegs): la de dag to// rigs kyi bu rnam grang ba des na khyod kyis 'di// dag rkyen gi slong shA ba dud/ mau dgas kyi bu gnyis dang tshe// dgi bar snang ma mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur na ni dge slong kog N+DI
40b8(dkon brtsegs): yang sems cad dmyal ba satho bar mi 'gyural bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu nas grangs des kyang khyen gyis 'di ltar gang du byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i la zhes 'jug par 'gyur ba de de rten
41a1(dkon brtsegs): zas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na smad 'tshong ma smra rdul drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i bya ba shes shing legs par/ 
41a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa ni de'i 'og tu nar 'dod pa'i phyir skyes bu gzhan gyi drung du ci nas kyang bdag nyid yongs su gtang shing dga' ba ston pa dang / ji srid du skyes bu de las don thams cad ma bsgrubs kyi bar dud la yo byang
41a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bri bar mi byed pa da lta de ster gnas par byed do// denas don bsrubs chen pa'i 'og tu ni de la mi lA mi sems par spong bar byed cing de gzhi de las 'gyod pa'i sems gcig tsam yang 'byung
41a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs sa mkhas pa yang thabs sa mkhas pa des sems can 'de ga yongs su smin par byas nas bya ba shes te/ rnam grangs des sems can
41a5(dkon brtsegs): dadag gibs pa 'ang ste ba bzhin du drung du sbyor bar byed cing de dag pa yo byad thams cad mi sre bar byed do// semasan rnams kyi dgebs dga' bas bdag nyid kyang 'ongs su gtong bar byed kyi po blangs
41a6(dkon brtsegs): bas ni mayin no// gang gi kyim sems can 'dod ga ni dag pa pa byas par gyur ba dang ste/ bdi dag zhis byes yongs su nyams par skyed mi nus par shes na ni de'i thog tu 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang cid
41a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sa kyi lta spangs te 'gro nang de de dang 'brel ba'i semaso la gnas par mi byed do// rigs kyi la 'dis ste/ dper na mes yongs su gdungs pa'i sa bon rnams ni khe don yongs su nyams pa
41a8(dkon brtsegs): med pa la myu gu 'byung ba'i skal pa med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i nyan mongs pa rnams kya ba stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang
41b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes pa gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su gdungs da de 'dod pa'i dka' ba thams cad la yongs su spyod pa byed kyang / log 'ar ltung bar 'gro ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dzin par mi byed la/ sang
41b2(dkon brtsegs): kye 'dog las yongs su nyams par yang ma 'gyur ro// rigs kyiT 'di lta snyed per na dud 'gro'i skyeganas su song ba'i srog chags phung ba ni ma tog thams cad las dri bsnom nide myang bar byed kyang gang la yang rtag pa'i
41b3(dkon brtsegs): sdong bu dang / me tog 'phrog par mi byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' thabs ma mkhas pa yang
41b4(dkon brtsegs): semapa can yongs du smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang rtsed mo sems cad la yongs su long sa spyod par byed kyang de dgas rtag pa re 'du shes sgom par yang mi byed/ gnas kyi sred pa skyed par yang mi byed la/ bdag
41b5(dkon brtsegs): basmras par mi 'gyur/ gzhan yang smras par mi 'gyur bar byed do// rigs du 'di lta ste dper na da bshin du chags par bslabs pa ni srad bu cig la gzan mi btags te mchil pa byas nas mtsho chen po mi dang/ 
41b6(dkon brtsegs): 'o// de sa gu legs par baspangs pagacin pa des gang gi cha 'dod padam can mtsho chen pon pa kyis pa de 'dren pa skyed da na ga kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' ba somama'as pa yang
41b7(dkon brtsegs): dadang / mngon pa med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bdag med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par gtang bas 'dod pa'i 'ad byed kyi
41b8(dkon brtsegs): kapar byed kyang de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsgom pa des gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i chen 'dod pa'i khams spangs te chongs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar byed do// 
42a1(dkon brtsegs): na gyes pa byin ldanapa dang / gsung sngags 'chang ba ni rgyal ngo'i mirnams kyis bzung sta nags pa lnga'i tshangs mas bcings par gyur kyang de ni gang gi sa 'gro 'ar 'dod pade rin
42a2(dkon brtsegs): sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis cings ma de dag thams cad bad nas gang du 'gro bar 'ad pa der 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyis kyang chub sems dpa' thams la mkhas
42a3(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir gang gi che 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de dag gi dka' ba myong bar byed cing de dag dang 'dres par gnas par byed kyang de gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi rig sngag pa dang / 
42a4(dkon brtsegs): gsang sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems legs par bsrungs pa gcig gis 'dod pa ni yon tan lnga'i chings ma de dag thams cad pabatu bcad de/ de nas shi 'phos nas rang
42a5(dkon brtsegs): / na du spyodado// gas kyi dis banan byang ni slob pon thegs par bslabs pa zhen sa minan po ma cos bya dkyus pa ni thod pa yang zlos byed pa
42a6(dkon brtsegs): na mi babs pa 'phong gi shes pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phong gi slob dpon des snying rje ba dang / marnas pa'i 'du shes skyed par byed cing / tshig 'di skad ces gzu yang med/ ral gri yang med/ dod pa yang
42a7(dkon brtsegs): med/ 'khor kyang med pa 'dis ni mgron po 'di dag bsgral bar mi nus te/ 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar bar byed mi nus dam thon pa thams cad bsgral ba dang / chom rkun pa'i sdebam par bya ba lta ci smos te/ 
42a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas med pas 'di ni tshul ma yin pas 'che bar 'gyur ngo zhes kyang zer bar 'gyur la/ de nas 'phong gi slob dben de 'brog dkon par son te chom rkun pa'i tshogs lhags par gyur pa na/ mda' gzhu thog
42b1(dkon brtsegs): 'om thab bgos nam mtshon pa dag ras comadun pa rnams la 'debs par byed cing / des chom tan pa de dag rnams cad sog dang gal nas yang brtson cha lag tu len par byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub
42b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang sems can yangs su smin par bya ba'i pir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan cha legs par thags te/ thabs mkhas pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dka' ba dang / 
42b3(dkon brtsegs): rtse ba dang / dgal mgur spyod par byed pa na nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang dag de'i thabs la mkhas pa mishes pa de khong du mchud pa de dag gis de mthong ba'i tshe de dag de la ma dad pa dang / snying rje skyed par byed cing tshig 'di
42b4(dkon brtsegs): skad ces 'di ltar ngag med pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'dis ni bdag nyid kyang thar par byed mi nus na ya' can thams cad bsgral ba ga/ ci smos shing bdud kyi sde pham par byed par lhag la 'gyur te/ de ni gnas med
42b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di ni rgyal ma yin pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro zhes kyang bar mod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' thab sa la mkhas pa dang / shes rab kyis legs par yongs su zin pa ni gang gichi 'dod pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi mtshon
42b6(dkon brtsegs): dam nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad dral cing rab tu gtubs nas shes rab dang lhan gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi shing bud med dang bral ba dang / 'khrig pa dang bral ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dag tu 'gro bar byed do// 
42b7(dkon brtsegs): katab 'di brjod par gyur pa de'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed ces bya ba mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir nags par gyur te/ de mnyan yod kyi grong khye
42b8(dkon brtsegs): chen por bsod snyoms spyod pa na tshong dpon zhig gi khyim du phyin pa dang / tshong dpon des bum dpal yon car gyi mchog ces bya ba phyug cung shig yod par gyur pa khang bzang kyi stang na 'dug pa des dge slong de
43a1(dkon brtsegs): skad zos nas bsod snyoms thogs te byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed gal ba der song ngo // de nas bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog gis byang chub sems dpa' dka' bye
43a2(dkon brtsegs): nga sa ba tu da sakyis kyim pa'i sems da na dang lhan dang /  pa gzang ba dang / 'du gas kyi sa dkyis ma
43a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gtugs pa'i sems dang / 'dod chags kyis yongs su gdungs pa'i sems kyis bsregs pas lus rngul par gyur nas 'greng
43a4(dkon brtsegs): rten du 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa 'a dga' byed kyang bu mo dpal yon can gyi mchog mthong nas tshul bzhin pa yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang bcas
43a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems skyes par gyur nas yud tsam zhag na de la dran pa 'di lta 'a skyes par gyur te/ chos gang la chags par gyur pa'i chos de gang yin/ ci mig mig sa chags sam/ mig ni chags pa ma yin te/ g.yo ba med pa
43a6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ 'dus byas pa/ rim pa 'dra pa/ ga'i mas yin te/ mig de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa 'ini phyir sems pa mi byed/ tshar bar mi byed do// na ba dang / sna dang / sred pa pa
43a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid dang / lags pa dang / mdog dang / sha yang de dang 'dra ste/ des rkang mthil yan chad klad pa man chad kyi bar la so sor brtags na nang dang phyi rol na gang chags par 'gyur ba 'am/ sdang bar 'gyur ba 'am
43a8(dkon brtsegs): nga ma dmigs so// des ma dmigs nas 'dod chags kyi sems dang bral bar gyur cing / des sems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor brtags pas chos
43b1(dkon brtsegs): cad ma skyes par rig nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod thob par gyur to// de dka' ba dang / mchog tu dgar 'de nyid kyis steng gi bar snang la ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags te/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer

43b8(dkon brtsegs): mod la des bdag gi las ci zhig byas shing bsags pas 'di skyes par gyur snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por tshang dpon gyi bu mor gyur pa las den bdag gis
44a1(dkon brtsegs): can du chags pa ni sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bye sa bzlas pa dang / bdag 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis ngananas dkris pa che sems kyis 'a

48b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ca gags kyi lags sa/ sems can na chen po la mol pa cheg 'de nad ces bdag canan khyod de lta' bzhin du zung byer de mchim gas so nas mche bde dgang // ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'

48b3(dkon brtsegs): byung banas kyi 'dzilta de bzhin du ni cad ma byed pa nyid du ngas pa bsdus pa'i sems ni brtson 'grub la srab blta par 'bye gso/ mthag
48b4(dkon brtsegs): dashes sa dason na bya' bams ches pa'i gas ca ponas bache de pa de ba du rten po sa dang /  sangs rgyas sAsasud kyi rnams blta bar brtsilags so// ga pas g.yon rtsig pang sa ded cig pa dang blang ba bgyis
48b5(dkon brtsegs): shes 'a'i bde lta ba bzhin du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa blta bar bgyi lag so// nang lag zhisar gyi ni shul de las yang dag par 'da' bar babyed la zhes bkye ba de zhin du ni byang cubasams dpa' sems
48b6(dkon brtsegs): pob 'i ngos po banis semasas dad pag tum baches pa rnams snad cing ba dan pa 'da' bar babyed pa dag skabar kyi ga grang bzhin du phyir nol bsgra byed cing 'dagro pa ston padag pa 'i yang zhes pagyi ba de ni lta de bzhin du de da
48b7(dkon brtsegs): e lce'i tha rnams kyang blta bar bgyil/ de bzhin du sems can ldan pa la mngon par zhan pa yongs su nyan mongs pa car gyi las kun du spyod par bgyid pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'phya ba dang / spong bar bgyid pa
48b8(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam gyi saso/ nga mar ma la nas me na pa da pa'i ma su yin pa dang / lhan pa ba ma pa sems babyed pa tshig gra dgapa pagasas// galasagatshan du yang ba lta bar nas
49a1(dkon brtsegs): / ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dga' ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// grong khyo chen po nas bgyi ba den thams cad pakhyen pa nyid tu grog khyer gyi tshig bla dgas ni/ 
49a2(dkon brtsegs): lags so//  k+ta b+ha mche bar 'gyur ba des de ltar grong khyer dmathong bar yang 'gyur ma nas bgyi ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsnyengs pa bams ca dang bral ba'i chag bladags dang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
49a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / ye shes la nges par rtog par bgyid pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la shin tu legs par slob pa'i tshig bla dgas
49a4(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de la ji ltar mayong bde sa des de'i 'jigs pa dang / 'jigs pa'ang ba thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te shes brtse bdeni sems pan thams sad 'jigs pa ma mchis shing pocom dang bram
49a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas lags so// khrang dkrugs nan pa dang / 'gram pa dang brod dam mchis par 'gyur shing sems can dang gtu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bamed pa/ skye ba dang / nab dang / bron dang / 
49a6(dkon brtsegs): b.las yang dag par bkra ba'i srad nga tsam ston par yang bgyid ces 'argya bdon dbazhen ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa la dag par rdzogs pa 'asangs rgyas kyi cig bladadags lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgya
49a7(dkon brtsegs): dngasam 'dapa' sems dpa' chen po dmas ni ye shes dang ldan pa lags// btsun pa pacam ldan 'das bang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad pa phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
49a8(dkon brtsegs): patshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'od srung legs so legs so// 'od srung khyod kyis da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la spro bskyed pa ni lang khyod legs te
49b1(dkon brtsegs): 'od srung byed kyis dpe brjod pa des lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dku las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
49b2(dkon brtsegs): dmas de thabs la mkhas pa legs par bslabs pa/ man tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te/ 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na gang gis bdag la gnod par 'gyur ba'am/ gnan lag na
49b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'de sa bu'i rdzas mi byed cing / tshig gang zhes bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshog sang mi smra'o// de sad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan la gdung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes pa
49b5(dkon brtsegs): klu pa ra gas na/ bcom ldan 'das 'on ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bras po la khye'u 'od zer phreng shes bkye bar gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsamaM pa yang dang
49b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i sangs da gsang tha da ya / mgo / sa nga bga'ab pa she/  pa la da / 'ab med pa den na rinas ba pa nga mag
49b7(dkon brtsegs): ba maldan 'das kyis de skyed gsungs pa de kyilas dgong sa nyid dag sungs pa lags/ drin ces gas pa pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chubs sa pa'i sems dpa' rtson ci zhes dpapas 'dis
49b8(dkon brtsegs): sa bka' spel to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i chad rab tunapa par dbye bas khyod la ci shig bya long shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
50b1(dkon brtsegs): skyed pas gang gi tshe 'dod pa de'i chen bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rtsa bar byed cing / 'dod phyi ba'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskam pa brgya phrag mang por yang mid yongs su slob med par
50b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas par byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang nyan thos kyang ni nga'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin da
50b3(dkon brtsegs): sa par 'jug cing ldang bar byed mod kyi de'i lus g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sems g.yo bar yang mi 'gyur ro// nyan thos ni bdag nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba kho nar shes par byed kyi/ byang chub sems
50b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhes sems can rnams bsdu ba'i brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod cing ba rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can phongs su smin par yang byed la/ sems
50b5(dkon brtsegs): sa yongs su smin par byed pa na sa pe chen pa skyed par yang byed de/ desang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ma khas pa rtson no// rigs kyi bu gzhan sang byang chub sams dpa' ni 'dod na dag ldan ciganas na bdu
50b6(dkon brtsegs): dmed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang kyi zhing chos kyi 'khor sngoskor bar yang nas yod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam bu'i sring pa'i mi rnams kyis na
50b7(dkon brtsegs): kan pa'i phyir dag ldan kyi gnas su 'dzeg par mi nus la/ lha rnams kyis ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'jam bu'i gling du 'bab par nus so// bA ma nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'dzam bu'i gling du byang chub mngon par/ 
50b8(dkon brtsegs): gas par sangs rgyas te/ de bang byang chub sems dpa'i babs la mkhas pa yin no// dgas kyi bu gzhan pang byang chub tshems dpa' di 'dod na dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos das ma'i bang sa du ma zhugs shing ma
51a1(dkon brtsegs): drabs ma rig gcan da'i skad cig nyid ma byang chub mdzad par rdzogs par nga tun mas kyi 'khor ba skor bar bang nus med kyi/ de sa sems can 'acag 'dasam du 'di lta'amaklul
51a2(dkon brtsegs): gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ sprul pa zhig gam/ 'dag las 'ongs pa ni ga stan du de mnur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag nem nur dang / yid gnyis dang / the tshom skyes par gyur na/ nyon mongs
51a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir chos nyan par ma byed/ shes par mi byed/ brtson 'grus tsam par mi byed pas byang chub sems dpas mangs na gnas pa bstan pa'i rgyun de yin/ rkyen na dmin no// rigs kyi bu khyod la
51a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam du byang chub sems dpa' mngal gyi gnas su zhugs so// sngam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa zhes bya ba pod de/ byang chub sems dpa' dga'
51a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas na bzhugs bzhin du des snyoms par thugs shing yangs su bdan nas ting nge 'dzin mas pa langs bzhin du dkar b+he glenas nyid nas byang chub kyi snang pos 'dug pa 'i/ dkyul ldan gyi lhurnams kyis
51a6(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong bas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin las langs so// snyam du shes par chad do// byang chub sems dpa' na dga'i ldan gyi gnas nas mig po bzhin du sprul pa dag gis 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang mngon par
51a7(dkon brtsegs): blang ba dang / dka' ba stod pa'i bya ba thams cad kun du ston par byed de/ de dge thams cad na byang chub sems dpas sprul pa dag gis kun du bstan pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang
51a8(dkon brtsegs): kun du spyod pa gtsang ba yin pas phyir mngal gyi gnas sum 'gro ba'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mikhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' glang ba che thal kA ru bsgyur te ma'i mngal du
51b1(dkon brtsegs): bston par byed ce/ dani dkar ba phyogs kyi tshig bladags yin da/ ba 'byor zhe na/ byang na ba sems dpa' nasems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa len pas na des na ci nas kyang lha'am mi gan dgang pa
51b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa da lta bu kho nas mangs du 'jug pa bstan par bya dgos pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs pa mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur ma'i mang ba na gnas shing dkur ma yin no/ 
51b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag 'di snyam du kye ma gzhan nu 'di ni mangs na gnas pa'i dus yongs su ma rdzogs pas dbang po mtshang bar gyur to// snyam du sems pa'i sems can de dag gi the tshom bcad pa dang / mang ba gyi dus dang / dbang
51b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bra ba bcur ma'i mngal dganas kyi dgur ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' zlab bcur ma'i mngal na gnas pa na yang lha rnams byang chub sems
51b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur zhing de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i longs sgyu
51b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i longs spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa mthong nas lha'i bus pa phrag gnyis dang / bzhi 'bum gyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/ de yang byang chub sems da/ 
51b7(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtshan btol te mangs gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun du ston par byed ce na/ sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni pa dang ma'i mer mer po/ 
51b8(dkon brtsegs): las skyes pa ma yin gyi rngus te skyes pa ponan snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag gi the tshom bcad pa'i phyir ma'i mtshan btas te mangs gyi gnas nas 'byung ba kun du bstan to// blang ba zag tu lub ste 'o sgra 'phrus kyis
52a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yang med cing sgom med pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bangs na gnas pa'i tshe lub lha mog 'phrul gyis bde ba myong bar gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i bde ba ni sngon nam yang ma reg cing sngon nam yang / 
52a2(dkon brtsegs): mabyung ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ma mkhas pa men//  phyi byang chub sems dpa' dgan par bcas shing grod dum yin nen/ byang chub sems dpa' de na ring po nas dkon pa'i bsngags pa/ 
52a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod pa dang / dben pa la dga' ba dang / kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / grong du bcas na g+ha dang / k+Sha dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyang lha'i phye ma dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me to// dag gis shinaH
52a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / ser bya'i gnas kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i ma rnams kyang rgyags pa dang / bag med pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par btsam
52a5(dkon brtsegs): ning grong du ba yin pa'i rgyu ni de yin/ rkyen ni de yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyis shing brag sha'i yal ga la bzang ste ba ma pa pa byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas she na/ sems canag
52a6(dkon brtsegs): dag 'di snyam du lam skams 'ayul ji ltar bud ma dgazhan dag bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas rag ci bang drab sems dpa' btsas sa snyam du sems pa'i sems can dag gi themamo bcad pa dang / bde bar/ 
52a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas par kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yum lha mo sgra 'phrul gyis shing blag sha'i yal gas bzang ste 'dam pam byas par byang chub sems dpa' btsas par byas so// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mtsha
52a8(dkon brtsegs): las pa btid te/ dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mangs kyi gnas nas byung zhi skye gnas nas kyang ma min/ lus kyi phyogs gzhan nas kyang ma yin nen/ byang chub sems dpa' na kun spyod pa gtsang ba dang / 
52b1(dkon brtsegs): de rten gsum po thams cadapas kyang bar dang lags pa dang / 'dus ba'i sems can dpas gdul ba'i khyer de na'i ska sems ma dpan pa gzhan dag bzhin du ma'i mang bdun cing gnas pa ma yin pa dang / mig
52b2(dkon brtsegs): le pa kar skye ba bstan pa rgyad gas pa'i phyir te/ desan byang chub sems dpa' ba 'i mang nagapas pa bcom k+She tshwa la dang shes bzhin gyis sangs kyi gnas nas byung ni byang chub sems da' 'jas ma zag tu sum ma
52b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brul gyi mtshan yang ma mad cang sgras med par gyur te/ de sang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mamakhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu lha'i dbang po byin gyis bzung la mir gyur pa ga
52b4(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ma min zhe na/ de na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba 'bar bas lha rnams 'dun par byas pas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' btsas ma thag tu gos rin po chos bzung
52b5(dkon brtsegs): 'o//  sngon smon lam btab pa'i phyir des na byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las rgya chen po la brtson par byed pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sebs dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems pa
52b6(dkon brtsegs): tsa ma thag tu yongs sum bzung bar kom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa drug kyang ma yin/ brgyad kyang ma yin zhe na/ byang chub sems napas ni ji ltar gnan sus kyang sngon ma bstan pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi brtson
52b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus chen po dang / skyes ru ngas pa'i rtsal gdon mi za bar kun tu bstan par bya dgos pa dang / nam pa bdun po rabs sems can gang dag gi dor byed gos pade dag gi don gom pa drug nas kyang mchog ma brgyad ni lhag pa
52b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur bas dnga'i byer byang chub sems dpa' bcams pagatu yongs su pa 'asrung bar gom pa bdun 'dor bar byed pa drug kyang ma ye/ nga byam mngon te/ da yang byang chub sems dpa'i ba'asams khas pa yin no// 
53a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gam pa bdun 'dor ban tshig 'dis daces ngani 'jigartenan thub yin no de gtan na gtsom yin te/ skya ba dang / nab dang / na pa dang / 'ching mthar byung bar byas
53a2(dkon brtsegs): dod par byed cen/ rigs kyi bu 'khor den brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / kwa'i bu dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa dag / 'dus par gyur tel khong par rgyam gyis 'das pa de dag 'di snyam du bdaganag
53a3(dkon brtsegs): bra ba len gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni de lta ma yin no// snyam du sems shing 'dud par mi byed/ rab tu 'dud par mi byed/ phyag 'tshal bar mi byed/ rab tu phyag 'tshal bar mi byed thabs na de na byang chub sems
53a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dis sa du 'ams/ badz+ra byin dang / mangs pa dang / khyi gu yun ring ba don med pa dang / gnod pa dang / sdug bsngal pa dang / lag par ltung bar 'gyur ro// snyam nas/ de kyi byang chub sems dpas tshig 'din
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ni 'jig rten na thu bo yin no// nga ni 'jig rten na gtso bo yin te/ sde ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung bar bya'o zheb smras te/ tshig gi sgra sa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten che khams 'jig pa
53a6(dkon brtsegs): / ranas lha'i bu gang dag deng ma lhags pa dag kyang sbrang tsas nas lhags par gyur cing / de nas d+ha'i bud dang khyi dang / chang mi bdag yi byung ba skyem shing dmachar du 'dzin pa gyur nas gus pa dang bcas
53a7(dkon brtsegs): ma dug pa pa smra hA/ b+h+ya na bas sa pa man pa nga ba /  byung mam sa dag tshig 'di kyis di ji zhan man/  ba dang / dab na pang
53a8(dkon brtsegs): mthar dbyung bar bya'o// zhes smras pa'i chu ni da lan/ rkyen ni da yin na// byang chub sems dpa' tshig de ni yang dag pa yin te/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems
53b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' btsams cag tu gad pa char gad par byang cen/ rinas pa bu byang chub sams dpa'as ni 'ad cags na chud can rgyam ba lag na sang dang rtan cig rgyas pa 'ag gti mug dang sman capa skyes pa nang pa'i gdas la sa
53b2(dkon brtsegs): dadu do ba yang nga kyi/ yon kyang byang rgyabamams dpa' sa du bams te/ byang chub semapa dpa' di gnas de / da na ci rgya chu sems brgyad pa las bad gi yin byang chubazab pa
53b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag ni le la'i dbang gis 'khor ba thib por gnas par gyur pas byamasems can 'di dag ni thams cad 'khyen pa nyid 'ol bar bya ba'i phyir snying rjes bgrod par bya ba'i chos thams cad pa brtsod 'grus rtsom par
53b4(dkon brtsegs): dpayinanis dkar gyi chen po sbed pan/ sems da da nga / gis byang chub sams dpa ni bsam pa ngas su rdzogs payin par mig la/ bdag can ni ngan pa dang / bad me pa yin par riganas de dag padag sa thug
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'a'agyur ro// gam nas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ga mtshar grad par byed dede yang byang chub sems dpa' tha' pal mkhas payin no//  phyir byang chub sems dang 'drim med pa ba tsamamalas rgyas byin pa
53b6(dkon brtsegs): dag gis lakhru bar byed cen/ rigs kyi brad ni ba khyen dang/ ngas padag ma tshad pa'i las byed pa yang yin pa/ 'jig rtenam pang bye 'udag bcomam thag tan do mi za bar khrul byang ba dag yod pas byang chub semasapa
53b7(dkon brtsegs): reg rten shes pa'i rjes sugadan mi 'a bar 'jug par bya dgos pas na gyi dbang de meng pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bca ga pa byin dang tshangs pa dag gis 'alta bar byed de/ dasang byang chub sem
53b8(dkon brtsegs): zabs la mkhas pa yin no// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dgon par bcam ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar ci'i phyir grong khyer du 'jug cen/ dbang po rnams yongs su sman par kun du bstan pa
54a1(dkon brtsegs): btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bya ba kun du bstan pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo dang/ kun du bstan nas kyang gling chen po bzhi la me lta bar spungs te mngon par 'byung ba kun du bstan par bya ba dang / 'di sar sems can
54a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag kyang bad// rjes su slob pan 'do pa'i dga' ba dang / byed po dang / longs skyed dang / li tsa chen po dag spangs te rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir te/ gang gi phyi byang chub sas/ 
54a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dgon par btsas ma thag kho nar byang chub kyi snying por mi 'gro bar grong khyer du zhugs nas mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i rgyu ni
54a4(dkon brtsegs): tsAb sems dpa' btsas nas nag bdun yin 'a/ yum la mo/ 'phrul 'ching 'dus byed par gyur chen/ dedzin byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa'i nyes pa med do// yum lha mo sna 'phrub nyid che bad nas dus las 'das padzin
54a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa nyid kyi tshan lha'i mig rnam par dag pas yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyi tshal so sor brtags na byang chub sems
54a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i lus l+h+wab sgra 'bras ci'i lcags ni thab pa bcud shag bdun pa la mams par shes nas/ de'i 'og byang chub sems dang 'dag 'aldan ci gnasam chaganas ni 'angam te ma'i mas duzhugs pa yin pas ga kyi
54a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs des ni bang snod kyis 'di ltar yum lta po ste 'phrul nyid tshe ba nas 'chi ba'i dus byas par zang kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' btsas pa'i nyes pa ni ma yin par rig par byaste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la/ 
54a8(dkon brtsegs): nano// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas yig dang / lag ces dang / bstan bcos dang grangs da kyis dang / ral kri'i thabs dang / mad gzhu thebs dang / 'byed stebs dang / gyad ci 'dzin stangs dang / ska pa'i
54b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dka'a' dang / rtsed mo dag lags par bslabs shes ma 'jig rten dang rjes su 'thun par bya ba'i phyir te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'ang nga ba nyid nas gang pal legs par bslabs par ma byas pa'i bco'am/ gsad
54b2(dkon brtsegs): sngags sngags sa ga zhan bcos pa krag nga ma gu sa rol mo'i slab ma/ bshad gang dam/ 'jo sreg gam/ dga' ba 'am cad mo kun tu bstan par bya ba ni snong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'ga' yang ming med
54b3(dkon brtsegs): nas byang chub sem dpa' la ni bcasas tha ka dzi na 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzo dang / las kyi gnas thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon shin du legs par bsrabs papa dang / dge ba'i ca pa
54b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin pa'i dbang gi skabs bskyed pa'i phyir te/ de yang byang chub sems pa'i thabs pa mkhas pa yin no// ci byar byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham pa btsun mo dang / sras dang / g.yog 'khor len par byed cen/ rigs kyi
54b5(dkon brtsegs): bu byang chub sems dpa' na 'dod pa den dug nyar ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i gnas skabs na skyes bla dam pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir te/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sred pa tham pas ni btsun po dang / sbas / 
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gdon mi za bar bstan par bya dgos te sems can gang dag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' ni skyes bu dam pa ma yin gyi tha ma'i rigs shig yin no snyam du sems par gyur ma/ de dag su ring po don med pa dang / gnod
54b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / reg par snang bar 'gyur bas sems can de dag gi tha tsam bcad pa dang / bang m+b+ha swA sras sgra gcan zin kun tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems pa sa
54b8(dkon brtsegs): dngashA 'di na ba du sas sgrag can zin no labadang khrum gyi mer mer po las skyes pa yin na snyam du sems dad ltar mi ltala'o// da ci'i phyir zhen// skrag can chen padi ni sngon 'di sang du bdag sred pa sem pa'i'u bsur cig ces s+ho/ 
55a1(dkon brtsegs): ma pa ban nag can me mas nas shi 'amadzin pa 'das ma tegs pa yin gyi/ bad pa'i ma mer polas skyes pa na phyir ro// kya'i thams mamam kyi ldan pam
55a2(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa yin te/ des de bzhin gshegs pa pa mam kyi sbyin pa bram po'i byed do dang ma khar gyur ban bdag gi kyimathar gra na dag pa 'khyod kyi bdun mor gyur cig ces smon lal btab pa'i phyir ro// de cher
55a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas kyang 'di skad ces bzang mong ni 'dod pa rnams don du gnyer ba ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gar cig ces yud pa la'i phyir khas blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dge ba
55a4(dkon brtsegs): gled ba da pa sgru ba yin pas byang chub sems dpas ba'i bub mal mthas so/ gzhan sang byang chub sems dpa' srid ba tham pasani bdun ma la bar dang / gtsigal gdanam ba par kun du brten par byangs
55a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar shAkya'i bu mos 'tshams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / sna'i mchod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas 'di skad du jam bdag kyang
55a6(dkon brtsegs): chos 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyu 'a cig ces lhag pa'i bsam pas bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa'i phyir te/ de lta na shAH'i bumapa 'tshom byang chub gye se mas btan par byed
55a7(dkon brtsegs): ga pa'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas shAH'i bu mos 'tshom blangs so// gzhan yang sems can yang dag 'dod pa dang / bran dang / rbang ma dang / las khyim pa'i dang // khang kyis dang / nor rdzas kyi 'du 'dzis sngags na
55a8(dkon brtsegs): a su 'dzin pa spangs tarabatu 'byung bar mnus pa'i sems can dadag la 'ad pa'i sred pa dang / sangs smad dang / na rdzas dang / rung ba la me lta pa kun du bstan par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpas gakya'i
55b1(dkon brtsegs): bras sa kyis no ngas dag / cang ba dgalab rnams yis par ma ta sa gyu/ sems can dang/  dikyimadun na da na papas ca gru pa di das brgyan ma dag nam
55b2(dkon brtsegs): nga/ yongs spyod rgya chen pa dag pa mi ltu bar sapa nye ma blang na do'i phyir bdag cag sa ci'i phyi mab tu 'thung ba mi b+haskam du sem par bya ba'i phyir ro// bam pa gsum pa/ gzhan sang byang chub sems dpas
55b3(dkon brtsegs): nga chub sems dpa'i spyad pa smos nab med ga donanung srin pa kur ma gang dag dag pa'i chos rnams kyis la mas smin par bye sa ning yid gzugs par thar ba de dag gis 'dig daces bdag cid khyod sred pa pham
55b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ab tshun chad kyi 'atsun mo zhir cig ces smin la ma btab pas ni de dag gi dkar ba 'tshas kyi cher sbyin par bya ba'i phyir yang byang chubasams dpal lakhor rnams blangs te/ den byang chub sems dpa' btsun ma'i lam
55b5(dkon brtsegs): dang du gnas pa'i bud medang ni khri nyis stong ni blan mdapa' 'ang dag pa rdzogs yi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so// lcags rnams ni sag pa de ltung ba'i chom can du byas te/ rnab grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpas la
55b6(dkon brtsegs): dmas thas so// gzhan yang yu med gang dag 'dod chags kyi yangs su gdung la na ros yongs su gangs par gyur pa de dag gis byang chu sems dpa' mthong ma thas tu bdag nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba kun zhes
55b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas bdag nyid kyi cu sheng dang /  dag dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i skal pa mngon par sprul nas/ sprul pa de dang bud med de dag ldan ceg dga' ba dang rtsa ba dang / dga'
55b8(dkon brtsegs): byed pa na de dag so so nas 'di snya ma du bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' dang lhan cig dka' 'a dang / rtse 'i dang / dga' ma 'u spyad pa
56a1(dkon brtsegs): dga'aba'i 'arnam pas gnas par byed do// dam pa'i 'dod pa'i longs sod de lta ba bzhin du de bzhin / shegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag pa pa gas rgyamam ma mdzang can chad nas/ 
56a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa ci bad pa'i ngongs stod kyang she ba ltab pa 'o// shAH bu 'du pa dang /  sngags rdzi gnyis kyang ded gnyis kyi sdom kyi stonam ma nyid yin par blta bar bya ste/ de yang byang chub sems dpa
56a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs la mkhas pa yin par blta bar bya'o// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' shing 'dzam bu'i gring ma la bsam gtan byed ce na/ byang chub sems dang 'din gnas pas lha bye ba phrag bdun nu gdul ba dang la'ang
