85a1(dkon brtsegs): dpapa ni kyang grub ste/ chab dang /  ba dang / skar 'dang / lan na'i ro dang / bga' la sogs pa'i nga rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ la lan po par 'thar/ la bzhigapa/ la la nimang sa
85a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu de dag med par gyur pa'i sa bon gang dang gang du 'pho ba der re yang 'a' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di gang dang gang du 'pho bde dang der tshor ba 'pho bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams dang 2
85a3(dkon brtsegs): nams ma yin pa dang / dran la lang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis na lus yongs su btang nas bdag gi lus 'di yongs su btang ngo snyam du rab tu shes te/ de bas na 'di la rnam par she
85a4(dkon brtsegs): khams shes bya'o// dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// ma dge ba'i las kyang rab tu shes so// las 'di dag ni bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bdag kyang 'di dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo snyam du de ltar rab tu shes te/ de bas
85a5(dkon brtsegs): darnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus 'di'i bya ba thams cad rab tu shes te/ de bas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// dper na rlung gi khams grang bar yang 'gyur zhing che bar yang 'gyur la/ dri zhim par la
85a6(dkon brtsegs): lda zhing dring bar yang ldang ste/ spyad pa de dag thams cad ni rlung gi khams kyi rkyen las byung yang rlung gi khams de yang gzugs can ma yin la/ len pa'i chus snang ste/ ji ltar rlung gi khams kyis shing g.yo ba dang
85a7(dkon brtsegs): / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i reg pa len pa'i rkyen byed pa las rlung gi khams shes par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang gzugs can ma yin te/ gzugs len pa'i rkyen dang / 'dod pa len pa'i rtse
85a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / lta ba len pa'i rkyen dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa len pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab myong bar 'gyur ro// cher ba'i rkyen gyis lus dang kha dog skye zhing 'grub par byed pas na rnam par
85b1(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gnon du ra ba 'byor bstan las langs te/ bral ma sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas so te// bcom ldan 'das gzugs ji ltar bska par ba 'i/ len pa ning sa sul/ 
85b2(dkon brtsegs): las len pa ni ji ltar blta bar brtsi/ lta ba len pa ni ji lta bu lags/ tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'i len pa ni ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ zlab 'byor pa
85b3(dkon brtsegs): legs so legs so// mkhas pas ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid de ltar shes so// zla ba 'byor pa 'di ni kha dog bzang po 'am/ khado// ngan pa yang rung ste/ de ni sha kham chad dang / tsa dang / rgyus pa dang / mgo dang / klad pa dang
85b4(dkon brtsegs): rus pa dang / rkang ba dang / sum dang / gtam dang / mkhal ma dang / snying dang / lho dang / glu ba dang / phyis dang / gcin dang / spang ba dang / pho ba dang / long ga dang / shag dang / chu ser dang / nag dang / khrag dang / mkhris pa dang
85b5(dkon brtsegs): da kan dang / ngar snabs dang / skra dang / kha spu dang / sen po dang / spu dang / pags pas galegs pa shin du gyur pa/ mi sdug pa/ mi gtsang ba mang po la brten pa'o// gzugs gci yang rung ba de dag thams cad de 'thung ba
85b6(dkon brtsegs): rab bzhi dang / 'byung ba cher ba'i na rgyur byas pa las mngon par 'grub ste/ de yang ba ma phrad pa'i rkyen gyis 'grub par 'gyur te/ de bas na ga zugs len pa'i chu zhes bshad do// zla ba 'byor ba lus kyi srab nyid gang ci
85b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni sa'i khams so// gsher ba nyid gang yin pa de ni chu'i khams so// ngo bo nyid dang / yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams so// g.yo ba nyid dang / bsdus pa dang / nyung ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rlung gi
85b8(dkon brtsegs): lus de'i rab tu shes pa dang / ra'i khams dang / dri'i khams dang / sgra'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams dang / dran pa gang led pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshong dpon gnos
86a1(dkon brtsegs): nu zab 'byor pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe dam par shes pa 'dis gzugs kyi khams ji ltar longasu gtang bar 'gyur/ lus las rnam par shes pa ji ltar
86a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar gyur/ lus yongs sa cad nas 'dis padu 'don 'ad// ge mas pa nan sum du ltar 'jas par 'gyung/ bcom ldan 'das ces dka' stsal pa/ zlab 'byor pa 'di sras bde gnas pa
86a3(dkon brtsegs): kur nas/ dus log par gyur pas// khams rnams yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ dngape len 'o ma dang chu bsres te/ lhan cig tu bzhag pa me dang phrad na/ lo ma yang logs shig tu 'gyur zhing / chu yang logs shig tu
86a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ 'o ma'i snum gyi khams gang len pa de yang gzugs can ma yin no// zla ba 'byor ba de bzhin du mi shi pa la lan pa yang logs shig tu 'gyur// mas rnams kyang sogs shig tu 'gyur/ rnam par shes pa yang
86a5(dkon brtsegs): sogs shig tu 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa de yang khabs kyi tan yongs su grangs nas/ chos kyi khams yongs su len to// dran pa ni chos kyi khams dang / 'brel par 'gyur te/ dran pa chos kyi khams dang 'brel ba dang / das
86a6(dkon brtsegs): dang med ge ba blangs nas/ 'jig rten pa rol tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// dper na dge brtson pa zhes bya ba'i sman pa da de/ sngon chab dang / a ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan Na ri dang / bzla ba'i tshe'i mabu dang / rnam par smin
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dur blangs nas lus kyi nang du 'gro'o// dge ba'i sman mar gyi ra'amathu dang / rnam par smin ba de na du song pas lus la kha dog dang / dri dang / ra pyad par byed cing / dmar gyi khams yongs su btang nal/ lus la 'a
86a8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas/ dge ba dang mi dge ba yongs su blangs shing / chos kyi khams yongs su blangs nas/ rnam par shes pa 'pho bar 'gyur te/ mar
86b1(dkon brtsegs): sa s+ho//  ga sa s+ho//  nas kyi da / nga da ra// gang pa rnaMm par shes pam/  na 'dun
86b2(dkon brtsegs): da shes pa lam 'a shu kham gnas pa dang / ma ga par shi de ba ga pa sa bur bstan to// dge'i chen po'i sman ma das mdog na rgyab
86b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dan mi dge ba lta bur bstan to// dge 'chen pa'i snyan mar rin po tshang za ba de zhin du ni rnam par shes par/ rab se lnga par bya'o// ji smad dag pa chen pora'i sman mar gyis sman par rnams kyi 'dag 'jug par byed
86b4(dkon brtsegs): longs su ldan te/ dag pa dang me dge ba yongs su yin te// rnab 'byor pa pre shi 'bas pa des kyang sna'i dran pa thod par 'gyur te/ 'dod pan srid 'drug gi rnarnams mthong ngo // sems can dpral ba cu drug kyang mthong / 
86b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dag nyid kyi khrus nang lag mnyam pa lang mameng ste/ de'adas du/ 'di ni bdag gi lags min na sum du bang shes so// de ci pa'i dus kyi ma'i drin pas lha'o ltas// 'ad pa brtsegs pa rnam par bkrargong/ shing shes
86b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'dri shing dang / ldum bus tshogs kyis gnanas sgyur gi gsar bkyim sa pa'i dag par zug smras parnapa par byeb byas padag pa nga // sa las dmam nas de
86b7(dkon brtsegs): 'askyes pa des bde ba'i rnam par smin pa'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshogs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de'i rnam par shes pa den rtal don pa dang 'dra bar ba ltas/ dper na gdus bcas pan/ dmag me'i nang na mi cil rag/ 'ar
87a1(dkon brtsegs): ces bskalas bzung ste/ myur bltar bar gon par byed pa de shin du/ rnam par shes pa 'i mas 'das dgeb la dmigs pa dang 'bru ba zhing / dbugs rgya rgod pam chos kyi khams yongs su gra
87a2(dkon brtsegs): shing bya mched 'gags te/ lus po nas pa'i gnas 'og min man mag sapa'i bar dribangs su len par grang ngo // bam po gnyis pa/ denas sman chen gyis bcos ldan 'das kyi na thal gtugs nas pacom ldan 'das
87a3(dkon brtsegs): 'diska ces gsol to// rnam par shes pa lus las 'phob de'i rang bzhin ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen de ltar khyod kyis nga' ji skad bskul ba de ni de bzhin te/ legs sa
87a4(dkon brtsegs): legs so// dri ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par bya bayin te/ rnam par shes pa de ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan mdado// de nas bcom ldan 'das la babang skyong gis 'di skad cesag
87a5(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i bu gzhon nu sman chen ni zab mo zhu ba zhu ba la mkhas pa lags te blo shi ba cir 'dzangs la mkhas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de bzhin te/ rgyal po'i dra
87a6(dkon brtsegs): zhon par ci 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzegs la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// bzang skyong rgyal po'i bu gzhon du sran chen 'di ni che rabs lnga bcu'i bar du gzhan mu stegs can du sbyar nas de 'di snyam du
87a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ci yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di su'i yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di de lta bu zhig yin snyam mo// bzang skyong 'on kyang rnam par shes pa'i 'gro ba dang 'ong ba khong du margya
87a8(dkon brtsegs): dengs 'di'i the tshom bsal bar bya'o// de nas tshong dpon bzang skyong gis sman chen la 'di skad ces smras so// smad chen legs so legs so// khyod ni shes rab rgya che shing yang
87b1(dkon brtsegs): sman chen bcom ldan 'das ye shes la 'jug pa blo dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa la skal cig/ rnab 'byor pa 'di ni byis pa ste/ yul la sred pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la lan 'ga' yang bskul bar ma byas so// 
87b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'brang 'di rnyed par dga' bdam pa'i chos dang phrad pa lang shin du rnyed par dgas bcom ldan 'das rtse bab pa zab pa'i gnas rnams bcom ldan 'das pa bral cig/ de nas sman rtson gyis bcom ldan 'das
87b3(dkon brtsegs): kyin pa ston ka'i dus kyi me tog pad ma'i tshal ltar rgyas pa mthong ngo // ma thong nas kyang sman chen dad pa skyes te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni chos 'chal ba lags na bde bar gshegs pa
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag la chos bstan du gas pa/ bskal ba'i mthar pa drug par yongs su mya na las 'das par gshegs pa zhig tu gyur na/ de'i spyad na sems can 'di dag gis las dge pa dang 'i dge ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pam la
87b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lan yongs su 'khyam par 'gyur du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen ngas tshigs su bcad pa byed kyi don ci phyir yang brag gi rtse me nas rang gi lus bor te dkar brtsal pa brgya spong du ma nyams su myongs
87b6(dkon brtsegs): srad can kyad ci dang 'dod pa dris shig dang ras myod pa la dkad // de s+yAd a bka' stsa nas/ bca ldan 'ad ldan cin kyis 'di skad ces nas pa'o// bam ldan 'das rnam par shes pa de'i rang bzhin ni lags/ 
87b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen snum pa 'an tsa mi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mi'i gribal chu'i nang du 'byung ba gas pa'am yin zhing migasal ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mig dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin gang
87b8(dkon brtsegs): dag thad zhi dang na//  chen gyisags mags na sred pa sasul dag pa dzan dam kyis pana' khyim pa/ byeng du drugapa mi mang pan cig ba
88a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phab dang / je lar mes ma long sa dang ge bzhin cig zugs pa na ma pang nga/ me long bud du dang dang ga ba zhin ci gzugs pa da da'i layong ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khalas 'di 'phos na dang ni
88a2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa rnam par shes pa'i khams des mtho dang // dben med bus lang gis nye sa 'amar ba 'am/ nyi mgung na 'dug pa lang mi mthong la/ mtshan mo yang klab 'char ba dang nub pa mi
88a3(dkon brtsegs): na mthong ba de bzhin du nam par shes pa'i khams 'di ba 'alus la mi snangango // sman chen pon kyang lus la sred pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / rab tushes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams sen te/ de yang
88a4(dkon brtsegs): lus 'di'i khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / zung po rnams phrad par byed pa yin no// de la gzugs can ci dnges pa gang yin pa ni 'di lta ste/ med dang / na' dang / sna dang / ro dang / skarnams so// no rab dang / sdug
88a5(dkon brtsegs): bcwapa dang / bde ba da / 'ad nams nigacag rnam yin pa das pa// de sa pa'i mas yi /  da /  bu'i pa tam da/ snang ba dang / rang da
88a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / bska ra// de'i sri 'a ga zugs can yin pa da ma pa ba ga zugs can yin no// de bzhin du byam 'di ba nga pa dang / rkang dang / gdang / khrag ni gzugs can yin ma/ zer ba gang yin pa don gzugs can
88a7(dkon brtsegs): mayin te/ gang gis rnam par smin pa dang / bsod rnams dang / bsod nams ma yin pakyang ba ni rnam par shes pa'o// de nas par srong gis com ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
88a8(dkon brtsegs): skad ces gsas te// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams dang / bsad nams ma lags paskyeng ba dgang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzang skyong de'i phyir nyon cig/ bden pa ma mthong bas ni nam
88b1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di'i bathong ste// da ni lags thel du sa ngur bzhag pa lazhen du 'bong bar nge 'thung ro// de de rig la yang reganas te/ mgolas kyang skyes pa pa nga bar yang mi 'akar ro// ba dang rlung de zhin gshegs pa gas
88b2(dkon brtsegs): klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin du ngas kyang gzugs can ma yin par thugs su chud de/ 'on kyang byis pa rnams kyis mi shes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams
88b3(dkon brtsegs): dpes bstan to// babang skyong 'din rnam par shes pa'i khams 'das bsod napas dang / bsod nams ma len pa ji lta ba bzhin du rig ste/ dper na mal la skes byed dam/ rjed byed dam/ dri ba'i gdon nam/ lha'i gden gyi
88b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur da zang srung 'di skam du sems/ thas de'i khong 'dun 'di rnas byed dag drib lag/ ltung stang sa/ gas tsha ba/ bcom ldan 'das dedo ni ma lags so// mide'i nad dam srad zin yadag don theg
88b5(dkon brtsegs): gdod de gzhi gzugs mamakyis 'i lags so// bzang skyed dper na lha'i gdon chen pos me tog shin tu dri nim pa dang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / me ho phreng byin pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams pa
88b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang ldan pas kyang dus blangs nas rgyal srid kyi dbang thug gas/ cir dben nyedang pa/ sku nyid bye du 'jug ste/ de mar darnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams kyi ba yin ni// ngi ltar bu'i gdon de bya'i
88b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyin pas rangs par 'gyur zhing mi de'i lus kyang tshim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug nyid la dga' bar 'gyur ning lus de yang rnam par 'gyur te/ de ltaran
88b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'di de bsod nams myang ba yin no// bzang stong dper daphrul ba'i gad na ma sdug cing gzugs mi snang ba po'i lus la gnas temo gtsacang ba dang / rus pa dang / ldan ljin dang / gtor thung nas 'babar
89a1(dkon brtsegs): gtang ma 'dod ci de la gton ma des dga' bar 'gyur la/ med lang gdon gyi dbang gis dring zhing megatsang ba las byung ba'i kha bas bcog padag pa chags shing dga' bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ma
89a2(dkon brtsegs): bags pa'i khams 'di yang bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba las ces kyi gnas dadapa bsred de/ dbul po'am/ ye gas ngan pa'am/ ldan ljin rab dag la chags shing dka' bar 'gyur te/ de lta na
89a3(dkon brtsegs): bar shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma len pa myong ba yang yin no// dper da lta'i gdon chen po gzugs med pa de lha'i longs spyod len pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams gzugs can ma len pa 'di yang
89a4(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gzugs can ma yin pas yongs su bzung nas lha'i lus rnams skyed par byed do// dper na sprul pa'i gdon gzugs med pa mo la gnas shing phyis dang / sngon lji nob par byed pa de bzhin du rnam par shes
89a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams 'di yang 'asod nams ma len par nye bar 'gro ba'i las rnams kyis skye gnas ngan par skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di ni bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro bar chang blta'o// 
89a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong de bas na khyod kyis gdon gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams lha 'ur blta'o// gdon gyi longs spyod pabazang ba dang ngan pa gang yin bded ni ga ba dang mi dge ba lta bur blta'o// mi gang
89a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni lus lta bur blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lus 'di lan ba'i rlung ltar blta bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni
89a8(dkon brtsegs): na gyi rkyen gyis 'dod pa len par byed de/ dper na gcub stan las kyang brten/ gtsub shing las kyang brten/ de skyed pa mi'i rtsol ba las kyang brten te me 'grub par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lus 'di len pa'i chu skyes pa da
89b1(dkon brtsegs): na sa ska padag dag ga rnamasas rnas pa da pa tha //  tos pa 'grus su thu bag na/ ca matad pa nga 'bras bu med migs pa 'bras bu thu
89b2(dkon brtsegs): lalas tog mi dalegs pa de bzhin du lus 'di las rnam par shes pa 'byung te/ 'on kyang lus de la yang rnam par shes pa mi snang sa rnam par shes pa ldag pas dus kyi ga pa dang na gang / med mar po dang / mi gtsang ba rnams nam
89b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jig par 'gyur ro// dper nas bo ni de me tog gi khadog dang / dri dang / re 'debs pa de bzhin du nang par shes pa'i khams 'dis kyang lus yongs su btang nas dge 'a dang me dge ba btab cing char ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
89b4(dkon brtsegs): yid 'a byed pa yang btab nas 'jig rten pa rol tu 'gro'o// dper na skyes pa dang bud med gnyis kyi dbang po gnyis phrad na dka' ba brlan te bud med pa zhin tu dam par 'khyud nas nyon mongs pa 'byin par byed de/ 
89b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa med par gyur na yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de gnyis la 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i 'de ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ der nyan mongs 'byung nas 'dod chags med par 'gyur te/ yang gcig la gcig 'dod
89b6(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dis lus deng phrad pa rnyed nas dga' bskyed nas chags pa 'phel bar byed do// dper na lus kyi rkyen gyis bud med kyi gzugs mthong na skyes pa'i
89b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags sbed la/ yang phrad pa las bral na phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'das grus ye su blang ma nas yang bor ta gzhan du 'gyur ba med par 'gyur ro// 'di la pha ma phrad pa dang / dri
89b8(dkon brtsegs): te bar gnas pa dang / las la dmigs pa'i dngas 'o las rnam par shes pas lus 'grub par byed de/ las de dag kyang gzugs can ma yin la skyes pa dang bud med kyi rkyen kyang 'ad yang gtsug
90a1(dkon brtsegs): ro//  da gyu/  rdzun 'am pa sa ga/ gas kyis 'dadas yin bshAn de shems da pa ba pa/ 
90a2(dkon brtsegs): na smra nga/  tu dang /  da pa pa me pa gnas // dzin pa de rjen zugs pa
90a3(dkon brtsegs): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// de'i yod pa ni dang ste/ bud med kyi dang pa yongs su 'dzin pasbed pa ste/ don zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
90a4(dkon brtsegs): du ba da//  seM sa chud de//  yang na du/  mas shi
90a5(dkon brtsegs): sa pa 'phrul pa/ da dbyer / 'dib rnas pa shes pa 'i mas 'dis chos gyi mas langs su thams la pa byed de/ 
90b1(dkon brtsegs): man no// de 'i rna bas mthong ba gang len pa de ni len pa zhes byas/ de bsanas pa'i len pa zhes bya'o// de'i lha'i lda ba bsod namasal dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan padas 'dadapa
90b2(dkon brtsegs): mas rjen gnas nga// daska /  sa ngas dang chags ts+tsha/ de skye bu ngas sa//  / 
90b3(dkon brtsegs): chags su rung zhing dran pa dang ldan pa'i srid pa rab tu shes so// dur khrod na 'dug pa'i khog pa de yang des mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 
90b4(dkon brtsegs): lharnapas kyi dang du skye ba yongs su len pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags so snyam so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das na
90b5(dkon brtsegs): ba shes gagazhin sa da kyiganas/ ga pa pa'i sred man/ ma 'an pas kyis bka' stsal pa/ snad cid dpa rnasel pa'i sgra pa lasu bregs te/ 
90b6(dkon brtsegs): de long nas mid 'di byal du sems te/ snga 'di dag di dri zhes gang gnag pa yin gyi 'di gni phyir yang mgol bskyed par bya'o snyam na/ bran chen 'di skab du sems/ 
90b7(dkon brtsegs): gas de da bganas pa 'di gnapa dado// dgad ces bka' gyus nas/ bcom ldan das pa snan ci kyis pang 'dis dmilags te// rnam par shes pa'i mas pra ni mi mngon
91a1(dkon brtsegs): dri grag nas pa ste/ ring dang 'dun mazungs pa rtsom skyes par med ci gas par byed na/ spyan chen 'di rig bdus pas/ rlung gi khams kyi nga bzhin de na/ radi'i rang
91a2(dkon brtsegs): sa / na sagasas pa/  ya shi ma sa skyes pa /  sa kyis /  / 
91a3(dkon brtsegs): rlung ngas kyi nyid sum padapa de ba dunam 'dugapapa de ba gan ci sas med pa bye ma chen po dag nga cung ngug cad byed par byed / blang sh+nu yang nam par shes pa nyi na/ 
91a4(dkon brtsegs): kan/ sa nga chu chen po rnams 'phrul par byedado// / daces bka' stsal nasam ldan 'das pa nakyis 'dis cas gsas te// 'tsham ldan 'das kyi gas/ dag
91a5(dkon brtsegs): can nagalags sa/ 'od te gzugs ma mchis pa zhig lags/ rang bzhin denges bu lags/ rkyen dong ste bu dag las bsti bar baH/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
91b1(dkon brtsegs): de sa da rdzu d+ha/  sa du/  ma /  nas dus so/  mas pa las da ga cin na
91b2(dkon brtsegs): gcigan pa shin nad pal nag gis sgrib pas bcus nyim de 'byen pa yang med/ lam mig gis mi gshos de la bkag pa yang mdapa pa yodod pas nyi mthu' ba ba shig gis
91b3(dkon brtsegs): gags ni rnyed pagacigagis ma da zhi dun 'dang sa dge pa'i tshas dadag pasgrub bya'o// ba tu dad mar thong 'i skab bzhin du dge bdang med ge zhin da blta bar bya/ 
91b4(dkon brtsegs): na na sa pa smin na 'dag / bdag dang sangs su smin pa yang ma'i 'bas kyi dbang gis 'thar ro// de nasums 'di 'das bdinams kyi dbang gis
91b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dag par 'byung ba canapar to// 'di gan sa da dbar gyu ta/  gas can gang yin padon pa sa nams kyi dper bstan to// dparan
91b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang na yang ma tog 'i snang shizhing ma tog gnang na yang 'bras bu mi dmigs la/ sa pan dang me tog kyang gnyis su dbyer med pa de bzhin du lus las kyang las 'byung las las kyang lus 'byung
92a1(dkon brtsegs): mod ci/ lus kyi na pan yang las 'i snang las kyi nang na nga lus mi dang ngo // dper na be sh+log yongs su smin pa na 'bras bu dmigs pa de bzhin du lus spen
92a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa dmigs so// dab nagan payon ga /  na du nga du sa 'a
92a3(dkon brtsegs): de lang ka zugs can ma yin la rnam par smin pa yang gzugs can ma yin no// dper na ma'i lus las gring bamigs pa ning gzugs can ma yin pa
92a4(dkon brtsegs): las rnams 'gro bar 'gyur te/ lus kyi dbang gis las rnams 'brang ba yang ma yin la lus med na yang las rnams skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ dper na snyan chab dang / kha 'dang
92a5(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa'i TIthag gis lam pa 'asu ldan btang na dud mams cad la la ba na zhi gA'i pado// ces pa pa ma pa snang bar gyu /  ra ldan mapa dang / 
92a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis lus kyi mdog gzhon shar 'dug pa dang / yid du 'ong ba sgrub par byed cing 'di snyam du mi 'dis ni sman pos gor la chag go snyam du shes par 'gyur yod ce/ sman de dag gi rod
92a7(dkon brtsegs): srin pade yang gzugs canas yin la dang sbyin pa gzugs can ma yin pa ma mdag rgyas pa la las snang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ dge ba'i las 'di la nga gzugs can ma len te
92b1(dkon brtsegs): de sa lus gab nas kha zas dang / nye bar spyad pa dang / longs spyod dang / gos kyi bye bra ka gi dbang gis rkang lag mnyam zhing mchog tu bde ba dang ldan te/ nor bu dang / gser
92b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ge dbang gis bzhin gyi mdog sngagapa 'am mi sngags snang la/ me yang gi gzugs brten yang ga zugs can ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi dbang gis rnam par
92b3(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'od lharna mas dang / sernams dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / bdags rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ sran chen las/

93a3(dkon brtsegs): sbal pa/ dug de ji ltar 'pho ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang lus yongs su spong zhing dbang po rnams kyang 'dod la khams rnams kyang yongs su gtong ngo // de ltar nam
93a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa 'idi dbang po rnams 'dor par byed do// snam chen gzhan yang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa 'didi ltar lus chen po yongs su 'dzin par bkyed ces zer ba ni sa
93a5(dkon brtsegs): khro lag chezhing rags pa'i lus 'di la mi sems pa bzhin te/ dper na ri'i rgyal por rab kyi 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la de yang klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyi
93a6(dkon brtsegs): this sa kres su yongs su dkris te/ klu'i rdul po de gnyis kyis dbugs phyi nang du skabs rgya mtsho btung du mi rung bar 'gyur shing de gnyis kyi dbugs kyis re rab kyang g.yo bar byed de/ 
93a7(dkon brtsegs): nyis de ltar dug chal sprob che zhing yangs pa bzhin du nor rgyas kyi bu dang / 'jog po gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o// sman chen 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la
93a8(dkon brtsegs): zang kyi yang gzhan tsam men de snang bal bar mi bya ste/ sngan chen 'di sar rnam par shes pa de nyid sbrang bu'i yang yin la de nyid de dag gi yang yi no// dbang na dug pangs rba ba dang /

93b7(dkon brtsegs): du sa bon de'i nang na yang shing mi snang la sa bon med na yang shing skye ba mi dmigs te/ ji ltar sa bon phra ma las shing chen po skye ba de bzhin du rnam par shes pa cha phra ba las gzugs
93b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par 'gyur te/ lus la yang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs la rnam par shes pa med na yang lus skye ba mi dmigs so// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar
94a1(dkon brtsegs): chen gyis la zhis kyis gsal to// bcom ldan das dri 'i snying po/  rnam par shes padres lus ma gung ba rnams ngasang mngon par 'grub par brjid/ 
94a2(dkon brtsegs): das kyis ga' stsal pa/ sgran chen dab na med bum pa zhis zhes yi / sbyin gyi ni badzin pa ma rnyedan/ des ying bzhin gyi rlo na gyim grangs nas ka'i gnas da / brtsed mas rgyal
94a3(dkon brtsegs): da / bskyed tshal dang / shing dang / rab dang / sgo khang dang / shing dgel ba dang / 'khri shing sna tshogs kyis 'khor ba dang / khang pa ma tog gis gtor ba dang / rdzas dang /

94a8(dkon brtsegs): chom ldan 'das ri ni rang bzhin gyis ma grangal rdo rnga ltar ba tan zhing sra ba lags la/ che ba ni rang bzhin gyisa'ang ma ning reg na bde ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de
94b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dun pa par shes pa rang bzhin kyis ldanabs lus chen pa dag bye ste 'gro ba 'gyur ro// gsol ga bcom ldan 'das de ltar sems can gyi ris nas/ sems can shi 'phos te lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba len
94b2(dkon brtsegs): sa/ des dbems cad dmyal ba nasas su sgrub yongs sulan pa grus/  ldan 'das kyis bka' grub /  rgyun pa'i phyir nyon gyi// sem pa can pa she sanas pa bstonams kyi
94b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i'adu byed kyis yongs su zin na lus yongs su btang nas rnam par shes pa des mi'i lta ba yongs su spangs te lnga'i lta ba thob par 'gyur ro// de d+ha'i lha ba des 'dod pa na spyod pa drug gi lha rnams mthong
94b4(dkon brtsegs): sems cad dmyal ba chen po brgyad kyang mthong ngo // lus de yang 'dor bar mthong ngo // 'arnangs kyi lha'i gnas dang / dga' tshal dang / 'dres tshal dang / me tog gin rkyen dang /

94b6(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / gas ma dang / gsal dang /  rnams zlas pas tshan pa dag ca sa // na gzhod dudas ma bang jug cing med po'i mthong ngo / 
94b7(dkon brtsegs): da/ mthong nas kun tu chags pa skyed do// de dang kun du chags pa pa dpa' ba thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bathob pas yed rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// de snying dgar bas de'i tshe lus kyi kha dog rgyas par 'gyur
94b8(dkon brtsegs): / 'di ltar bzhin gyi mdog pazlas bur snang bar 'gyur shi lnga 'a phyin cim log par 'gyur ro// sA yang yo bar me gyung / rol pa yang marnam par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chog yung ba la sngon po'i ma
95a1(dkon brtsegs): ma 'dra bar snang bar thung ba'i gdang rnams kyang 'chad par mi 'gyur/ de'i khrag kyang zag par mi 'gyur/ phyis yang 'byung bar mi 'thungar// de spu yang zhes byed par mi rgya

95a3(dkon brtsegs): na chen de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe lha'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ba khang pa brtsegs pa ka ba brgya stong gis pa rgyan pa mthong ste/ lu'i dril bu g.yong ka'i dra ba smra snyan pa 'byung ba dang ldan pa dang /

95b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sku gzugs mthong na yid ches shing dang bskye bar 'bar/ gnyen sdug pa dgas yo na gzhig nas phyir 'ongs pa'am/ ring mo nag tu gud na 'dug 'dug pa bzhin du mgul nas 'khyud cing yang

97a2(dkon brtsegs): 'o// de sar mi la la mi dmag tshogs kyis 'angags shing sba na ga/ zhon// 'bras pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa 'ad shi'i be nas na mirnas pa zi cing dang oM d+hA'i steng na pa
97a3(dkon brtsegs): grong nas shin tu byung bar skye ba yongs su len to// sman can gzhan yang dang po shi'aphos nas/ de nga ma skyes pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa stir ba/ ba bya zhes gang byed kyis smras pa de ni dper ni mi gri
97a4(dkon brtsegs): nga gzugs kyang naH/ dag zugs su gtogs pa yang bsdub pa'i bya'o// man chen ban mang lag mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i gzug pa rgya'i snying du ba pa ga ni driba'am/ za pa'am lu
97a5(dkon brtsegs): nga ba med cing lus del mi sha'i dam bu yang med do// grib ma de la ni khams kyis blangs pa yang med do// mir gzugs brnyan chu'i nang du byung ba ngogs ni sdug bsngal ba'i sgra'am/ ya pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang med pa/ 
97a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang po shi 'phos nas lus kyi khog pa bor te gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa lta bur 'gyur ro// sman chen de ltar na rnam par shes pa bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba ni lha rnams kyi nang du
97a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su len par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sman chen gyis 'di skad ci la gas la to// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa sems can dmyal ba rnams rung
97b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su len pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sman chen pa song rnams ma yin pa 'a bar sa zla ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye ba yongs su len pa de nyon cig/ slar chen 'dil sems can
97b2(dkon brtsegs): las mi dge bas yongs su zin pa ni sems can rdzi ris nas pachi 'dzi ste/ 'i'abol pa de di tham du mi ning nyid yin te/ sems can dmyal ba don pa shi byabs so// 'dig nyis ni bdag bri pa ma yin no sus
97b3(dkon brtsegs): / dran pa skye'o// shi 'phos pa de'i khrus de ni tha mal pa'i gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyi rnam pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ yan lag skyes pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba nyid du snang ngo // dang po shi 'phos pa de mya ngan gyis g.yengs nam
97b4(dkon brtsegs): ra myal pa sna tshogs srang 'a mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa dang po shi'i phos pa de'i las sems can dmyal ba dang 'brel par 'thar te/ phrogs la cig na ni sems can dmyal ba'i sna bzhi khrag gis gtor ba mthong nas de nga
97b5(dkon brtsegs): gsas byud par 'gyur ro// chags par gyur na sa sems cad myal ba lus 'grub par 'gyu te/ de'i rnam par shes pa dalas kyi rkyen ci bang gis su'i dzin bu shin tu rul cing ga shis pa ma
97b6(dkon brtsegs): rang bus ste la yongs su len te/ dper nam gtsang ba dang / ldan ldan ma nam po'i chen gyis srin du skye ba dang / naper mgoso / glang ci nga / char mnam po dgyur pa'i phyir srog chags skye bar 'gyur ro// bran chen de bzhin du sams
97b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams sems can dmyal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ @
97b8(dkon brtsegs): gi rnam pa'i 'ayul gas/ phus rtse rnam pa na de ltang bur 'grub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'abul pa/ bzang skyong dang khrag ga nang du skye ba gang yin pa de dag mi khrag gi mdog 'dra bar 'gyung bar 'gyur ro// chu
98a1(dkon brtsegs): rna sa pa zhes dus pas me sa na chu /  sa gsag ga rnam
98a2(dkon brtsegs): gnon du 'de dag 'i thod sa pa ltang bzhan gcan du 'gyur ro/ kha
98a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ci dag la bde bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sran chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag kha bas ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan
98a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ skye chen sems can dmyal ba dan ngag yongs su 'khyam ma shin ta rgya ring ba nas sangs dang gan dmar por snang ba mthang par 'gyur te/ dedag yod nas la bas kyi mi 'dod par byed de/ 
98a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa byed du shog cas pa do// dedag gnan pa 'brangs ta sem pa bzed nas pa sa dang / na bcom pa gas pa de nga sde gas nis khyim pa bcang cing bas dang ban bzlas pa'i 'alas dadag 'dod pasas
98a6(dkon brtsegs): gdangs te zang sa dang gan ba par byed do// de dag yongs dang dag na rab tu 'bar 'das lu du chu rab tu 'bar shing log pa rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// snum chen de dag khabs 'dra bas bslus nas sdug bsngal shin tu tshe
98a7(dkon brtsegs): myong ba gyur // sman can sems can dmyal banga'i sems can dag gi rnanam par shes pa de rusu pa'i lus dag la gnas par 'gyur zhing dus pa'i chags dang 'dral bar mi 'gyur to// sems cin dkyil 'a
98b1(dkon brtsegs): nas pa ga / seM ma can pa yongs pa'i daphyogs dag sa da pa mthongs/  ga sa pa snyed po cas gas nas meng sa nad byus pa da'i pa byed mo chal 'din na 'a pa 'i bar ba'ang ba/ 
98b2(dkon brtsegs): ces zer te/ de dag 'dus nas slar bgyur bar bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du 'phra'o// de dag de'i na 'du sa nas lung ma nig sa de ba'i 'du shes snad do// de dag gis shing de dag las byung ba'i me tog de dag dpa/ 
98b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag la gring 'gyur te/ ral gri de dag gis de dag gis yan lag gcod cing gshegs par byed de/ da gar la kris bcad nas nyam thal pa'i sgra chen po 'byin par byed cing phyogs phyogs
98b4(dkon brtsegs): lA gA ts+tsha'i gshin rje 'i shA langs ma shA shin brdzu sa pa ba ni mnga'ab 'i phreng bas phyog pa mtshan pa /  'dzin ma kyi kying tso pa
98b5(dkon brtsegs): srog kyang dgi ba gas bskangs ma 'dirnams ba gyis shig 'dzi te/ spyan me da ldan sems can rgyal ba 'i sems can rnams skyong sgrub pa 'gyur // skyon chen gzhan 'a pazhig bdun ma ma
99a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'atshal// gtan drug pa yongs susu rnas thabs can myal dag tu na du gnasal zung cing dug ma ras kyis mam mdza ma ma da ma kyi phrin du
99a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis pa bzhin du shin tu byung bar skyeb la las te/ se nga bdag nyin kyim lan sa zhags papa btags pa gas so// 'bang stong da sems can dbral par semams rnarnams sa skye bar 'gyur zhing ltar
99a3(dkon brtsegs): pacu'i bye brag dag 'byung bar 'gyur ngo ro// de nas pazang skyong su 'i shes byed nas la pa mo sbyang te/ bcom ldan 'das la sgrubs su sod // rgyal ba'i bu gzhan du sman chen gyis kyang 'di skad du dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'ang
99a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dag la bo sa nas 'khor ba'i tshe log par ltung ba'i chos can du ma gyur cig/ bdag sems can dmyal ra rnams su sme ba yongs su len par mgur cig ces smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la babang skyong
99a5(dkon brtsegs): dwe nad ces gsol to/ yang bcom ldan 'dasas bdaga' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gyul pa/ bzang stong ci dang kyi 'as bzhin du 'dod badris shig/ pacang myong gis gsol ga bamam ldan 'das pas
99a6(dkon brtsegs): dgang lags/ klungs pa ni gang lags/ sang po rnams ni gang lags/ 'pho ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ dalang skyeng 'di la khams phrang pa'i phyir khams bzhi po dag gis lus 'grub pa
99a7(dkon brtsegs): dang// shes rab dang // khadag 'de dang / mjig pa dang / kham pa dang / spyod dul dang / rnam par shes pa nams ni bsags panas bya'o// des spongs pa mi ngams ldan pa nyid dang / skyemached kyi snyid su badrug dang / 
99a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gsum dang / snye mched can pa'i skuganyis dang / sra dang // kha su nga/ san mongs pa sdu pa/ lpags pa dang / sha dang / nag dang / ma bris pa dang / bdagan dang / snabs dang / tshil dang / rgya ser dang / 
99b1(dkon brtsegs): mig dang / ya pag dang / nyid lagatshogs pa la dngas pazhes bya'o// pe 'bru spangs pa 'ad te/ nas dang / te sa dang po dang / yon dran sde mang pol spangs pa nas bya ba de bzhin du lus kyi yan lag dang ny-i lag tu
99b2(dkon brtsegs): slo la drug yinano// de la mas kyi nga bzhin gsum ga nas/ 'dis 'dod cags dag she 'a dang / ga mug ces bya ba'o// da me dug nyid kyi kunan 'angs gsas ga ma rung dang mkhrim pa dang/ 'a
99b3(dkon brtsegs): ben pa'i d+haganyis gan/  tshul khrims dang ngas dang / gnyi / rang dag brtson 'grus dag/ nying /  dang / mi ge bams byaba'o//  @
99b4(dkon brtsegs): gags/  tshor bdag / 'dug pa dag / 'ang byed dpas dang / nam par shes pazhes byab ldazhi pa 'di gnag sa na sbyin pa'i rnamapa // de la tshang ba ni thong ba'o// 'dunas ni shes pa/ 
99b5(dkon brtsegs): / dang sdug bsngal ni 'du byed rnams so// ska ba dang nyan pa dang / bsdom pa dang / ro myang ba dang / reg bya rnams rig pa ni rnam par shes pa ste/ dngos po thams cad kyi khongs su gtogs pas na lus la dbang ba'i dbang phyug dang
99b6(dkon brtsegs): na pa rang 'thad pa yin no// de la 'phob zhes bya ba ni rdul khrims shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / lus dang ngag gi las kyi 'bras bu thob pa 'chi ba'i dus byed pa gang yin pa de'i tshe rnam par shes pa des phung po rnams yangs
100a1(dkon brtsegs): buganan pa lang srid par mi spron daphyir mi rdzog pas na shi sa 'ad ba bzhing 'gro / btsam pa 'i bye tho can pa'i napa de bu ni de'i 'pho 'gyur bayin no// denas kyang sno dang
100a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzun sa tsu kyi sngal brgya nas bsam na pa yin ces/  sa rgyun pas ma man nam ma pa da pa
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di legs par gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bzang skyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te/ 'di'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas rig pa ma yin no// shas ra
100a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba 'di ni dkar ba sbya rgya stong du mas bsrubs pa ste/ 'di na ngab ji skad bstan pa de kho na bzhin no// chos kyi nyi ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid snang bar byed pa/ yon tan kyi grags pa rgyas par byed pa/ thams cad
100a5(dkon brtsegs): khyen pa'i ye shes sna 'tsho'i mdzod sems can rnams kyi rgyud 'dul bar byed pa 'dul bsten pa 'di yul gang na gnas sam/ de ston par 'gyur ba de ni mim yin pa rnams srung bar byed de/ sma dang / lA ma yin dang / lto bya ma
100a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams sdug bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyurang ngo// chos kyi ras grang sa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ban mtshan gyi 'jigs
100a7(dkon brtsegs): gang bar mi 'gyur/ dug gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ ma'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / chu dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed kyis deng phan chang ma dang pa rnams la bshadas
100a8(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// sran ka chol ba rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu pa rnams la ma yin/ gcer bu pa'i nyan thos rnams la ma yin/ gnas gzhan la zhugs pa la bshad par mi byar// ma dres par yang bshad par mi bya'o// de bas ma
100b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyu bar bya bzhin gshegs par 'dul pa byas pa tur ro// dge song ba kyis gnas pa gang lal pa 'de rtogs pa de ni phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du zhus pa bskyed par bya ni
100b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod ji mchen ga rgyas pal// nas la rgya 'dus kyi rjo ldan byuba'ab 'di da ces paka' gyul to//  ma 'is shA ma// sa // ban
100b3(dkon brtsegs): 'astsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rnam par shes pa'apho ba zhes bya bar zung shig/ bzang skyong gis zhugs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ sangs rgyas bstan

100b5(dkon brtsegs): ma la sa kying da sa pa 'dul nas/ rgyal 'guganadu su can dang / tshong son pa pa b+h+ya / 'a dag mi g-i lamakhyen da rna sapa/ d+hI bcas pa'i ngogarten le mas te/ bcim
100b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pal mngan par bstod // 'phags pa yon mchog bcogs pa chen pa chos kyi rnam grangs le'u sang brag brgya sa rjod pon payang myong gis zhus pa'i la zhes bya ste sam btsun bcub// rdzogs pa/ 
100b7(dkon brtsegs): kyimakha pe dzin tra dang / su rin dra bo rdzi dang / zhu chen gyi lo rtsub pan de ye shes sdes ru te
101b1(dkon brtsegs): ga nyis ba ba gyub/ se thams sa dngas pa'an tshig ba byu ba yang 'i ma pa 'i snang bya ba kyis 'a dum kyi can pa dzin na khams kyar
101b2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khor mang po'i dbus su chos ston par mdzad do// de na brgyal ba gsapa rgyal gyi bu 'onam dag dang pa zhes bya ba gzhan nu ma byod bzhin sdu bcir mdzes pa/ sems can rnams kyis mthong bar smos pa/ sngod dge pa
101b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/  na tho sams bzhig yong pa bu mo gzhon nu ba lnga brgyas yongs su bsta te/ ma sonas gser gyi byung ba nogs nas thob byar mnyan yod nas byung ste/ rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dgas
101b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa spyibs gtugs te phyag byas nas/ lan gsum bskong ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan dur phyogs gcig tu 'bod na mtshigs su bcad de mngon par bathong pa/ ya ring bso napas rnas
102a1(dkon brtsegs): phrin sa sums sa// yan tan nam ma pa pas myong sa ngogs shing / bang po dang mos dgang bar ma dad pasas/ de grang la mchog sangs bdag phyag la// ga'i byid gas sems rgyan
102a2(dkon brtsegs): byung ba chos pa yang //  pa kyi sa ga rtagags // na pa sa pa'i dzi pa smra/  sngon nams pa / me rdzog
102a3(dkon brtsegs): na ces sags/  sa ya sa chogs pas sa padas bla ma ga sa dag pa shing na/ 'dis na can ma thugapa rnams
102a4(dkon brtsegs): gcig bzhin// mkhyen pa dag gis spyod rnams rab mkhyen pas// 'dren mkhan bzhin du mnyam pa'i shUpa yang sbyin// rab rten brtson 'grus ldan pa mchis gyur na/ 
102a5(dkon brtsegs): bas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang lags pa// dang zhin gshegs pas bkas ni ba shad du gsoso// riglang rab brtan stobs ne po 'gyur nas// 'khor bar gnas kyang bdud dpung pa ma bgyid lags
102a6(dkon brtsegs): chos ni thob 'gyur zhing // ngi la sems can yongs su smin bgying lags// ji sdang bgyis nas gzhi nam mkha' dang / drung dang mu ma ri b+ha bzhin du 'gyur/ ri ltar yid ches thobo nas chos gnas shrI
102a7(dkon brtsegs): ba seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du bkung // ji ltar byams spang sems ni yangs spangs nas/ sems gcang drang la g.ye sbrum mchis 'gyung / de ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims bdod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtam
102a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol lce 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyon mongs su dpa rab bcom nas/ rtag par thabs cher la ni gnas pa dang // ting 'dzin gzungs la thags pa ma mchis shing / tshad med pazhi dang mngon shes lnga lagan
102b1(dkon brtsegs): ster sangs rgyas spyan sngar gnas gar nas// rtag par brdzus te skye zhing tsha rabs dan// sbyangs pas rtsod pa ma mchis dpon gnas nas/ sems ni rab brtul nyon mongs ni bgyid dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing byang
102b2(dkon brtsegs): khalamathos nga// bdu 'ga'athab ba dang pa 'jams pa nga// thad su mchas kyi ma tsham mo tha ga de dri ba da pa la sa ne bsapa sa sha sal// danas bcom ldan das kyis batshanas da pal
102b3(dkon brtsegs): ka' stsal pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' gang stobs rnam pa btang dab thun par gyur na 'khor ban gnas kyang rab tu brtan pa'i dpa' bos bcu zhing yongs su ngal ba med par 'gyur ro// brgyad ga shan/ dang po
102b4(dkon brtsegs): / kyis 'dun pa'i stobs te g.yo sku med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni mos pa'i stobs te/ sdig pa rnams spong bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsum pa ni sbyor ba'i stobs te/ rtag tu dge ba bsgrub pa'i phyir ro// ban pa ni mdzan
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ches pa'i stobs te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dag la shin du mngon par yid ches pa'i phyir ro// lnga pa ni byang chub kyi sems kyi stabs te/ thel pa dman pa yongs su mi tshol ba'i phyir te// drug pa'i byams
102b6(dkon brtsegs): thob ba te/ sems can la gnong pa med pa'i byor ro// bdun pa'i phyis can pam gabs ta pa nad pa byas pa rnams dang dayin par byed pa'i byeng do// brtad pa'i dge 'i bsheb da kyi smrab pa pa/ dus dus
102b7(dkon brtsegs): sa bar byed pa'i phyir ro// bu mo di ni stobs nas pa brgyad ces byaste/ byang chub sems dpa' yang stobs brgyad po 'di dag dang ldan par blor na rab tu bstan pa'i dba'ar
102b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs po med par 'byung ngo // danas bcom ldan 'das kyis yo tshogs su bca bka' sum pa// sems 'dun pa' ba gang yin pa// g.ye spyad ga ni slong byed cing // rtag par drang bar spyod pas ma lang
103a1(dkon brtsegs): da krung chu ba gzhos par 'grug// mos pa'i gabs ni gang yin pa// nyas pa mang pa gang byed cing // dge 'a'ada' sheg sbyong pasan// yang dag brtson pa gnas par byung// rtos
103a2(dkon brtsegs): / sangs rgyas ye shes med rjes shing // jig rten yongs su srung ba 'i gyur// byang chub sems stobs gang yin de sa// dazag pa ldan pa spod byed cing // sangs rgyas gdung ni mi gcod pas// chos nyi
103a3(dkon brtsegs): deganas par 'gyur// byams chen stobs kyi dbang gis ni// sems can snyoms par lta byed cing // khyams sdang dag ni med pas na// zhe sdang gnod sems skyed mi 'gyur// snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni/

103a5(dkon brtsegs): chub la ni gnas par 'gyur/ dpa' bo gang yin de dag gis/ stobs brgya shingadi dag tho bathur na// byang chub sring por 'dug na ni// bdud pa mang po bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang bum byang chub sem
103a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par gyur na mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro// brkyad gang nan dang po ni sems can thams ca mnyam par chung ba ste rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'i phyir ro// gnyis pacwa
103a7(dkon brtsegs): dben pa'i phyir ro// gsu mang ni gang thams cad mnyam par gyur ba snyen stong pa nyid kyi khams su 'jug par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// bzhi pa ni de bzhin pa
103b1(dkon brtsegs): yul sa pa byed// ban ldan mams pa'am pa / sems sam dang 'dus par byed so// btud pa ni bdudu nams nyam pa gyur sa/ nyin mongs pa thog pa med migs pa'i

104a5(dkon brtsegs): gtong / rnyed pa thob kyang rang mi mthong // brnyas shing smad kyang mapon badzin med// rlung brgyad kyis ni mi spyod pas// byams sdang dgo nom skye zhing / bdag gam gal te gzhan yang rung / 
104a6(dkon brtsegs): shes yongs me skyed// 'du shes rnams ni rab spangs nas// snod yu ba dag la len pa med// tag par rang gi lus rtogs pas// lus srog dag la phangs pa med// mkhas rnams sdug bsngal bde ba yis
104a7(dkon brtsegs): yos par mi 'gyur nam mkha' bzhin// nyon mongs legs par rtogs byed na/ bdag dang bdag gi gnyis ga spong // srong 'dzin rtag par sa 'dra bas// byams sdang dag ni yongs mi stong / gzhan yang nga
104a8(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa' chos rnam pa btud dang ldan na 'khor bas yongs su ngal bar ma 'gyur ngo // brgyad dang zhen/ dab pa'i rtsa ba yang shing rgya che ba'i phyir dang / sems can la so sor rtog par byed pa'i phyir dang // nyag par
104b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa rnams pathong zhing mdzod pa'i phyir dang sangs rgyas kyi ning chud med pa rnams mthong ba'i phyir dang / rtag par yangs rgyas kyi mastan pa yongs su gnyed ba'i phyir dang 'khor bachi lam lta burab tu rtogs kyi
104b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / chos kyad pa nas lagras pa sang pa'i steng dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang skyen mtha' dang yang dag pa'i maba' la sa sor rdzog pa'i phyir ro// den sa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang chags su bcad de bka' stsal pa// nang 'dzu
104b3(dkon brtsegs): gang sgom pa// dge slong ston 'phan drim meng // bar snang rlab rnam dag bzhin// sdug bsngal sems can stsol bar byed// yon tan nams ni bisdu ba'i phyir// 'khor bas yongs su ngas mi 'grung // sems can dang
104b4(dkon brtsegs): da cing // rab bstan btsun 'grus spyong bar byed// sangs rgyas zhing ni tshad med du// sangs rgyas rnams ni pus mchod pas// dpyir stobs bcu gang ldan pa/ 'khor bas yongs su pa mi 'gyur/ 'jig ter chad ma
104b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag sad du/ bsam gyis mi lce tshom ldan cing / dkon margyag gsum gyi ga du mi bcod// tshes rgyal nyid du mngon 'chang rtsa// tshul khrims dam pa gang srung ba// 'khor bas ngal par mi 'gyur shing // 
104b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gang yin pa// rmil ma snyen dang brog par shes// chos las ganga'ig rnam grol ba// 'khor bas yongs su la mi 'gyur// byang chub la ni dab gnas shing // dga' ba'i rnams kyi rtag tu 'a // thabs kyi
104b7(dkon brtsegs): rol gang phyin pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur// rtag par dam chos sgrub pa yang // bar snang zla bzhin 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan gang mos pa// 'khor bas yongs su ngal mi 'gyur/ 2
104b8(dkon brtsegs): ra kyang / rtag par yang dag mtha' la gnas/ yud tsam shes rim rjes 'thun pa/ 'khor bdag gis ral mi 'gyur// gzhan lang bum
105a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya ga she/ sems sa dang madrang ba gang ba'i shed dang / sems chus mtshungs par dgyu 'i sde dang / mas me dang batshungs par gyur ba'i phyi sa/ sems rlung dang mang
105a2(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa'i phyir dang / sems nam mkha'ang mtshungs pa du gyu pa'i phyir dang / sems chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i byer dang / sem sarnam par grol ba dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir dang / sam
105a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs par gyur pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni sems kyi khams mnyam pa nyid rnamapa brgyad ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sems nas
105a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs pas na/ thams cad khung du khyer bar byed// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'ang rung // 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med/ sems ni tu dang mtshungs pas na// drim mi gnangal du byed cing // 'jig rten rnam
105a5(dkon brtsegs): // gnas pa med cing rten med par// tshul khrims thos pa'i dri yis ni// dus gsung kun rtsuzab par byed// sngams ni nam mkha' mtshungs bas na/ ba tho nang rnam par dag / tham
105a6(dkon brtsegs): cad kun du 'jug byed kyang // bdud kyi rjes su 'byung mi byed// sems ni chos dbyings mtshungs bas na// bdi 'i nyid du rab gonas shing / 'bral ba med cing 'gri ba med pa p+pa tag par mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ 
105a7(dkon brtsegs): bathob bur kyang // 'che ba dag kyang yod min la// grol ba dag kyang yod pa min// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro med ce pa// rab dben nyer gyi
105b1(dkon brtsegs): sa shrI/ dus gsus kun du 'tho bar byed// gdun ya ma chos rnam pa bca da nga ldan pa'i byang chub sems ni byang chub sde 'byung gnas du 'gyur ro// brgya ga nas/ dang pa ni sbyin pa byung ba
105b2(dkon brtsegs): dra byung ba yin te/ ci 'dog pa rnams yongs su gtong ba'i phyir ro// gnyis pa ni rgyal khrims 'byung gnas su myur ba yin te/ nyams pa med pa'i phying ro// gsum pa ni bzad pa 'byung gnas su tu~Md pa min te/ 
105b3(dkon brtsegs): dmed pa'i phying do// bzhi ba ni brjon 'grus pabyung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ la lo med cing rlu ba med pa'i sbyor ro// lnga pa ni bsam gtan 'byung gnas su gyung du yin te/ thabartsal mkhas pa'i phyir ro// da
105b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gas sa gyu pa chen to/ tshu ma khrims ni mang dums pa dang gyi do//  skye smra 'thung khyong po sbyin te/ rnam par grol pa ldan pa pa
105b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo // bcung ba ni mngon par shes pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin te/ rtag par mnyam par bzhag par rab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// rtag pa
105b6(dkon brtsegs): na pa gang gtong ba// 'dod chags gdung ba spong bas na/ 'bras bu rnam smin mi bar// sangs rgyas byang chub bsngo bar byed// khrims ldan theg pa che ba'i phyir/ bcad cing gtubs kyang khong khro med// 6/ 
105b7(dkon brtsegs): cig 'de chen gnyer byed cing // khag chags spangs nas 'ashog mngon med/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus can// bskal mang sems can ched du ni/ sdug bsngal bzod cing 'jig rten nu// brtson 'gru
105b8(dkon brtsegs): sa ni 'phel bar byed// bsam gtan dag ni gang sgom pa// spros pa rnams ni spong byed cing / bsam gtan pha rol phyin gyur kyang // bsam gtan rjes su yod mi skye// shes rab chen po mtshungs med pas
106a1(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams ni song bya yid // 'jig rten mang can rig panas// gti mugs rnapa mams sa/  tshangs gnas gang thom pa// ngan po ma ni grangs pasan// 
106a2(dkon brtsegs): tubyin tshangs bar shad// dan kye phan pa gan tan la// mngan shes sangs rgyas shi gyus/ sangs rgyas na pa chos kyang can// nga bzhin thos par bshes pas/ chos gangasams na/ 
106a3(dkon brtsegs): / gzhan yang bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ni chos brgyad dang ldan pa'i phyir grazungs dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ chos 'abla mar byed pa'i phyir dang / mkhan pa
106a4(dkon brtsegs): dpon pa rim gro byed pa'i phyir dang / chos yongs su gnyer ba la skyo ba med pa'i phyir dang / ji skad thos pa bzhin du yang dag par ston par byed pa'i phyir dang / chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes
106a5(dkon brtsegs): gos par mi byed pa'i phyir dang / chos smra ba dag la mkhan po bzhin du gus pas srin byed pa'i phyir dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi mthong shing nyes pa spang bar skul bar byed pa'i phyir te 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos
106a6(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i thob par 'byor ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pang tshigs su ba cing de bka' sum po/ ce gcig rtag tu chos gnyer ba// ma
106a7(dkon brtsegs): 'ge ba shes sem gro byed// sdig pa'i grogs po spong bas na// me bdag ter 'dzin theb par 'gyur// mang thos yongs su su med par// rang brtson mos ni gnyer bar byed/ ji skad thos payin ston byed pal// dad pa
106a8(dkon brtsegs): thob pa// 'khor mang dga' bar byed pas na// chos smin pa la rab mos shing // ser sna phrag dog spong bar byed// chos spyod mngon par nan med cing // ga rungs ni gang
106b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ba las brdzus te steb coM ri// btso ga shin/ grogs pabs kyi dbyung gzhan gyi shes pa me ba da sems can mas mchogs supa sa skyabs su 'gro ba thal ba dang / mas
106b2(dkon brtsegs): ar 'god pa dang / tshangs ngar spyad pa la gos pa med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag byas nas par ma gdan la 'jog pa dang / dmas nad byang byang ba shin kyang na la bar byed pa dang / 'angs theng la dag
106b3(dkon brtsegs): dug par bdag nyid dman par byed pa dang / gzhan la 'che bar ma byed pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang chags su ba cadad bka' stsal ba// gal ta sdug bsngal gcer gyur kyang // nam yang gan
106b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rtag par dgon mchog gang bsngags pa/ sang sa cas sman sngar dus te bye/ byang chub sem pa ni bskyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyend pa gnyer bsdus na la/ rtag par tshangs par byeng spyod pa/ sa mas ldan par du
106b5(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi sangs rgyas gzugs bstan te/ rin chen badra'i gdan la banag// sems can mya ngan gang sarapa// sangs rgyas spyan par rngus te mye tus byed pa de dag la// slob ma bzhin du bdag man zhing / gaganas sa/ 
106b6(dkon brtsegs): gse chag sangs rgyas spyan sngang rngus te ste// gzhan bu ma byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam pa brgyad dang ldan par tha na byings pa'i min tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur shi dag par dgan pa na gnas pa mams sa
107a1(dkon brtsegs): gyung // brgyad ga shen/ da bachung ba dang / chog gas padapa lan pa'i chos yangs sa ngogs pa gyung ba ga dgebs bdag nyidags par byed padang /  pag // 
107a2(dkon brtsegs): yos su chen pa dag / la pa'i sa misas nga sa 'amang matam par byu dang / rgan pa yi sa pa dang / smran pasngal ba pa thong pa dang / bdag mad pa dang /  la shin bdu ni gzhan gyi
107a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jog pa gang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su 'chad de bka' stsal pa/ 'dod pa chung shing chog shes pas// chos dga' dge mang bdag nyid gso// rtag par 'phags rigs sgrubal mos/ 
107a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sems la skrag/ sbyangs pa das patal mos pas// khas dugacig ltar thogs kya med// 'dus byas sdug bsngal bdag med ces// zla yis rab dang brtson 'grus gnas// chos mdzo
107a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi chos mi 'brang // a pa dben gnas sangs rgyas bsngags// sbyangs pas thag bsgrengs gdung ba med// rtsod pag sa dmigs mang po med/ gnyen pa shes yongs spangs bsngags parjod// desan na
107a6(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas la mos// gzhan yang yul byang chub sems dpa' chi chos rnam pa brgya dngang ldan pa'i phyir bdud kyi dpung rab tu pham par byed do// brgyad gang zhe na/ rabo nyid stong pa nyid lazhugs pa dang / mtshan ma med
107a7(dkon brtsegs): / la mngon par mid ches pa dang / smon pa med pal mngon par mid ches pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par rab tu shes pa dang / de la the tshom dang som nyi med pa da skye ba med par rab tu bzod pa dang / ngo bo nyid med
107a8(dkon brtsegs): rab tu rtogs pa dang / thabs la mkhas pas chos thams cad la co sor rtog cing de bzhin nyid 'jig par mi skyed pa yang yin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal paka/ stong dang / 
107b1(dkon brtsegs): can med dang ldan med pa// rnam par gsus pab pa dadapung bab 'jom// 'dus kyang 'du min mtshan na dganyis su med// bre ma shor ba rnam par tshal bar 'a pa/ sa rnams bya ma dbang gang ba ga/ nga
107b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug lung bya ma par byed/ byed med ga me da dang su pos pa la rgyas dratshamam me gams da 'phe la mapas// chos rnams pa kyi las shes ga byed pa// ma
107b3(dkon brtsegs): / ras bdud ni bam par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kar bstod cing / yang dang stong la gnas pa med par ni// de kyar tshams chog gang zhig sro ma byed pa// thabs mkhas gzugs lus mnges pa 'tho' par 'gyur// gas
107b4(dkon brtsegs): nga ma chub sems dpa' ni tshas rnam pa brgya dang ldan pa'i phyir byang chub dang / rnam pa 'bral 'angang 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhen/ yang dag pa'i lta bas yos par bya ba'i sems can/ sangs su smin par byed pa dang
107b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dren pas log par sems pa'i sems can la snying brtse bar byeng ba dang / yang dag pa'i dag gis log par sla rnams pa snying sa khyed pa dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mthas log pa'i las can rnams yongs su srung
107b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol bas log par rtsol ba rnams yongs su zlog pa dang yang dag pa'i 'tsho bas log par 'tsho bar sems cad rnams spong bar mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa bas log par yid la byed pa spong bar byed
