182b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'thung ba yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir yin gyi lus brgyan pa'i phyir ni ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dab la nan tan gyis gnas pas gis gtsang ma la mngon par dga' ba med de/ des phyig dar gyi phung
182b7(dkon brtsegs): thod pag sa 'du shes gnyis bskyed par bya'o// nyis gang na// chog shes pa'i 'dugs dang / sakus pa'i 'du shes so// gzhan yang 'du shes gnyis bskyed pa bya ste/ gnyis gang sa
182b8(dkon brtsegs): dartsal ma pa'i 'du shes dang / 'phags pa'i gas pa garnas pa'i 'dugs so// gzhan yang 'dug sa gnyis bgyid par byaste/ gnyis gang zhen/ lus brtson padang / rnamam gcing pag 'ad su
183a1(dkon brtsegs): te dge slong phyag dang grod pa pas rgyag dang bya cu lams phyag dang gra pa yan pa nas rgyanas den sngon gnyen pa shes su 'gyur ba 'ag/ sngon ga tam 'das pa'am/ phebs par smra ba de dgag la mngon bdagal
183a2(dkon brtsegs): smod par 'gyur gyis dogos te phyag dar khrod pa de ma blangs na/ 'od srung dge slong phyag dang khrod pa pa'i phyag dang khrod pa de lta bu ni yongs su dag pa ma yin no zhes ngas bshad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong phyag dpa
183a3(dkon brtsegs): babs drong sa bu'i sems dang / de rje lta bu'i sems kyis dog/ sa pa ri par byag dang zod pa blang bar bya 'i phyir // des phyag dang drong bar brang nas segs par 'grus te shin tug cang ning drim med par byas la chen
183a4(dkon brtsegs): 'al te kha legs par bsgyur la chos gos sngam sbyar la glan par bya'o// dpyis lag par mi 'gyur bar legs par glud legs par byur/ legs par bcoms te 'go bar bya'o// 'ad sung dge slong byu
183a5(dkon brtsegs): dang khrod pabs 'dod chags nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir mi sdug pa yid la bya bas gnas la phyag dar khrod pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// zhe sdang nye bar ni ngar bya ba'i phyir byams pa'i sems kyis phyag dang kr-i
183a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag lus la 'go bar bya'o// gti mug nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la gnas te phyag dang khrod pa dag lus la bgo par bya'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir tshul bzhin yid
183a7(dkon brtsegs): la byed pa la thugs pas kyag dam khyod pa dag lus la brko bar bya'o// skye mched drug yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir dang po lags par 'grangs te phyag dang pyod pa nayus la go bar bya'o// lha dang klu dang gnad sbyin dag
183a8(dkon brtsegs): mthubar bya ba'i phying tshul 'thos pa med pa dang lagasapa med par phyag dang phrad pa dag lus la bgo bar bya'o// 'ad du cu'i phyir phyag dang khros shes tan na/ 'od srung dper na phyag dang del ni sul
183b1(dkon brtsegs): dab ba skyed/ su rab chags pa ma spyad cing yongs su len te/ phrag da ni dang ma cha'o// 'od srung de zhir byug dang dang batshungs par bdag gi me pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ rnyed srag/ mod ga/ gnanas/ 
183b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol mi dgos pa/ gzhan gyi dor bsdu ma dgos pa/ gzhan la dag ma lus pa/ phyag dang bur bong ba ste/ de'i phyir phyag dang srod pa phyag dang khrod pa zhes bya'o// 'doni drung srong rnams kyi rigs so// 'di ni 'phags
183b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rigs gtsang ma'o// 'di ni 'phags pa'i rigs kyi gnas so// 'di ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams kyi rton pa'o// 'din tshul khrims kyi phung po kun zung ba'o// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po mama'o// 'din
183b4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi phung po'i rten to// 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rnam par grom pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang 'thun pa ste/ 'od srung de ltar phyag dang khrod pa ni yon tan mang ba/ skabs med pa
183b5(dkon brtsegs): na pas med / blags med pa ste/ dri ba med par 'gyur zhing khur khyer bar 'gyu to// 'od srung dge slong phyag dmathod pa bgang phyag dang srid pa'i gis kyimachog par 'dzi pa de la lha rnams kyang dkar bar 'gyug/ 
183b6(dkon brtsegs): / 'od srung 'di lta bu'i dus dang / 'di lta bu'i man yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong kyagang bgrod pam chos gas ngana' 'chang ga pasam gtan gyi 'das ma sgoms par grugs pa des btu byin dang / tshangs pa dang / bdig tan myong
183b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang thal ma spyir zhing nad pa la gdugs te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ lha gzhan phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur bltaci smos/ 'od sru dge slong dag chos gos kyis cham la mngon par brtson gyi/ rnal 'byor la mi
183b8(dkon brtsegs): can pa rus kyi can lhur len byo rol kyi gcang sgras phyod ga dang 'dod rags dang / ga'ang dang / gti mug gi drims yong sug bdan ni gong ba rang 'ong ba rtsod lan 'ang dung dadag rgyanasas dada' ba'i ga sas
184a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis lus tsha bar spyor ba la brtson pa de dag gsams dang sems las thung ba rnams shes te/ shes nas kyang de dag rgyang bsrings te yongs su spong bar// 
184a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// 'od srung dge tshul skul byed mi gtsang bas 'phags pa'i phyag dar khrod pa thogs nas bsod snyoms blangs te mtshe ma dros par song ba dang / 
184a3(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyang ring pon sa bsus rkang pa ma mag pas phyag 'tshal nas gtsang sra spyod pa'i lha de dag gis migatsang bas phags pa'i phyag dang khrod pa bdan nyid kyis 'grus te drim med par byas nas bkrus pa dra drim thar/ 
184a4(dkon brtsegs): des rang gi lus la skud de/ skal byed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan yang dag par rlangs pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa shes nas mtsho de'i lha rnams yan lag rdzas phyag 'tshal lo// kun du rgyu rab tu bzang po zhes
184a5(dkon brtsegs): byab dgos gtsang ma bgos nas bsod snyoms blangs te mchom dros par song ba dang / mchod na gnas pa'i lha de dag gis de mtsho mchog 'dir kha zas thos nas lhag ma bor na mtsho mchog mo gtsang bar byas su 'ong
184a6(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyang grags gcig khor khor yug tsam gyi nang du 'ang nga ma ster ba la ltos/ 'od srung 'phags pa'i chos kyi yon tan ku' ba'i khyad par dang skul byed kyi phyag dang khrod pa bkrus pa'i chu dri ma can lha dag pa
184a7(dkon brtsegs): galus la skud pa dang / kun du chu rab tu bzang po ni 'gror yang ma ster ba la ltos/ 'ad srung de lta bas na dge slong phyag darang khrod pa pa yon tan gyi chos 'dis nu 'di dag 'dod pa/ sum zhum por mgur pa/

184b8(dkon brtsegs): de la mi gti mug pa kha cig khyod dang de'i rjes su mi slob cing brkam pa dang chags pa'i zil gyis non pa/ chos gos sogs par byed pa/ lhung ba red sog par byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sog

185b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi gan du ni de'i tshe de'i dus na su yang mi 'gro/  ston cing bsnyen bkur mi byed par 'gyur ro// detsa 'phyar na na/ 'di la ba khyib padag ni chags pa'i rang bzhin can tshe 'di lang yin gyi/ tshe rabs kyi ma sbyar len pa ma yin pas da/ 
185b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di sum du dge slong de dag yini padag cagage' tsho ba med na pa da cigago sa pa'i byed bye kyi phyir byag phyi mchod kyi phyir bskyed bkur bya snyam du sems pa'i phyidar do// gzhan du dgang dag dge ba'i khabaskyed pa

185b4(dkon brtsegs): bag gnyis kyi yi pa'o bang 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhed/ bdad pa mamang zhing 'khor ba la 'jigs pa sa/ kha dang / na ba 'byor spyod pa la brtson zhing 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa/ las kyi rnam
185b5(dkon brtsegs): da pa bton pa/ chos don du gnyeng zhing chos 'dod pa'o// 'od srung mngon par mi 'dzin pa/ chos ma yin pa la lta ba/ las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal ba/ 'jig rten pha rol tu kha na ma thobs 'jigs par mi m+b+ha

185b7(dkon brtsegs): skabs mi 'byed kyi steng du 'di lta bu'i chos 'di dag sos na 'dag sgrub pa las nyams par rig nas smad par bya bar sems te/ 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni dang bzod sbyang ba'am/ bdud ces

186a1(dkon brtsegs): ba nan mas bcad byed par bya / daltang mi gti drug pa de ga na bdag pa 'an dang / gzhan sa canapa tu drags pa pa yin no// sa bcom ldan 'dam mtshe dang ldan pa 'od du chen pos 'din ces na
186a2(dkon brtsegs): chom ldan 'dasabatsam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtso pa yang dag pa dgas pa'ims rgyas kyis na nam ga sa yin pa grangs 'dinatun da ba med pa ga na sa da
186a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po gang lags pa de tsa cher yang dag par rab tu bshad lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems cad gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas yos shi
186a4(dkon brtsegs): debazhin nyid du sgrub pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis sangs su ba rung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang dag ces kyin mgrangs 'di thos nas 'os shing / 
186a5(dkon brtsegs): zhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba yid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol bka' stsam pa/ kun dka' bo khyod kyis rigs kyi bu dang / rigasapa
186a6(dkon brtsegs): bu me dge pa'i ci 'a bskyed pa/ zhib 'dod pa bral bar 'dod pa de dag ni ched du chos kyi laT 'di rung shig/ khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dog kyang chos 'di la bslabs nas phreng ba thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i mya ngan la
186a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pob par 'gyur ro// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshas can ma grangs 'dab zung lags na/ bcom ldan 'das chos can ma grangs 'di'i ming kyi lags/ 'di'i ltar gzung b.rabartse/ bcom ldan 'ad
186a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsas pa/ ku dga' ba da'i phyir chos can ma grangs 'di ces thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa zhes bya bar zung shigan 'a phags pa'i rigs spangs pa'i yon tan ciganas dang / yul khrims dang ldan pa yongs su
186b1(dkon brtsegs): na dang / rgyal khri sa nga na 'dab chalags pa dang / ngan ma rung ba dang / rin pa tsha bags padang / na ma mams can pa 'idugs bya' yang byang shig/ bcom ldan 'ad kyis don
186b2(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / me dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bste
186b3(dkon brtsegs): / 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las rin po che'i phung po'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// // rgya gas kyi mkhan po mu rin dra'o d+hi dang / klu chen gyi
186b4(dkon brtsegs): ba can de ye shes lngas brdzud cing zhus te gtan la 'ab ba// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po mchos kyi nam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u la ni 'acum lnga ba ste/ 'phags pablo gram mi zad pas zhus pa lung
186b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa/ bam po gcig pa/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya yak+Sha ya ma ti pa re pren+sa nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa blo gros mi rid pas zhus pa shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
186b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad ba dag shes ces pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal pa'i baban byargod kyi phung po'i ris/ dge slong phreng nyis rdza cu'i dge long gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa
186b7(dkon brtsegs): / sto la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i tog dang / byang chub sems da
186b8(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa can sa ta dang / bya dzu bas sa da la sems dpa can pa mams nyan dang / par bya kyi da g+sadang bya tu ma'i ma da' semasam tshan pa can
187a1(dkon brtsegs): ba sems dpa' dpe med pa drug bcu dang / byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa/ 
187a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po po gros mi zad pa yang byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag drug cus yongs su bgrod cing bdun du ba dang te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sebs dpa' sems
187a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po bro gros ma zad pa sngan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pas mo g.yas pa'i spangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'dis gal mede yongs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'ad
187a4(dkon brtsegs): la rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog ge gdugs dang / me tog gi phur mas mcho nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di dad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems shes bgyin/ 
187a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sapa sems pa
187a6(dkon brtsegs): su dpags/ mid migs dmig sa ma ga gyur s+ho// byang chu ba las kyang na yid kyang rgyam kyi sems mi dmigs// byu ba 'arjod dumam rjes/ sems ni gzugs ma mchis/ bstan dum mchis
187a7(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa ma ma ches/ rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing sems pa yang med migs ni/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos 'di dag ga don rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
187a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di la byang chub ni bad 'am/ gdags pa'am tha snyad du mi dmigs shing byang chub las gud na byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/ byang chub ni brjod du med/ sems ni gzugs med/ bstan du med/ thogs
187b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ rnam par rig pa med de/ sems pa yang me dmigs sa// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub na brjod du med pa ste/ byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang dngazhin no// sems nge lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub dang
187b2(dkon brtsegs): sems ji lta bar sems pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems pa rnams de lta bar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// mims kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems
187b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob bo// chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni byang chub kyi sems shes bya'o// byang chub ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba yang
187b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin te/ sems kyang de bzhin no// sems pa yang de bzhin no// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa med de byang chub kyang med/ byang chub tu gdags pa yang med/ sems can yang med/ sems can/ 
187b5(dkon brtsegs): du gdags pa yang med/ nyan thos kyang med/ nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ byang chub sems dpar gdags pa
187b6(dkon brtsegs): med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dus byas su gdags pa yang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas su gdags pa ya ma dmigs mi dmigs/ dmigs
187b7(dkon brtsegs): par ma 'gyur mod kyi/ rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dben na ri rab kyi hrul du dag ba' rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skyes/ de la sgon sbyin pa'i sa sor tu phyin pa'i sems bskyed pa gnas pa ni chos
187b8(dkon brtsegs): ya sad kyi bya ba'i gnas byams su bu ra sa te/ de tsun tshus khrims kyi sa rol du byed pa'o// sems paskyed pa gsum pa de 'jigs pa med pa dang / bag tsam mdang dang / blags med pa'i tshul ba yim / 
188a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi ral lta bur blta ste/ de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis/ sreng med kyi bu'i mthu dang / stobs dang / 
188a2(dkon brtsegs): thugs dang / brtson 'grus dag rgyal pa lta bung bal ste/ de ladra ni brtson 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa lnga pan bsod nams kyis chog mi shes pa'i tshul gyis dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag nga
188a3(dkon brtsegs): 'alags pa lta bung blta ste/ de la rgyu ni 'amam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun gnag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/ de la rgya ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
188a4(dkon brtsegs): 'o// sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded dpon mdzod chen pos drug pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'phrog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas legs par brgyan par blta ste/ de la chu ni thabs mkhas pa
188a5(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'o// sems bad pa brgyad pani zla ba ba dadakyil 'khor ma pa dag pa'i dpe la gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs su gas pa bya ste/ de lan ni smon pam kyi rol tu phyin pa'o// sems
188a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa dadu gis macas kyi zhing yong ba sa dag pa'i yon tan ma rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gri bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed parab tu ste/ de la tu ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sems bskyed pa bcwa
188a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan dang / ye shes dang / chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas 'khor los sbyar ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis nam mkha' dang mtshungs par blta ste/ de la rgya'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
188a8(dkon brtsegs): lo// regs kyang bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu pa 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// don dam par 'di la byang chub kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med pang
188b1(dkon brtsegs): chub kyi sems cang med do// rigs kyi de la byang chub sems pa 'arnams kyi na pa'i ma ro tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu ga zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dUd pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa sngon du 'dra
188b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / pha rol du phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / byams pa tshan po sngon du 'gro ba dang / ste 'i chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems ca kyi can sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gra
188b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'ad pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa
188b4(dkon brtsegs): cu'o// rigs kyi 'del byab chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul thams kyi la tu mun pa'i sngon du gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcu gang sen 'di \u0f7fste/ lus kyi las yangs su dag bsngon du 'gro ba dang / ngal gal
188b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dka pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag pa sngod du 'gro ba dang / rnam par mi 'chi bsngon du 'gro ba dang / ngan sang thams cad rnam par slo ba stan du 'gro ba dang / mkham pa brgyad rnam par spong bson du gro/ 
188b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las bzla ba sngon du gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'phro ba dang / smon lam yongs su dzags pa sngon du 'dzu / 
188b7(dkon brtsegs): gas rtse bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sdod du 'gro ba'i tshe'arnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ze tshas/ 
188b8(dkon brtsegs): rab lu ste/ bcug zhen 'di steste/ ngas bu cags pa spong bldan du 'gro ba dang / 'ang thang grong bsngon du 'gro ba dang / yus la mi lta bar sngon du grob dang / srog la med sa rten pa sngon du 'bra ba dang / mas pathod du
189a1(dkon brtsegs): 'thob dag sems can yos sa smin par bya ba sngon du 'grob / byams pape stobs son du 'gro ba dag thab ma 'chos la bzod pa ston du 'gro ba dang / rgya man pa la mos pasngod du/ 
189a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grob dang / mi shes pa bsngal ba sngon du 'gro ba ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i tshamasam pa 'acu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi
189a3(dkon brtsegs): 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu rtse/ bcug shes 'dis ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sgrub ci la khyab paston du 'gro ba dang / dge pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid mngon pa sh+tsa
189a4(dkon brtsegs): bal rjes su li rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / rnam pa med pa sngon du 'grob dade/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bsdu ba 'thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gre 'dab dran pa nye bar bzag pa sngon du 'arlon
189a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan mongs pa'i dgra dul ba sngon du 'grob pa chos thams cad kyis da ben pasngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can ma sa su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par spru'i brjod
189a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de la bang na pa sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems pa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi
189a7(dkon brtsegs): la phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcus/ brlag pa zhe na/ 'di la ste dge ba'i ches lnga gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / yang dag la
189a8(dkon brtsegs): papa'i byang chub sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang / ting nge 'dzin
189b1(dkon brtsegs): da du gro bdag / ting dzin gyi phung ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dam pa' mas yongs su bsrung bsngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tun
189b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byu chu bsams dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gre cha chos rnam pa bcu ste/ bcug pa zhes 'dis ste/ phung po la mkhas pa
189b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dang / khamapa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'a mkhas pa sngon du 'grob dang / bden pa la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad bsal bsten dul
189b4(dkon brtsegs): dag shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ston du 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu
189b5(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa rnams kyi shes rab sa ro tu rkyen pa di'i na du gropo rigs pa 'a'o/ ga kyi zugs byang chub sems dpa'arnams kyithapas lams pa'i bsnyen pa'i sngon du rlo nas pa te/ 'jug ga/ 
189b6(dkon brtsegs): sems sa bye la sa pa nga spyod pa bya bsngon du thob pa sems na rkyen tho su tho sa thams cad ma'i sngon du 'thob / sems can chos smin par bya ba 'i slob da 'thob / sa
189b7(dkon brtsegs): dal la jug pasngon du 'gro ba dang / khyad par mi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa snod du 'gro ba dang / yol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / dngos po nges pa bzhin du yongs su rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 
189b8(dkon brtsegs): stobs nye bar grub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyi mi dog sa'am mangs su ma ba bar byed pa rjon du 'thob ste/ gas kyi bu bya ru ba mams da' rnams kyi ma 'am 'a ma khas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'acug/ 
190a1(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub 'ang ba dang 'a rnams kyi smon lam kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i tshong rnam pa bcu ste bcug den/ 'dis ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'ibs po nye bar byung shes pa
190a2(dkon brtsegs): sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can pas sa ca nyon mongs pa'i mibs tho nya pa tu ba shes pa sngon du gra'adapa semam can thams cad byed par pamam pa yang tub shes pa rjod du 'thob na sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mas pacis
190a3(dkon brtsegs): nye bar du bshes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang mos pa thibal lo nye bar sgru ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / 'ji garten gyi khamam tha dad pa dang / khams gsum po thebs po nya bar chub shes pa
190a4(dkon brtsegs): khrob / sesapa can thams cad bye bsam dang ga pa nyam khrimam pa nyan chu bshes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / sem pa can thams cad kyi 'di 'bod skye ba grib pa po par dru ba shes pa sdod du thob dang / sems can thas cad dung po gsum dum
190a5(dkon brtsegs): ga pa thibs pa ba chu ba shes pa da thobs dmas mtha bas na nga tsun pa bya ba shes parjod gro / re kyi rgya chu 'a dems pa 'das ci dra ci sbyin pa da na du thoba'i tsha nam bam
190a6(dkon brtsegs): gas kyi 'das byang chub sems dpa' mas kyi stobs kyi ba rol tu phyin pa'i snod du gro cha ma rnam pa 'dus/ bcug nan/ 'dis ste/ chos thams cadag da mnas 'byung ba med ba sngon du thob dang / tshas thams cad gsod pa nas mngan 'ad med
190a7(dkon brtsegs): du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ga 'od sa nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gra' dang / chos thams cad gzod sa nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad ga bod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'grob dang / chos thams cad la dug pa med pa
190a8(dkon brtsegs): gro dang / chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / tsham thams cad dam pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'grob sa/ chos thams cad kyi pog ma dang par dad tham mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la
190b1(dkon brtsegs): btog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpang rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu
190b2(dkon brtsegs): na pa'i rjen du 'gro ba'i tshes rnam pa du ste/ 'jug shes 'dis ste/ chos thams ca nas par bye la shin du rnas par brtags pa sngon du 'thob dang dbar 'chos shin du 'angs su dogs pa sngon du 'tho ba dang / bya chub chobs
190b3(dkon brtsegs): bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su gzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / snying rje chen po yangs pa khod du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang / la
190b4(dkon brtsegs): rim pa shes pa sun du 'gro ba de/ sems can gyi khams da tan mongs pa'i spad pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal la 'jug ci nges su gro'i sa pa med pa byed pa ldan du 'gru ba dag / stobs
190b5(dkon brtsegs): cu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'is thob pa sngon du
190b6(dkon brtsegs): gro ba / rigs kyi 'byang chub 'ims dang 'arnam pa che me shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ba sngon du 'grub chis rnam pa 'dra'o// des pa po tu byin pa'adon ga shes spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni 'a'ogro
190b7(dkon brtsegs): phyiphyin pa'i don no// ye shes zab cing rje che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa chags pa med pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// gtor ba'i nyes pa rnga lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa
190b8(dkon brtsegs): di ni pa ral tu phyin pa'i don no// skye bo ma mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni paros tu phyin pa'i don no// chos kyi mngod pad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par bar
191a1(dkon brtsegs): sab 'ardzogs par byed 'dod ni paros rkyen mon noto// sabs can gi yas rar tu shes par bya bar don ni b.rol pa byin pa'i do// smin pa lal nyi nges su rtogs pa'i dadan pa ro tu phyid pa'id/ 
191a2(dkon brtsegs): la khrims mnyam pa nyid langs su rdzogs par byed par don ni pha rol du phyin pa'i donano// bzod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i din ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
191a3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'ad pa'i don de pa rab tu phyin pa dodado// shes rabagyi rol tu phyin pa langs par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa 'dan
191a4(dkon brtsegs): tuphyid pa'i dad do// sa mas cad btugs par byed pa'i dan ni param tu phyin pa 'don to/ mirtse ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su gas par byed pa dod pa yos phyin pa'i don do// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa pa dag par
191a5(dkon brtsegs): kho par byed pa'i don na pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yangs su spang ba'i don ni pharal tu phyin pa'i don no// sems can thams cad yong u smin par bya ba'i don na la rob tu phyin pa'i don no/ 
191a6(dkon brtsegs): sa se ye shes yangs su rdzogs par bya ba'i'adi na la la tu phyin pa'i don no// bdudadu thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i danan pa rol tu phyin pa'i don no// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don
191a7(dkon brtsegs): byed pa 'dod na// man tan thams cad kyi rol tu 'byo bdon ni rang sa khyen pa da// phas kyigs pa thams cad car gcad pa'i don ni ma rol tu phyin pa don do// skabs 'drad/ mi 'jigs pa dang / sa rgyas
191a8(dkon brtsegs): chos pa bres pa parje brgyad mas su rdzogs par bya 'dod pangos sbyin pa na // sa rgyas byachem thams cad pangs sugs pagyu 'don par sa phyin pamed // blan med pa yang dag pa ngogs
191b1(dkon brtsegs): chu 'don pa ngogs par byang na' par byed pa do ni 'ango byen pa 'dod do// cos kyis 'ar mdam pa bcug ten du gang 'i dod de 'angos ta byen pa dod// regs kyi bu dang tu chu' sems dpa' sebs dpa' ched pa'i kyi
191b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa dang pa 'jigs de sto gsub ces chen po'i ga rten gyi khabs gtan bya' pag sreg brgyas pa des 'angs su gang par mdzang // rigs kyi bud dad byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen la bya drab
191b3(dkon brtsegs): 'is gnyis pa su lus ni stong gsum kyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur byung ba la na pa dbye' khrag sreg brgya stong du mas legs par brgyan par mthong // rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems
191b4(dkon brtsegs): na pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i kA ni bdag nyid pa 'deng lag nang gci sra 'i thogs nas las kyi rgol pa thams cad 'dul bar mthong ba// rigs kyi bud 'byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems
191b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pazhi pa'i sgra ltas ni phyogs bzhin padrung shed kyil 'khor ba zhes pasas cad dang ldan pa'is dkyil 'amang can pa la ma rtog sa cos kyis mngon du 'thar bar yang ga/ rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa sems dang 'acan pocwa
191b6(dkon brtsegs): phrul sa dashes ma ldan rnams kyi can pa'i du med ci gal ma nya ca pa nga/  bas tha pa sa
191b7(dkon brtsegs): zas de dber mas pazhi ldan pa gser gyi byem 'dal brton pa med cing nga la lan lag dang rtan pa'i rus yongs su ga pa me teg ud pa la dang / ga lud dang / 'dra ga bas 'argyan pa'i chu mdzod// dam bdag nyid med na
191b8(dkon brtsegs): dpar thong // rigs kyi de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i grag pa dkyi/ sag pas g.yon gnyis namams can dmyal pa'i galangs mthang ba/ danas 'das te
192a1(dkon brtsegs): gapapas //  la/  [ऽ] ma pa rgyad pa la sa sa la pa na shes pa na da
192a2(dkon brtsegs): gcan ldanam ma rnams sa mug par byed ce dug par dam //  bye 'ang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i na pa sems dpa 'a' pa thams ni sa mas snang ba'i rgyal po /  ts+tsha// 
192a3(dkon brtsegs): m+b+ha gdams ma sa pa na mdun bzlas papa na yin na ya rdzogs ma sa /  dzin pa //  phre byung chub sems depa sem pa dpa chen
192a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga spos ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i skumathong ste// bdon gser ltabu 'od mdom gang bcangasas bya ba khrab khrig bcu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis blta nas ches ston pa mthong ste/ rigs kyiru/ 
192a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dru ba 'did/ ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams dpa' chen po rnams kyi chub sems pa yis bcu pa'i tha gas yin no// degs kyi bu des byang chub sems dpa'is dang po la gnas pa'i bya chub sems dpa' dini sbyin pa'i pha ba tu phyin
192a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhinan// byang chub sems dpa'is gnyis pa lani rdul khrims kyi pa btu smin pa gnon// sa gsum pa lan 'dzad pa'i yom ldan pa gnon to// sa bzhi pa ne rtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon te// sa lnga ba na
192a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bas gtan gyi com khyen pa gnon te// mjug pa lani shes rab pa khyen pa gyun s+ho// sa bdun pa la ni thabs la gakhas pa'i pha ro phyin pa gnon to// sa brgyad pas ni sngon las kyi la ro sa sbyin pa gnon to// 
192a8(dkon brtsegs): b.lan stabs kyi paro du phyin pa gnan to/ sa bcub la ni la shes kyi sa ro la byin pa dan to// dgab kyi bu de 'byang chub sems dpa sems dpa can pa mams bskyed pa dang na rin pa ma yang dag par babags par
192b1(dkon brtsegs): byes yongs su brdung ste sme'o// sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mig po ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa
192b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di phyi mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis yongs su 'thung gyi skye'o// sems bskyed pa lngal ni na pa che'i me tog gting 'dzin gyis yongs su bzud ste bya'o// sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gni brjod ci ting nge 'dzin ces
192b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bkung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa 'dun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su
192b4(dkon brtsegs): steskye'o// sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes blon ma'i ting nga 'dzin gyis yongs su 'azung ste skye'o// sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung nas bye ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dang
192b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu de nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang pol byed par gyi byin gyi brlangs shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// sa gnyis pa lagang / 
192b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mi thul bu zhes bya ba'i gzung 'a byo'o// sa gsum pa la rab tu gnas 'a zhes bya ba'i gsungs skye'o// sa bzhi pa la gdum dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bye'o// sa lnga pa la yon tan sna tshogs shes bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// madru/ 
192b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes byed kyil 'khor gyi smon la zhes bya ba'i gzungs smra'o// sa bdun pa la khyad par du 'phags pa nas bya bar gzungs smra'o// sa brgyad pa la rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs smra'o// sa dgu ba la mtha' yas pa'i can
192b8(dkon brtsegs): byaba'i/ lus skye'o// sa bcu pa la zad pa shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs skye'o// de nas de'i cha bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba pogs pa med pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcoms
193a1(dkon brtsegs): 'a dis chos byin mgras de pa nga ngogs shi sa cas kyi chos dpa pon tan 'ams cadasapa par gyur ba s+ho// bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu ni na
193a2(dkon brtsegs): shin d+hA dz+ra pa sa di smosam bag tu bya zlabasas sadapa nas ma than med pa la da pa pogs pa byeng chub las byeng mi rdzog par 'gyur pa// dkyi kyi // rigs kyi rdulag/ rigs kyi zhus rgya
193a3(dkon brtsegs): ga da kying yongs su srin pa rnams kyi phyag can 'dren / chos yin ma grangs 'ad thos pa yin te/ chos kyi nam grangs ni ni dge ba'i rtsab ma bskyed pa nams kyin lam du zag par mi 'byung // rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam
193a4(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'de bas pacas kyis rigs kyi lu la/ rigs kyibu modag lhag pa'i bsam pa yangs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i tshes nyan pa dnga'i 'bras 'ar 'gyur// dge 'dun la bsnyen
193a5(dkon brtsegs): bur byed pa dang mi 'dra ba 'ar shan/ rgya mtsho'i phyag tu mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa'i gzung ma dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa dang sgral 'jug pa'i gzungs dang me 'bral bar 'gyur/ nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzung
193a6(dkon brtsegs): dang pe 'bral bar 'gru / zla ba'i tog sdang ba'i gzung pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad nam par gnon bsgrub pa'i gzung sa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur dang b+har phra shing brtan pa'i de rnam par 'dzams pa'i gzungs dang / 
193a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bab gyur/ 'dod du med pa don bstan pa la yang dag par gnas pa gzung ba dang mi 'dra la bar 'gyur/ cig dang spyod pa dang skathams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyung/ nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa/ 
193a8(dkon brtsegs): ba pa'i phyagatus btab pa'i gsus dang 'bral bar gyur/ sangs rgyab kyi su ma lakhas pa yongs su gas pa smra pa'i sa nga ma da mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// bu'i bug rung dedag zab pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
193b1(dkon brtsegs): gargya bgi nas kyil kya sa na phru yos ston chos te sa kya meg sol 'grol pa nga 'o ba lang med do// sems pa narnapas yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can dud dmigs pa yang med do// chos
193b2(dkon brtsegs): stod kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do// 'chi 'pho dang skya ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med// skye sa yang med do// chos thams can ma jal bar rtog pa med pa'i phyir radu byed rnams gang du 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ gang nas 'ong bar
193b3(dkon brtsegs): dmi gyur ro// chos kyi na mthapas 'de bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sum stong gisa'i skye ba 'i chos la 'dod pathob par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni blan med 'a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par

193b5(dkon brtsegs): / lcan/ seM sa lngam yin da// dri bang bcas pa'i 'jigarten li sa ste/ bcom ldan nas kyis gdus pa pa mngon par / nga/ sa lags pa dgon mtshon rtsegs chen gyi mas chen 'grangs mdu kyang phrag la la las tha zlas
193b6(dkon brtsegs): ma nus pa'i 'i 'gres byaste bzhi bdun lnga ba rdzogs s+ho// rgyag kyi 'an 'a na po d+hed/  chen gyis ts+tsha ba na tshigs rdzas 'byu ma bus ta gtan lalabag/ la lags pa dgan mchog 'chags pa chen ma chos rtse

193b8(dkon brtsegs): la la kakyi na las/ das gas su na 'as //  rna kyi na pa bzhe nas na da
194a1(dkon brtsegs): byad kyis la mnod meng rab nyin gyi kun dga' yan/ dge zung bang mam pa'i dge slong ba dge 'dud can po dang babs gcig tu zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan za naHchan zam na
194a2(dkon brtsegs): bsal thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dge bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyer pa ldog pa shakaka / 'jang dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byabs pa dang / spobs pa thogs med dang / brtson pa mi 'dor dang / de dag la
194a3(dkon brtsegs): migs pa byang chub sems dpa' sa la dpang babs gcig go// de napa 'ang mdapa sa gnon du gla pa de bzhin gshegs pa langs pa dang / byas bya ba dang / baphen pa su bya ba'i phyir mya zhar ba'i dus kyi che ra bdi gnasanas
194a4(dkon brtsegs): nga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgog la ba der song nas phyin pa dang pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / badren bkur bya ba'i
194a5(dkon brtsegs): gi gnas nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'o brang ga la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal kyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / ma dang ldan pa kA t+ya'i bu chen
194a6(dkon brtsegs): da /  ldan pa gsus bcanapa/ dedag pas cad dang / gzhan pa na pamatshan 'arnams ngas gi gan sanas kyang kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi bgrang gal ba dang nam phyin pa dang phyogs gcig tu 'amed do// nas sa
194a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po 'angs shing lpags te 'dus par mkhyen nas/ bdag ga po brang nas byung ste pa brang gi phyir la phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la 'azhugs sa// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen
194a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du medang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'aka' stsal pa/ shA ra dra ti'i bu khyad ci'o phyi gags pas 'ongs tad bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gzhin 'dug/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma tsho dang ldan pa shA
194b1(dkon brtsegs): tI'i zus seMn ces gas pa to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thog pa nyid du'ang ba dpal gzhon nu zung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'o brang gi pa rgong mchis so// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la brtsa'ang tshu ba srad
194b2(dkon brtsegs): u kyi mchis so// denas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa byed bzhen du 'angam dpa lagan du gyur bas bkar khyab pa/ 'angs dpa sa byad da pa na gshegs pa la bas bdag kya bya ba dang / bsnyen pakur bya ba'i phyir bams cang//
