220a6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// ting 'dzin thams 'ad la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// kyi
220a7(dkon brtsegs): zhon/ ting nge 'dzin de dag byas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi phu'al rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes ra
220a8(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir ren/ 'di lta rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i sems cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du byas pa ma yin pa dang sa
220b1(dkon brtsegs): rab dum pa pa'i phyi 'o// chos thams cad ni nges par 'byung ba dang bcas 'gre/ gang nges pa mi 'thung bachi chas dgang yang med do des de lta shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kya zhes rab kyi
220b2(dkon brtsegs): nepa' nyid 'dis pamed pa'i ba gyi chul ces bsab pa bya'o// rgyas thams cad nanges par me gyung ste/ gses par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i tshes de'ang yang med pa/ dba'i phyid skyes chos bams ca
220b3(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i phyir ro// chos de dag ni ji ltar brjed pa de ltar yod pa ma yin te/ brjod du med pa ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med do zhes de ltar shes par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi
220b4(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bsla' bar bya'o// sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ste/ yang byang chub kyi phyir mi smod pa'i sems can de gang yang med do zhe na/ yang de la zhum pa
220b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la dngos po med pa'i bar gyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir nen/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni byang chub dang mnyam pa
220b6(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos thams cad byang chub dang mnyam pa dang / byang chub ji lta bar sems can 'ams cad kya de 'din no// sems can thams cad ci 'dra bar spyod pa de yang de bzhin no// med pa'i phyir spyod pa thams cad ni spyod pa med
220b7(dkon brtsegs): de yang byang chub ste/ byang chub gang yin pa skye ba med pa yang de yin/ 'byung ba med pa yang de yin te/ de lta bu'i chos 'di la bum pa med par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
220b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di nyid la dngos pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i bar kyi tshul gyis bslab par bya'o zhes kyis shi // 'ja ma dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa'i bar de dag kyang de
221a1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi ros su phyin pa'i nyid las bstan no/  pa phyi zhes nga ni ba ud du med pa ste/ shes rab kyil ro tu byin pa ni mi ston pa'i phyir po// 'angam dpal dge slong ma/ dge slong ma'am/ 
221a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las cheg bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
221a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par nga 'chang ma/ gang dag de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub tu nges par rig par bya'o// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
221a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i bar 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dang dpang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas pa'o// gong du yang mos par byed na de dag ni sa rdzas kyi chos thams cad la nges par
221a5(dkon brtsegs): ra ro/ 'ang ma dang langs sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mnos pa'i nA 'di 'anag par bya ste/ rgya 'di ni mnyan pa nyid du rtogs pa rnams
221a6(dkon brtsegs): sreg go// 'di nisangs rgyas kyi chomamams cad kyi par dul chags pa med pa yongs su smin 'a'o// 'jam dpas byang chub sems da 'i theg papa'i rigs kyi drangam/ rigs ci mon 'dis btab pa ni na po
221a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skal pacanam yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis pa 'gro ba 'am/ 'dug pa'i skal bsanas yin no// ni nas de'i tshe lha'i dang ro tu byin dang/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis lha'i tsan dang
221a8(dkon brtsegs): pa kyi sa rgya pa sa rna pa chen pa dag lta pa da lta rdzu pa da zugs gras das sbe na migs kyi tsham phyin pa
221b1(dkon brtsegs): bco 'ams das ma ngal nod du gru ba la bang ba don pa gto sa zhi ga sa dge rtsa ba yi ga rgyag tu dis bta' ba dadag zhes tha med pa'i chos rin po rjod dag ni byi lding
221b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa gyur cig ces smras so//  ba mabyin gyis kyang cig 'di nad ces smras te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kya marung ba dang mnyes pa'i bar gyigs pa sa po sbyin paza' mo 'di thu byob ring
221b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'thung ba dag rigs kyi ba 'ag/ rigs kyi bu ma de 'dra ba de dag gi lam du zag par thang ba nas dag tad sangs rgyas kyi thamams cad dayangs su grub pa zlar bapa gyi bar gyi phrad yon par gyim// bcom ldan
221b4(dkon brtsegs): // shes rab kyi la rkyen pa bsan mad shes kyi thulal/ rigs kyi bum pa na sa grang ngas thal la khri gnas grangams bdug pa sa sa kyang 'dzin 'dam ngan chub par bgyid bdag 'a ba
221b5(dkon brtsegs): bu 'am/ rigs ste thu po dang sa gis bdag cag gi bdon las bsgrub pa'o zhes ma chom ma mchis 'ang 'tshal bar babye'o// de zad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po cu byin pa 'di rgyud ces bkar
221b6(dkon brtsegs): ma// sa kyi sulal/ gas kyi dag ma grub ba so// 'ad ga ldan pa rdzogs pa'i rna / 'a sa pa // nas tham nas
221b7(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'ded ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyisa'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du zin pa bstan pa 'di byed kyi ya rlab tu gsopa/ bde bar gshegs pa byin gyis
221b8(dkon brtsegs): ma pa ga tes ma can panas dug nams pa gru /  la ma ma sa
222a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dzum pa mdzad ma zag tud nas de'i ma shes rab bye la rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pabyin gyis rmob lan stong gsum gyi sto chen po 'jig rten gyi khabs 'di snad ba che
222a2(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di byin gyis
222a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra ltas lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'jam dpal 'di dag ni de 'azhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'a byid kyis grangs pa dra ltas rnam
222a4(dkon brtsegs): lta 'a ga zhes shes rab kyi cho rje byin pa bstan pa 'di byin kyis brlabs par shes par bya'o// mas ga chos gang yang mi srong shing mi srog la bsngags par mi byed pa de nga dad ga ni sdug sa 'aris btal
222a5(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/  ci'i bye shes 'as dpal dmigs pa 'dzin so bar byed pa dang ba gus par bya ma deb ban das btab ba da zhi mapa kya de ladug ste/ de lta de ga gis com
222a6(dkon brtsegs): ma khya chos gang yang ldan pa' nas pa rtog pa med do/ daci kyi shes 'jams 'tsham mams ca don dam pa ma skyes pa'i phying po// maldan dam kyi de skad ces pa 'a gyuman ga/ 'ang ma dpa gnon nu ba sa byang chub cems pa
222a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang lhad pa mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rted yi ra nga te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la 'dod par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen pa'i chos kyi rnam
222a8(dkon brtsegs): ga gas brgyas lal 'angam dpa' kyis bum pa'i du bdu rgya she kyi ste she dun badzag pa sa/ rgyan kyi 'a po rbA dz+his tun gyi ma rnam mnas rje sgra nus te ga tan la pa ga' ga
222b1(dkon brtsegs): na na ga pa myo na ni na gan mas sug gapa// shugs / 
222b2(dkon brtsegs): da sa 'gags pas na maces lus pazhes bya ba cagapa can pa'i ma'o// sas cas da byang chub sems pa'adas nyan pas dngangs sa rgyas sems cadas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad 'dig gis thos pa dus gcigs com
222b3(dkon brtsegs): da das rgyal lo ya 'od gyi phung po'i rmil dge slong ba'i mi nyes stong gi dge slong zhid ge 'dun cad po dang babs gcig tu zhugs te/ thams cadun dag 'chom pa/ rtag pa zadag rten mongs pa med gdabang dang ldan pa gru
222b4(dkon brtsegs): bems shin tunam 'ar grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa grang po chen po// khyab byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phung bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor la yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes
222b5(dkon brtsegs): sesems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag go// byang chub sems dpa' logs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang yang thabs gcig ste/ 
222b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kying skye ba gcig gis sogs pa/ dbang bsrung bathob ga/ dpa' bas tho ba'i ting ledzin la 'gyu ba/ pad+ma ba ma'i tshong 'dzin pa tu tho pa/ 'a dzin kyil lapor gyi ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa/ rgyam
222b7(dkon brtsegs): rtse mo'i de dung rgyan kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol pa/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin du rtogs pa/ yon tan 'byung gnas 'khod padi ti nge 'dzin zhin tu gtan la phebs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du
222b8(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub kyi snying por yang du gzhol ba/ bdud kyi yub thams cad las shin tu 'das gsangs rgyas kyi yul gyi gnas la rab tugasas pa/ yi mad pa bstan pa'i gzus ras tu thob pa/ sems ca thams cad byed
223a1(dkon brtsegs): po chim par byed pa'i spobs pa pa tu bob gami 'arigs paseng ge'i skabs kyis gathor bams cad gnod pa la gabs pa/ cig bstan pa sa byed pas dang yod par bskal pa'i bar du rung
223a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa/ gzugs kyi mtshan bzang pos legs par brgyan pa/ 'dus pa ngan pa'i tshogs pha rol rgol ba yang dag par rab tu 'joms gang zhugs pa dang brjod pa'i sgra mngon po phyogs bcur grags pa/ sangs
223a3(dkon brtsegs): sa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te rab tu bkur ba/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dag bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dpag ta med pa las phung ba/ bskal pa bye ba khrag
223a4(dkon brtsegs): khrig brgya stong grangs med pa shin srung ba rgyas gzims ca mas na kyi rnam ma pazhin yongs sanasas sa tsho rigs pa rjes kyi san gto ga rkyen las byung ba'i chos zab cing gti smra ga dka'
223a5(dkon brtsegs): ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang mtha' ba yin pa dang / rtag pa dang chad par lta ba yongs su spas pa/ dge bdag ci drim med pa'i bsam pa dang drug pa'i bsas bzhin du chos sud/ ga sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
223a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bcu ba dag / ku rig pa dang / rnam par rig pa'i tshul mkhas pa/ rang gi sems la dbang sa ba/ sems dpa' zhing brtan mdzo ltur mi byed pa/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dub
223a7(dkon brtsegs): sa rab kyi stobs dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang / gzungs dang / smon lam la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa/ yon tan dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa'i blo nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rnams la 'di ltar
223a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sems dpa' sems dpa' can po sgron ngas gzigasanas pa d+ha zhes bya ba das rtag tu rnas par rta ba dang / spyan ram gzigs dbang thug dang / mthu chen popo dang / seng ge dang/ sang ga'i rje
223b1(dkon brtsegs): klo dang / seng ge'i stabs su 'grod pa/ seng ge'i ska do bklags dang / mchog sa thoms dpa de'i blo gros dang / rdo rnam par gnon dang/ ro nga'i rgyam mtshan dag pa'i sdedag mi nam pa gom pas rnam par gnod dag
223b2(dkon brtsegs): rten gsum gos pas rnam par gnon dang / mog paras dang / pad sa migs/ badrab shod pa dang / rin pa che bkod pa dang / spobs pa chen po dang / mthum ca dang/ rin chen kha ba dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / laganA
223b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag rgya rin po tshe dang / yon tan gyi rgyal po sdang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po sdang dang / bkod pa'i rgyal ba dang / yid gnyis rnam par 'joms dang / srog gi sdang bas brgyan dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / dbyangs snyan dang / sprin
223b4(dkon brtsegs): byangs dang / nga sgra dang / dbyangs rnam par dag dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cud baspos kyi glang po cha
223b5(dkon brtsegs): gas pa dag pa'i sems can sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / byams pa la sogs pa thams cad kyang bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag go// lnga'i bu bdud las rgyal dang / lha'i bu dge
223b6(dkon brtsegs): ba bkod pa dang / lha'i bu mtshams papa dang / bzang po'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / rab tu gi shing dul ba'i dbang phyug dang / lha'i bu legs par sems pa dang / de dag la sogs pa
223b7(dkon brtsegs): padakyang theg pa can pol yang dag par thugs pa'i sgra'i bu stong phrag nyi shud/ rgyam po chen po bzhid pa/ lha rnams kyi dbang po du phyin dang/ mi me da kyi bdag btsongs pa da/ sna'i bud dadapon dang
224a1(dkon brtsegs): thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po'i seng ge'i khrel bzhugs te 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ seng ge ltar
224a2(dkon brtsegs): ni sgrogs/ nyi ma sngar ni ldan ne/ zla bstang ni lum me/ sgron ma ltar ni 'bar brgya byin ltar lung de/ tshangs pa ltar nI lug ge/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus nas ri rab ltar ni 'phags te 'a
224a3(dkon brtsegs): shegs nas chos ston pan changs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba par du dgeg/ pa mar dag pa/ don pa'ang po// tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba
224a4(dkon brtsegs): de ste ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo las btsams nas/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
224a5(dkon brtsegs): na po rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa sa spyod par 'byung ba yang dag pa rab tu ston to// ya tshe shar phyogs logs kyi sangs rgyas kyi shing brgya stong phrag dgu bcu tsa gnyis 'das pa
224a6(dkon brtsegs): reg rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da stan bzhugs te/ 'gro zhing
224a7(dkon brtsegs): gshes sa thas pa tsun pa da ga sa bya chubasams dpa mam mad sa chen po gtsugs nam tshanas kya bya grub sems da sa ldan A/ zas/ da ldan sa
224a8(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin dang nal ga'a' bring dang / me'am byed/ bu 'byen thod nga med da ma ma yin pa pargya stong dums se su bskor mdun du 'dang // 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprus pa
224b1(dkon brtsegs): / nas mi snang ba gur nas lag rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dar gnas par gyur to// datshangs pa'i 'angag rten du 'dug nas rin pa che'i gdugs gcig gas stong gsum ma stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
224b2(dkon brtsegs): khebs par byas te/ me tog// kha dog du ma// 'dog sna tshogs dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jog rten gyi khams khebs par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de nyid du 'dug ste de'i tshe tshigs su
224b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang gis sdug bsngal mtha' yas bzod byas shing // brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// drang srong chen po shA ga zub sus mthong ba// lha mi rnams
224b4(dkon brtsegs): sa rnyed pa rab tu da// gang gA'i bye sa de byang chub sems dpa' mang / brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis phyir bor te// stong phrag bye ba'i bdud rnams rab tul nas// byang chub rdul bral mya ngan
224b5(dkon brtsegs): pa pa thob// 'gro ba kun gyi gtso bo bsnyen pagyung bar// shar phyogs logs kyi mchog gi 'jig rten khams// legs par sprul nas spyod pa yongs dag pa'i// rgyal ba'i bad nas bdag ni 'dis
224b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// su dag chos kyi gtam rnams nyan pa dang // phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' blta ba dang // rkang gnyis gtso bo de lang blte 'dod pa// de dag bya rgod phung por myur du shog/ 'dren pa mthong/ 
224b7(dkon brtsegs): bshin tu rnyed par dkal// zhi ba'i chos kyang thos par shin tu dka'// dal 'byor ming skye shin tu rnyed par dka'// tshul khrims dang ba'ang rtag tu rnyed par dga'// 'jig rten nam par 'dren pa bzhugs
224b8(dkon brtsegs): bde 'dod gang zhig pa med nams mi byed na// mya ngan 'das nas des ni ce bya yis// de ni rgyal ba'i drang der 'dod par bya// gang dag ngan 'gro thams cad spangs nas ni// lha mi'i nang du bde ba 'bo
225a1(dkon brtsegs): thA// mya ngan 'das 'tho ba bde 'a 'gyur 'dod pa/ mtshungs med de'i gan pa de dag so// de ni sran pa'i rgyal po bdud ci sbyin/ de ni da dpon mchog gi la ma mtshon pa// de ni chos rgyal
225a2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa 'chang// de ni sems can kun gyi rten dang dpung // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po mas tshigs su bcad pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di dag smras pas stong gsum gyi stom
225a3(dkon brtsegs): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang dbyangs kyis go ba gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bus kya tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos te/ bos nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas ma to/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
225a4(dkon brtsegs): do dang ldan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gang nas byung / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi deng brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgupa
225a5(dkon brtsegs): dang pan 'dag rten gyi khams legs par sbal pa zhes bya ba zhig med de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba da lta bar
225a6(dkon brtsegs): tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa de'i gdanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsugan rin po ma zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang bcas te la blta ba dag/ phyag bya ba dang
225a7(dkon brtsegs): bkur bya ba dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag kyang blta ba'i phyir lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cing
225a8(dkon brtsegs): la rkyen pa dang / med/ mem len pa 'argya slo ma pas pas su pa mdun sang na dun maHzhen sa tu thabs/ yod 'a na gyi/ slong gsus kyi ste can 'i 'a ga
225b1(dkon brtsegs): sas ni g.yo bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams legs par sprul pa de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi me
225b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di byi te/  byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa ga pan na pa pa sa sems can pagamed pa rnams yang dag par bskul ba'i phyi ras pa'i 'dzin rten 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
225b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi / mas go bar byas nas sems can dpag tu med pa yang dge ba'i tsab bskyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
225b4(dkon brtsegs): na po gtsug na rin pon byang chub sems dpa' ba rgya grong po dag da ngardzun cig krungs gnod sbyin dang tshwa ba dang / lham yin pa/ nam ma/ 'a rje dpa/ mi'am ci / su 'phye chen po dag me nga / mim yin
225b5(dkon brtsegs): bcwa stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bad nas na btu du/ me tog gis nirab tul tho thos// 'ad zer de 'byin/ stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni g.yo bar byed cing byang chub se
225b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i mchu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos bcom ldan 'das gal bder dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
225b7(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 
225b8(dkon brtsegs): ye ma yin pa brgya stong mang po dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches 'di skad ces
226a1(dkon brtsegs): gsam to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su dag par rab tu gnas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa rlung
226a2(dkon brtsegs): ngam/ nyam ngab nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
226a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa nyan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang la gnas na shin tu ma par phyin pa dang / shin tu
226a4(dkon brtsegs): grub pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / de dag la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i non mongs pa thams cad kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / 
226a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi spyod pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / spyod pa'i mtshan nyid rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / ye
226a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod pas 'dod chags dang / shesang dang / gti mug gi spyod 'arnam par sbyong bar 'byung ba dang / chos kyi skyid pas sems can mi mthun par spyod pa la gnas pa rnams yang dag pa'i chos kyi nan
226a7(dkon brtsegs): la mos par bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad le kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag la bdud thams
226a8(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na da lung byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad lta ba la sgrib pa sa mchis par 'gyur ba dang / de dag gi spyod pa thams cad de bzhi
226b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pas rig par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par
226b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan tu gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po tshal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
226b3(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyad pa yongs su dag pa'i dpe tsam cung zad cig bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes
226b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' gtsug ni rin po che bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
226b5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa yongs sa su dag pa ni 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / 
226b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa sgrub pa 'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can yongs su mun par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ rigs kyi thu ba ni pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su
226b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni kun tu bsngo ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni lam smra ba'i ye shes
226b8(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas par khong du tud par bya'o// bangon par shes pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni bsam gtan la sems las su rung ba'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// sems can
227a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni snying rje chen pos lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i ye shes la mkhas par khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sebs
227a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang shen/ 'dis skye/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// drug po dag gang zhes/ 'dis te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul bribs deng/ 
227a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ 
227a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta ste/ ser sna'i dri mas kun tu dkris pa'i sems sel ba dang / gtong ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'i sems 'phel bar byed pa dang / de ser sna'i dri ma bsal te gtong ba'i sems la gnas nas 'dog pa thams
227a5(dkon brtsegs): dayongs su gtong ba'i sems la gnas so// de sbyin pa sbyin pan ma dad pa bzhi mi byed de/ bani ga she na/ 'dis ste/ sems can pa da du mi byed pa dang / chos bdad pa dang / yongs su bsngob pa dad pa dang / 
227a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa tha dad du mi byed do// de la ji ltar na sems can pa da du mi byed cen/ 'di la ni sbyin/ 'di la ni mi sbyin/ 'di la ni mang du sbyin/ 'di la ni cung du sbyin/ 'di la ni bzang po sbyid/ 'di la ni ngan pa sbyin/ 28
227a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni rtag su sbyin/ 'di la ni rtag tu mi sbyin/ 'di la ni ste snang du byas te sbyin/ 'di sa ni sti snying du byas te sa sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad sbyin/ 'di la ni thams cad mi sbyid/ 'di na tshul khrims dang ldan pa/ di/ 
227a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas/ 'dini sbyin pa'i gnas ma yin// 'dis sbyid na sbyin 'arnam par dag par 'gyur/ 'di la ni rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/ 'din yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'ad
227b1(dkon brtsegs): log pa dashugs pa'o zhes bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gang 'dis bu'i sems 'gro ba spong zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / bdad pa sa yid pa dang / me ma mom dma' ba dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa
227b2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang yang dag par spyod pa dang / mtshungs par sbyin pa dang / mtshungs par byabs pa dang / mtshungs par steng rje ba dang / bye brag med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de ni sems can pa dad pa ma yin pa zhes
227b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de la ji lta ngan chos tha dad du mi byed ce na/ gang chos sla bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni sbyin/ gang chos ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ba de dag la ni mi sbyin no snyam du de ltar sems mi bskyed de/ de mos thams cad mnyam pa
227b4(dkon brtsegs): ba nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ so so'i skye bo rnams ni dman pa'o snyam du sbyin pa mi sbyin/ 'phags pa rnams ni rgya chen po'o zhes sbyin pa mi sbyin gyi/ chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis mnyam ste bye brag med pas sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di
227b5(dkon brtsegs): de chos tha dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba pa dang du mi byed ce na/ gang sbyin pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bde brgya byin thob par mi sngo// tshangs pa thob par ma yin/ rgyal po'i srid dang / 
227b6(dkon brtsegs): dang khyim bdag dang / gzugs dang / longs spyod da/ dbang phyug dang / g.yog 'dod par ma yin/ srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'che 'pho ba dang skye ba'i skye gnas rnams su dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs sus mo// nyan pos
227b7(dkon brtsegs): theg par ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ma yin te/ dag pa'i rtsa pa da dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gzhan du ma sngo pa 'don bsngo ba pa dad pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// da la de ltar na
227b8(dkon brtsegs): de pa sbed pa na bsam pa tha dad du mi byed ce na/ bsam pa mnyam pa/ spyor ba mnyam pa/ rnam par smin pa la mir ba/ pha rol la byas pa'i lan re ba med pa/ g.yo med pa dang / sbyar med pas sems bag pa/ 
228a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu yongs su btang ba'i blo sems 'gyod pa med pa gnas gsum du dang pa po bas sbyin no snyam pa dang / sbyin par byed pa dang / byin nas dad pa rab tu thob pa 'di ni bsam pa tha dang / 
228a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na tha dad pa 'di bzhi po byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su dag
228a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rkang pa dang po'o// de lta ba brgyad yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ porgyad po dag gang zhes/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tusmra pa yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du
228a4(dkon brtsegs): srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lwa ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / bzung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba yongs su dag pa ste/ lta ba brgyad po de dag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par bya
228a5(dkon brtsegs): de bag la nyal bzhi yongs su srungs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhe na/ so sora'i skye bo'i chos kyi bgal nyal dang / nyan thos kyi chos kyi bag la nyal dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
228a6(dkon brtsegs): la dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bag la nyal te/ bag la nyal bzhi pod dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de 'du shes bzhi yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ 
228a7(dkon brtsegs): zhene/ rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa ste/ 'du shes bzhi po de dag yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de rnam pa bzhi yongs su dag
228a8(dkon brtsegs): pa sbyin khyen pa byed/ bzhi ga shen/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa so/ rnam pa bani pa de dag yongs su dag par
228b1(dkon brtsegs): par byud // dadags pa gsu las shin du das nas sen pa sen par byed de/ gsupag den/ rnam par srin pa la chags pa dang / 'an bral chags pa dang / theg pa dman par bsngo ba la chags pa sa/ 
228b2(dkon brtsegs): sprin du 'das nas sbyin pa smin par byed do// de 'jigs pa gsum las shin tu 'das nas sbyin pa skyedan par byed de/ gsum gangashen/ lhag pa'i dmyal gyi 'jigs pa dang / rlom sems kyi
228b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang/ bdud gi las kyi 'jigs pa ste/ gsum po de dag las shin tu 'das nas smin pa sbyin par byed do// de rgya ba nis btab nas spyand pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhen/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byi
228b4(dkon brtsegs): dkyi rgyas btab pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa dang / byang chub stong pa nyid kyi rgyas btab pa ste/ rgya bzhi po de dag gos btab nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de brtson 'grus rtsom pa bzhi dang mi 'dra
228b5(dkon brtsegs): da pa sbyin par byed de/ bzhi gang zhen/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i brtson 'grus rlom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'gru pom pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad
228b6(dkon brtsegs): sa su rdzogs par byed pa'i 'artson 'grus cos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi nang yongs su song ba'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa de/ los 'gras rtsom pa ban pa de dag dang ma thal bar smin pa sbyin par byed do// de dran pa
228b7(dkon brtsegs): 'i 'bral bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed / bdeg na/ byang chub kyi sems dran pa dang / sangs rgyas mamang badrad pa dang / byams pa chen po dran pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dran pag/ 
228b8(dkon brtsegs): dab ban po dang ga dang sa bral bar sbyin pa skyed par byed / da' bor gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed/ gsum ga pa zhen/ bdag zhig nga yongs su dag pa dang / sems cad kyi gco yos la
229a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / byang chub kyi khang yongs su dag pa de/ 'khor gsum pa dadag yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// de shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi yongs su dag par skyen pa sbyid par
229a2(dkon brtsegs): byed de/ bzhi ga zhen/ sbyin pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa chim par byed pa shes pa yongs su dag pa dang / sku la'i chos su so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag po dang / bosngo
229a3(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog pa shes pa yongs su dag pa ste/ shes pa yongs su dag pa bzhi po de dag gis yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' des bu'i chos la zhugs pa de'i sbyin
229a4(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems de pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu des byang chub
229a5(dkon brtsegs): ses dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gcig ste/ rnam pa
229a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi snrums mnyam pa med pa'i sems/ thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/ 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las mchog tu bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang
229a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i sems/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba'i sems/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa yongs su zad par byed pa'i sems/ sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i sems/ yo
229a8(dkon brtsegs): rin po med pag tu med pa thams cad kyi sems nyid mi 'dor zhing srung ba dang / sred pa dang ma brjod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di di byeng chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
229b1(dkon brtsegs): gcan no// gas kyi gzhanaya byangan pa sems pa sa la khrims kyi sa sa tu rkyen pa myod pa mangs su ga panam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis ga nas 'dis ste/ sems ca thams ca maman
229b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / sems can de dag kyang byang chub kyi bsam pa'i tshul khrims la 'dzud pa ste/ 'di ni nom pa gnyis so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa nas
229b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gsung ste/ napa pa gsungag shes 'dis ste/ lus kyi gnod pa thams cad bas ma pas lus yongs su dag pa dang / gas ga dang gnogs spong yang/ ngag gi skyon thams cad bsil bas// dag yongs su
229b4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / 'dod pa dang gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa bsal bas sems yongs su dag pa ste 'di ni rnam pa gsum mo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
229b5(dkon brtsegs): dopa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa bzhi gang she na/ 'di lta sa/ bsgrub pa yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bslab pa yang dag par bzung ba mnyams pa dang / sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su
229b6(dkon brtsegs): smod par byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ston pa bzhin du gus par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
229b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa lnga ste/ rnam pa lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la mi srid pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / ma bslabs pa la mi brnyas pa dang / nyan pos kyi sems la ming ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mi
229b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa ste/ 'di nas pa lnga'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa nam pa drug ste/ rnam pa drug ga she na/ 'dis ste/ bslab pa las
230a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'da' bas sangs rgyas rdzas su dran pa dang / tshul khrims la 'gyod pa med pas chos rjes su dran pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la lta bas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / nyon mo
230a2(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su slong pas gdong ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba 'ams cad la mi gnas pas tshul khrims ngas su dran pa dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su ngogs par byed pas
230a3(dkon brtsegs): su dran pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa drug go// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun te/ rnam pa bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas
230a4(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad la mngon par dad pa dang / bdag nyid dbang du byas te ngo cha shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te khrel yod pa dang / nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang / bdag dang gzhan la
230a5(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba med pas nges pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol du khanam thob la 'jigs par lta bas rnam par 'tshe ba med pa dang / sems kyi yongs su gdung ba nye bar zhi bas la ron du mi 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bdun no// 
230a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sa rol tu phyin pa'i sod pa yongs su dag pa sa pa brgyad de/ rnam pa brgyad ga shen 'dus ste/ bang thaMd med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'gyis pa dang / yongs
230a7(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag med pa dang / rang bzhin kyis chog shes pas phob kyis 'jal ba mi byed pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsrungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag
230a8(dkon brtsegs): parang 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / dkon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang / 'du'adi spong bas gcig dun dga' ba dang / 
230b1(dkon brtsegs): de ses kyi dngos po dgu po rnams 'dul ba dang / sems can gyi gnas dgu po rnams las shin tu 'dra' ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po rnams kyi rtsa ba yongs su spyod pa dang / 
230b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gdu ba med pas sems ni pa dang / sems las su rung bas ni gnas kyi tshogs kun du tshol ba dang / cho ga dang tshul khrims dang lha banyams pa las shin tu 'das pas mi lhod pa dang / theg sa can
230b3(dkon brtsegs): chos su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad la se su pa dang / tshul khrims la skyon med pas shin tu mthar thug pa dang / yongs su slob la mkhas pas sems phyed pa ste/ 'di na rnam pa dgu'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
230b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi ma tu byin pa'i thud pa las dag pa nas pa na ste/ mams bcug shes sa te/ sus kyi las nas gam pa dag pa dang / rig gisas nam tshan nga
230b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / yid kyi las nas gsum yongs su dag pa da/ g.yo dang bral tes shing tu tsham pa men pa'i mas 'dang na pa dang / bsgrub pa thams cad dang mi lagal bdang / ldan par myor pa'i dngos po sngon du 'tsho/ 
230b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rjes su ston pa dang / dul zhing cang shes kyi sa'i phyir sems dasu rgo pa yin pa dang / bdag nyid byed pas sems can thams cad kyi stob mar gyur pa dang / dargyal med pas sbyin pa'i gonas rnams la 'dud cing phyag
230b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba dang / sreg gi dbang po bachos bdun du byed kyi 'jig rten gyi zang zing mdun du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa bcu'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi
231a1(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa nas pa gnas te/ rnas pa gnas ga na/ 'as/ mdzanas dang bsan ba pa dang thas pa tshul rlom pan srog gi phreng yang po 'bra
231a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mtshan pa med pa dang lhan gyis grub pa'i rdul khrims ni chos thams cad la blam 'dogs par slob pa pa/ 'di ni nas pa gnyis so// rigs kyi 'u gzhan yang bya chub sems dpa'i rnal khrims ci
231a3(dkon brtsegs): la khyen pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dis ste/ gang rnam par dag pas skyes ched dam par dag pa dang / phyirnam par dag pas su yoms cad spangs pa'o// rigs kyi bu
231a4(dkon brtsegs): 'ad yang byang chub sems dpa'i rnal khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yangs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang shes 'dig / bye chub kying bo nyid kyimatshan nyid kyis byang chub tu yongs su thob dang / 
231a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan par 'dumi byed pas rgyal khyims rnas par dag pa'i mtshan nyid/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang bsems da tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bu pa mongs su dgra pa'o// rigs kyi
231a6(dkon brtsegs): del byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhen/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dag yongs su dag pas 'di lta ro ga she yang slar mi gshe'o// lus yo
231a7(dkon brtsegs): dgapas pa dag sang sla mi dgag// sems yengs su dag pas thos kya srang mo khro'o// lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'tshig par byas kyang spar mi 'jig go// rigs kyi bugazhan yang byang chub sems
231a8(dkon brtsegs): nisems ma la lba ba'i phyir gzhan kyis don du smras sam/ don du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam thos kyang mig she'o// 'jig rten pha rol la lta ba'i phyir lag pa dang / bong ba dang dmug pas 'jigs kyang khong khro bar mi
231b1(dkon brtsegs): // byang nub kun du srung ba phyir yan lag dang nye lag bcad kyang khong khro bar mi 'dra // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de bsu pa 'od mapa mangs su 'dzin pa'i phyir spong ba la ma gzhas
231b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyilas kyis nye bar bta pa'i phyir de dag sa byams pa nya'angs pa po// sron lam yangs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de dag la zhing de myed do// 'dud kyilas dang nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir gang slang yang
231b3(dkon brtsegs): la'an par sems shing snying rje dang ldan te byang chub kyi yan lag tu nges par sbyin par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgya dang gyi mu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran
231b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzod do// stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub rjes su dran zhing ma'od do// dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes pathong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ye shes rjes su dran zhing bzod
231b5(dkon brtsegs): ma pa chen pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir man par 'dod pades su dran bzo pa/ sing chen po yongs su rdzogs pa bya ba'i phyir 'bras bu yod pa rnam par gnon sangs su d+hi shing bad do// 
231b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir seng ge bsgyings pa rjes su dran ning bzod // sems can thams sngal 'dud pa'i phyir smyig tsug bstar mi snang brjes su dran ning bzod do// 'angag rten thams cad kyis
231b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mnon pa'i phyir mtshan da dpe bud bzang po rjes su dran zhing bzod do// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes myang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rjes bu dra
231b8(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i bzod pa ni sbubs gnyis kyis yongs dag par 'gyu te/ gnyis ga zhed 'disas/ sa ser rtog pa'i stobs dang thob pa'i stobs so// de la gang lus dang sems la gnas te bzod pa
232a1(dkon brtsegs): ma rtag pa'i thobs so// tshas thams cad la gdang ta chad pananam pa'i spongs sa// rigs pa gzhan pa byang chu ba mas dpar ba mamangs rgyun chud pa yongs su dag pa ni ga
232a2(dkon brtsegs): sems cad bapas cad la bdag med par 'azod cing chos thams cad la dben par babod de/ gang chos thams cad la mi bzod pa de ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir nes/ 'di la don dam par gang bzod/ 
232a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'/ mi bzod pa'i chos gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad khas mi len pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ chos pas len pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams
232a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la zhus pa med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ thus pa lani bzod pa yongs su dag pa gang yang med do// gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de'i 'dod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ 'di pa la ni bzod pa yong/ 
232a5(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa gang yang med do// gang la bdag med pa dang sems can med pa dang / chos med pa de'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa ste/ bdag dang sems cad dang / chos la gnas pa la ni bzod pa yongs su dgapa
232a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yong su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen 'dis ste/ lus rnam par 'jal ba'i bzod pa yongs su
232a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / mos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du bzod pa yongs su dag paste/ gnyis po de dag go// rigs kyi bu 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// 
232a8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pag shen kang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba/ dgos pa dang dgos pa ma yin pa la zhum pa med pa/ rtsom pas
232b1(dkon brtsegs): sengal pa dge ba'i rtsa ba mag/ pal mazhen pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag las byer pa ldogasardzas thams cad yongs su rgyal pal btsun pa/ chos thams cad snyan par tsam pa/ chos thams cad ya
232b2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa la spro ba/ mchod srin chen po las stsol pa/ sems can rnams yongs sasu sren par byed pa la yongs su'i phyog sangs rgyas lce ni rnam par spyod pa/ theg pa dman pa las shin du 'da' ba/ sngon
232b3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang phos pa'i tshogs sog pa/ sngon gyi bsod nams bsags pa chud mi gzon pa/ de rgyal med pas sems can thams cad la rim gro bya
232b4(dkon brtsegs): cog byed pa ste/ 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// pa'i yongs su dag pa ga zhen/ gang lus la mig mo dang gzugs brtan du zhes pa/ tshig la brjod du med par shes pa sems la nin
232b5(dkon brtsegs): ba sheb shes gzad pa shes pa rnam par rig pa/ zad pa shes rab tu shes pa/ mi skye ba shes pa nges par rtogs pa'o// de rtsom pa gsum las rnam par grol bar brtson 'grus rtsom ste gsum gang zhe na/ 
232b6(dkon brtsegs): gdus pa'i cos pa dang / dmigs pa'i rtsos pa dang / yongs su rtog pa'i tsam pa ste/ gsum po de dag go// de chags pa gsum la mi chags par brtson 'grus com ste/ gsum gshen/ mig dang gzugs
232b7(dkon brtsegs): dmig gi rnapa par shes pa la mi chags pa/ rna ba dang / snga dang na pa'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ snga dang dri dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lce dang ro dang sde'i rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa/ lus dang
232b8(dkon brtsegs): kab+hadang lus kyi ram par shes pa la mi chags pa/ yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi chags pa'o// de 'dzin pa med cing 'dod ba med pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pas smin pa mi men/ ser sna mi / 
233a1(dkon brtsegs): rdul drims ma dzes/ 'jal pa'i tshul khrims pa 'dod// 'acod pa mi len/ gnod sems kyi 'dod/ brtson 'grus mi len/ ma mo ma 'dor bsam gtan mi chen/ gzeng ba
233a2(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mi len/ 'chal pa'i shes rab mi 'dor/ dge ba mi len mi dge ba mi 'dor/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi len/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi 'dor ro// 
233a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis yongs su dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de la gnyis gang zhes/ ga nang gi kun du ldang ba las dmigs pa kun du ltung ba dang / phyi rol tu rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i nges su 'brang ba
233a4(dkon brtsegs): / bde ni gnyis shes bya'o// de la gnyis yongs su dag pa gang she na/ gang nang nye ba yizhi pas phyi rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / spros pa med pa ste/ 'di ni gnyis yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rgyu ba med cing ma spros pa
233a5(dkon brtsegs): spros pa med pa'i brtson 'grus 'di lta bu de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi
233a6(dkon brtsegs): na pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhan/ gang bsam gtad gyi yan lag rnams yang dag par sgrub cing yang dag par bsgrubs nas so sor rtog pa dang / so sor brtags nas kyang stoms par 'jug pas
233a7(dkon brtsegs): / debasamago tan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bsam gtan byed kyang tshor ba la ma yid/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan
233a8(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// de bas pa gtan byed kyang mig la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ dbasam gtan byed kyang na ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sA la ma yin/ lcel ma yin/ lus la ma yin yi
233b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ sbal ma yin/ dril ma yin/ rol ma yin/ reg byal ma yin/ chos la gnas te bsam ga tan
233b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ debs sa gtan byed kyang sus rnam pa nyig pa la gnas nye bas cwog tan ma myo da tan byed kyang sems nas par rtog pa la gnas byabs na / dbusam ga
233b3(dkon brtsegs): grangs la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ de bzhin du dul ma yin me la ma yin/ rlungal ma yin/ sam mkha' ma gdas tapas mi gtan ma myed do/  ta bye / nyim la ma ma
233b4(dkon brtsegs): byed la ma yin/ tshangs pa la ma yin/ skye dgu'i bdag po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ gzugs kyi khams la ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i
233b5(dkon brtsegs): la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed/ 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang
233b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bar gnas te mi g.yo bar gyur cing bsam gtan byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang bdag nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sems can la
233b7(dkon brtsegs): / srog la ma yin/ gso ba la ma yin/ gang zag la ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu nye bar len pa'i lta ba la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang chad par lta ba/ 
233b8(dkon brtsegs): ngas te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang rtag par lta ba ma yin/ 'byung bar lta ba ma yin// 'jig par lta ba khas blangs te bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang zag pa
234a1(dkon brtsegs): shin tu zad par bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan mi byed do// de bsam gtan byed kyang sgron med pa la 'jug pa dang 'bras bu thob pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan ma byed pa
234b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin pa tshang ba med pa/ drad pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang skabs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i las yan lag brgyad pa
234b2(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa/ sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / nges pa ma tshang ba med pa/ shes pa dang khrel yod pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ mi dge
234b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos dang mi ldan pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ dge
234b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dun gyi tshul yongs su sdud pa dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la lta bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrubs pas legs par brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi
234b5(dkon brtsegs): byings yongs su rdzogs par bsngos pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i stong
234b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis yang dag par bzung ba/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rab tu gnas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang rjes su 'thun pa/ nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ma 'dres pa/ 
234b7(dkon brtsegs): bgachags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa bsal pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes dang ma bral ba/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa ston pa bzhi thob pa/ 'jig rten dang
234b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pas ma smad pa/ drang ba mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsnga
235a1(dkon brtsegs): sel ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spyod pa/ chu bo las grol ba 'dzin pa thams cad gcod pa rang bzhin gyis nye bar bri ba las dang nyod mongs pa thams cad kyis na
235a2(dkon brtsegs): she ga chos nyid kyis btang sgoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/ rang shematshan nyid kyis bem po byin gyis brlabs bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba med pa/ rang gi rang gis lung du
235a3(dkon brtsegs): pa bstan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa/ nye bar ni bas bsil bar gyur pa/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bar ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang lnga
235a4(dkon brtsegs): 'istong pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'dis ste/ dper na yongs su brtag pa 'thung me/ stong gsum gyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji skad yod pa de dag thams cad ri mos
235a5(dkon brtsegs): bo ba dad par bslabs pa/ yan lag rnam par bye ba tha dad du bslabs par gyur te/ da la la la ni sa gcod pa la mnakhas kyang 'dri ba la mi mkhas/ la la ni gtan la 'bebs pa la mkhas
235a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yan lag dang ting lag la mi mkhas// ba cig ni gang lag 'dri ba la mkhas kyang mig dang mgyo ngan pa 'dri ba la mi mkhas pa dag cig yin la/ rigs kyi bu de ltar rnam pa bdad du bslab
235a7(dkon brtsegs): yan lag rnam par dbye ba la tha dad du bslabs pa/ gzugs tha dad du bslabs pa'i ri mo mkhan de dag thams cad la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas ngas shig byin te/ 
235a8(dkon brtsegs): dmas kyis ras 'di la nga'i gzugs bris te 'on cig khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang 'di la ri mo bris shag/ de nas ri mo mkhan de dag sogs na ma ras de brkyangs pa las ri mo ma khan de dag gis
235b1(dkon brtsegs): sar so mkhan gcig cag yul gzhan shig tu song bar gyur la/ de nas ri mo mkhan phye ma de dag gis de la rgyal ba de'i gzugs bres na/ rigs kyi bu 'di snyam du sems/ ri mo mkhan gcig pa
235b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i lag tu ma grangs na dus de rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par 'gyu ngas/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das den pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu
235b3(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du don rnam par rig par bya ba'i phyir 'di dper byas te/ 'di'i don cing blta zhe na/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar ri mo mkhan gcig po de med na ras der ma pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par mi 'gyur
235b4(dkon brtsegs): ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu rnam pa ji snyed dang / spyod pa ji snyed dang / brtson pa ji snyed kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i rnam pa de dag las gal te rnam pa gcig ma bstan na yang
235b5(dkon brtsegs): dpapa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin no// nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par bsdus shing lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / 
235b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan pa la dmigs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid yin no// bstan pa 'di nges par
235b7(dkon brtsegs): bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong gis rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi
235b8(dkon brtsegs): pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' di shes rab yang
236a1(dkon brtsegs): su dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa
236a2(dkon brtsegs): med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yang de'i she
236a3(dkon brtsegs): rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang
236a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams cad la yang de'i shes pa
236a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug par
236a6(dkon brtsegs): na cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / bden pa shes pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba
236a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / kun rdzob bstan pa la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / don dam pa bstan pa la lang
236a8(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med par 'jug pa dang / sems can gyi dbang po dang brtson 'grus rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir rab dang / 'bring dang ma pa'i dbang po mchog das
236b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ma yin pa shes pas sems can thams cad la yang de'i shes rab dang ye shes mthang ba chags pa med cang thags pa med par 'jug pa yin te/ de'i shes rab de yang 'phags pa zag pa ma
236b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa sems can gyi bsam pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ gting dpag dka' ste mthong bar dka' ning za ba la khong du chud par dka' ba
236b3(dkon brtsegs): phrag phyed cing nges par rtogs pa/ lta ba dang bral ba/ bag chags bsal ba/ bdag stong pa nyid du rtogs pa/ thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul shes pa/ de
236b4(dkon brtsegs): la nges par rtogs pa/ shin tu lcogs pa shin tu sbyangs pa/ ci yang sdang ba med pa 'gal ba med pa ma 'gags pa/ dus dang dus ma yin pa la rtog pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba skyon med pa/ lag
236b5(dkon brtsegs): ra bsrungs pa/ skyon med pa la dga' ba/ bden pa khong du chud pa/ 'gog pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs pa/ shin du rgal pa thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gcig tu spyod pa med pa spyod pa
236b6(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyad pa spyod pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la spyod pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las phyir log kyang gang nas kyang 'ongs pa med pa/ yul thams cad las shin tu
236b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul las phyir ma log pa/ rtsom pa thams cad las shin du 'das kyang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa las phyir ma log pa/ spyod pa thams cad las shin du
236b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyang dge ba'i spyod pa las phyir ma log pa/ sems kyi dmigs pa thams cad las shin du 'das kyang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa las phyir mi log pa/ nye bar len pa la skye
237a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyang nye bar len pa med par 'bang ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis ma gos kyang 'jig rten dang ma bral ba/ lus med kyang sems can thams cad kyi/ spyod pa dang bas
237a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'o// de'i shes rab de yang de'i ngang tshul la spyod pa myur du khong du chud pa/ dbang po smin par 'gyur ba/ yun ring por lta ba rtag tu gyur
237a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po la gzhol ba/ dge basbyin pa la spyod pa nye bar len pa med par 'bar ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba/ sems can tham
237a4(dkon brtsegs): cad tshim par byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ don thams cad rjes su rtogs pa/ chos thams cad ro mtshungs pa/ thabs thams cad kyis yang dag par bzung ba'o// rigs kyi
237a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni srid pa'i pha rol tu song ba dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// mtshan ma thams cad dang dmigs pa thams cad dang / sems can
237a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu song bas de'i phyi shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa ni gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'di sa ste/ chags pa sred
237a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// gzhan yongs su dag pa gnyis te/ gnyis gang
237a8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / lta pa yongs su dag pa ste/ de dag ni yongs su dag pa gnyis so// de'i shes rab de yang thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ sems can gyi rjes su
237b1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ rdzas kyi rjes su mtho ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis byung mtshams snar ba grang med la smra ba 'ganas thams cadamatshams kyang ru ngo // der shes rab dag/ 
237b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med la yul thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la yang gnas so// de'i shes rab don mtha' dang yang bral la dbus la yang mi gnas so// de'i shes rab/ 
237b3(dkon brtsegs): deni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bas sgrib pa med pa'i spyod yul la 'byung ba shin tu mthong ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa yang rnyed pa'o// de'i shes rab de ni chos thams cad shes shing mngon par/ 
237b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'o// de'i shes rab de ni chos kyi don thams cad dang ldan yang ldan pa yang ma yin mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ bral ba yang ma yin te sbyor ba'am/ mi sbyor ba 'am/ 
237b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi 'byung gnas ni ye shes kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas
237b6(dkon brtsegs): // so /  gnas sbyi ni// skyon tu la ga sa yin/  nga gnas yind// klurnaMs 'i 'byung gi sa pa na/ 
237b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rig pa'i 'byung gnas yin no// yon tan dang ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i 'byung gnas yin te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes
237b8(dkon brtsegs): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor de'i nang nas lha dang mi srog chags nyi khre nyis
238a1(dkon brtsegs): stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// 
238a2(dkon brtsegs): dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lha'i bu khri ni chos rnams lnga chos kyi myig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag nas de
238a3(dkon brtsegs): dag tshig 'di skad ces 'dzer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod po yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi ga'i le'u 'di thos par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni
238a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags na/ gang dag thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang ston pa dang / 
238a5(dkon brtsegs): spros kyang ci 'tshal zhes smras so// bam po gnyis pa/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che la bka'i stsal pa
238a6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ste phyogs kyi chos kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang she na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta pa
238a7(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar klanag pa lnga gnas te/ sras rnam pa gnyis sum par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i blun pa nye bar 'jog// nas pa gnyis sus sod TIg+sa pa dang ldan pa ga shen
238a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtag pa dang ldan pa dang / sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// de la mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa ga
238b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba ste/ bcog pas yongs su gang ba/ yun thung zhing byis pa 'dreng ba yin no zhes zla ba 'di ni mi sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'o// 
238b2(dkon brtsegs): des ldog pa rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa ga pa zhes/ 'di lta ste/ gang lur mi gtsang ba grogs med pa 'des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku bsod nams kyi sku/ ye
238b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sku/ gzugs mthong na sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba'i sku
238b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya'i snyam pa 'di ni sdug pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa gnyis su so sor rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gnag
238b5(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa ni chos gnyis yongs su spyod de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di
238b6(dkon brtsegs): lha ste/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / rtag pa'i rnam pa'o// de la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa gang shen/ kye ma lus 'dir mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste/ ring byor mi gnas pa/ thamar 'chi bya yin pa
238b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mthun pa'i 'tsho bya mi spyod cing snying po nyid len to// de sring po gsum len te/ gsum ga shed/ lus kyi snying po dang longs spyod kyi sring po dang / 'jo ba'i snying byed
238b8(dkon brtsegs): gsum po// de lus mi rtag gos mnas sems can thams cad kyi phrin dang slobs papas blangs tiHsh+tsa cig la 'bad pa yin/ lus mi rtog go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yod pang
239a1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo dang tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// lus me rtag go snyam nas srog la bag ma rton par 'gyur te/ srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do// lus mi rtag
239a2(dkon brtsegs): go skam nas longs spyod la sred cing chags par mi byed do// bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rtag pa'i rnam pas lus
239a3(dkon brtsegs): la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ de las yon tan gyi phan yon rab tu 'thob po// de la rtag pa'i rnam pa gang zhe na/ gang lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i byang chub sems
239a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' dge ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi dpyod pa'i ye shes skyes shing thung ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / chos kyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad pa dang / 
239a5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir thams cad bakhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ste/ sems can thams cad la btang ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byed pa 'di ni rtag pa'i
239a6(dkon brtsegs): dam pa zhes bya'o// gang mi zad pa ni dag pa zhes bya ste/ 'dus ma byas ni mi zad pa zhes bya'o// 'dus ma byas ni rtag pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa bcom pa thams cad mche
239a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'dus ma byas nyid du yongs su sngo ba 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rtags zhes bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi
239a8(dkon brtsegs): / dayul dang / mtshan mo med pa nges par brtags pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chu 'thun pas brtson 'grus brtsam pa thams can rtsom pa 'di ni rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// nam mkha' ni rtog pa zhi
239b1(dkon brtsegs): b+ha ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par ma rtag pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di de rtag pa'i rnam pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub
239b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lus lnga lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dren pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa de bdag gi lus de la sems can thams cad kyi lus sde bar 'dogs shing bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi
239b3(dkon brtsegs): lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la gnas par bya'o snyam ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog go/ 
239b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so// de zag pa med pa'i lus kyis zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
239b5(dkon brtsegs): so// de zag pa med pa'i sems kyis kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zag pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par yongs su sngo'o// de zag pa med pa'i chos thob pas zag pa las 'byung bar mi byed
239b6(dkon brtsegs): do// zag pa rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang sred pa'i zug pa dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang / lta ba'i zag pa'o// de 'dod pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas sems
239b7(dkon brtsegs): na yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'dod pa'i khams su skye'o// srid pa'i zag pa yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa
239b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin to// ma rig pa'i bag pa dang ba'i zag pa de gnyis rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' nal 'byam pa 'jug go// lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye ba
240a1(dkon brtsegs): rdul pa rdzas la na tsas nas kyang ma ba mag/ lamyal gyi ba'i a yangs 'ab bar sa lag go// lus la dka/  zung nga bkun gyis dpan pa
240a2(dkon brtsegs): so sor rtog go// de de ltar lus la rjes su la zhing gnas pas lus dang ldan pa'i 'jig tshogs la sta mi skyed do// 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang bral bas bdag gir mi byed do// bdag gir
240a3(dkon brtsegs): med pas yongs su 'dzin pa la yongs su mi 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin pa med pas rtsod pa med pa rab tu 'thob po// rtsod pa spangs pas gnod sems med do// gnod sems med pas pa'ang
240a4(dkon brtsegs): btu 'thob po// bzod pa rab tu thob pas phyir khengs par yang mi 'gyur 'dud par yang mi 'gyur ro// khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur bas chos nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// chos
240a5(dkon brtsegs): de la gnas pas phyir yang chos ma yin pa spyod par mi 'gyur ro// chos spyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i 'gros su song ngo // chos kyi 'gros su song bas chos dang ldan pa'i grogs po rab
240a6(dkon brtsegs): chos dang ldan pa'i grogs pos yongs su bzung bas chos dang ldan pa'i mnyan pa thos par 'gyur ro// chos thos pa dang ldan pas phyir yang yul rnams la zag par mi 'gyur ro// de
240a7(dkon brtsegs): la bsrungs pas ting nge 'dzin grub po// mnyam par bzhag pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas phyir yang rtog par mi byed do// 
240a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par rtog par mi byed do// rnam par mi rtog pas mi 'gyur ro// mi 'gyur bas phyir yang mi byed do// rnam par mi byed do// nam mi byed rnam par mi byed pa de ni chos mnyam pa nyid kyis
240b1(dkon brtsegs): lbu ba bzhin tho 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa
240b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag bye gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba rnam
240b3(dkon brtsegs): la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa smos pa na tshor ba la bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro// de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin nos
240b4(dkon brtsegs): spob ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spang ba'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgos so// de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos kyang
240b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do// des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed de/ de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba de na 'dod chags la spyod
240b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gi 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal ba yang rab tu spong ngo // nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bden ni sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnye
240b7(dkon brtsegs): de/ bdag gi zhe nga gi bag la nyal yang yatu spong ngo // nas bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i nga byong ba den gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi gti mug
240b8(dkon brtsegs): gal nyal yang sa tu byung ngo // de bde ba'i byer ba la rjes su chags pa yi la// rjes su chags pa legs par 'dams par yang byed do// de sdug 'asngal gyi tshor ba la/  ma sa la/ skye/ khong slob lags
241a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'joms par yang byed do// sdug bsngal yang ma yin pade pa yang ma yin pa'i char ba la ma rig bdang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ ma rig pa lags par 'joms par yang byed do// des tshang
241a2(dkon brtsegs): gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar byed do// sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do// bdag med par shes shing myong bar byed do// de bde ba'i tshor ba la nomi rtag par shes
241a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa de ba lang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro// de ltar na gang bde ba ni mi rtag pa'o//

241a5(dkon brtsegs): /  gnas pa de chos thams cad sbas pa dang / theg pa dang nu ba dang / gnas pa med par shes so// chos thams cad la skye ba dang 'jig par yangs sor rtog go// so sor rtog pan chos skye ba de dag gang nas rong
241a6(dkon brtsegs): gag pa rnams gang du gog/ par 'gyur snyam du chos rnams kyi skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des chos rnams gang nas kyang mi 'o gang du yang mi 'gro bar shes nas tsho ba thams
241a7(dkon brtsegs): daldan chad bang sgrub po// bslabs nas kya nan tan du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba 'gag par byed kyi/ byadag 'tha' shega'i tsha ba la dag par byed pa ni ma yin te/ gas/ 
241a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin byang chu sems da'i tshar ba rnams mchis rjes su lta ba'i drin pa nyi bang ga thag pathabs mkhas pa dang / gling chen pos yongs su yin pa'o// gang tshor ba 'gag pa yang rab tu shes mchom
241b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa mngon sum du yang ma byed/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag bsgom pa la gnas pa de tshor ba rnams la dben pa dang / rnam par dben par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu

241b3(dkon brtsegs): rnal rag lus pa'o bdag po med pa'o nga yi ba med pa'o yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// des yang dag par na rgyu dang rkyen de dag gi dngos po mi dmigs so// de ma dmigs nas 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar rkyen
241b4(dkon brtsegs): stong ba yin pa de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang stong pa'o snyam nas de stong pa nyid kyi do na rig pas lus dben pa dang / sems dben pa dang don shes pa dang chos rnams shes pa dang / ye shes rig
241b5(dkon brtsegs): sa tshor ba rnams la tshong ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams 'a'atsha ba'i rjes su lta ba dzin pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang

241b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhag pas gnas pa byang chub kyi sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin du nye bar 'azhag ste/ sems dran pa'i ye shes kyis sems kun du tshol lo// de sems kun du tshol ba na sems nang na yang yang da/ 
241b8(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mi mthong / sems phyi lan yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'asems bye dang nang na yang yang dag par rjes su me mthong zung rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / khams// 
242a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la yang sems yang dag par rdzas su ma mthong / skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // des sems yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas sems ga
242a2(dkon brtsegs): las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun du tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ dmigs pa yod pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems
242a3(dkon brtsegs): de yang gzhan nas 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin/ gal te dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems kyang gzhan yin na ni sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro// 'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyi
242a4(dkon brtsegs): sems yin na ni sems kyis sems de ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/ sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rungango // 'di lta snying dper na ram gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gre'i so de nyid gcad par mi nus pa dang / 
242a5(dkon brtsegs): song mo'i rje mo nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse ma de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam nas/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba las gang
242a6(dkon brtsegs): sems mi gnas pa chad pa ma yin pa/ rtag pa ma yin pa/ ther zug tu mi gnas pa/ rgyu med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang mi 'gal ba/ de las kyang ma yin gzhan las kyang ma yin pa/ de nyid k+Sha
242a7(dkon brtsegs): yin gzhan yang ma yin pa'i sems kyi rgyud sems kyi 'bri shing sems kyi chos nyid sems mi gnas pa dang / sems kyu med pa dang / sems sdung ba med pa dang / sems kyi rang gi mtshan nyid
242a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin nyid mjug par mi byed 'di la shes so// de lta pa song ngo // de bzhin nyid de la bde bzhin du sems de dgi dben pa nyid du rab tu shis/ de 'byin du mthong ba 'di na rigs kyi kyi
242b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gnag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sems la cung zad tsam yang mi mthong / rnam par yong/ mi
242b2(dkon brtsegs): tag rnam par ma tog g.yo mang rlom sems med/ spros pa med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar ma
242b3(dkon brtsegs): thugs med pa de bzhin du sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gzugs med pa
242b4(dkon brtsegs): nadu byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa yang gzugs med pa'o// ji ltar byang chub kyi sems su bsngos pa gzugs med pa de bzhin du byang chub de la gzugs med de de'i
242b5(dkon brtsegs): zhe no// spyod pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lta bar yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang ban ni byang chub po// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad de/ 
242b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa 'don byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rdzas su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa/ rab tu mgyogs pa
242b7(dkon brtsegs): nas par sgrur/ spre'u dang rlung 'dra ba/ 'bab chu'i rgyun dang 'bru mar gyi mar ma dang 'dra ba rgyang ring por 'grab lus med pa/ dul la brtsam pa skye mched drug la spyod yul pa/ gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes par
242b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i sems gnas pa/ rtse gcig pa mi 'gro ba rnam par mi 'gro ba ni gnas la rtsa gcig pa/ g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o// dong dran pa nye bar gzhug pa yongs su rdzog
243a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa gang zhe na/ gang sems la rnam par 'byed par shes pa dang / sems la chos kyi dbyings su gnas par shes pa dang / sems la sems gnas par shes pa dang / sems la
243a2(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar shes pa dang / sems la ji ba bzhin du shes pa dang / sems la mngon sum gyi shes pas rab tu shes pa dang / sems la sgyu ma'i chos su shes pa dang / se
243a3(dkon brtsegs): la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang / sems la de kho na shes pa dang / sems la g.yo ba med cing gzung ba med par shes pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// 
243a4(dkon brtsegs): nga gi sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rang bzhin yang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi rang bzhin de yongs su shes nas de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi
243a5(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin pa dang tu shes so// sems kyi ngo bo nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// rang gi sems kyi mtshan nyid
243a6(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyang de yin par rab tu shes so// sems kyi mtshan nyid de shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// ji ltar rang gi sems stong pa des
243a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang stong par rab tu shes so// sems de dag stong pa nyid du shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de rang gi sems yang dag par 'du ba gang yin pa sems can tha
243a8(dkon brtsegs): kye sems yang dag par 'du ba yang de yin par rab su shes so// sems yang dag par 'du ba de dag shes nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to// de nga gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can
243b1(dkon brtsegs): sems mnyam pa nyid du rabatu shes so// sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu shes so// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rgya chung
243b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid du rang tu shes shing sems kyis 'gru par mi byed de dang bar mi 'gyur ro// sems gnas pas chos kyi dbyes gnas pa rjes su shes kyang sems gnas pa'i chos nyid de las kyang ma gso
243b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'i sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye ba gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dga'a'o// khyig kyi ru de pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyi rje
243b4(dkon brtsegs): su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la chos kyis rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa 'di
243b5(dkon brtsegs): mas te/ chos kho na skye ba rnams skye/ chos kho na 'gag pa rnams 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam sems can nam/ srog gam skye ba po'am/ gso ba'am skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam shed las skyes pa
243b6(dkon brtsegs): ma/ shed bu ba gang skye ba'am/ rke ba'am 'chi ma 'am/ 'phoba'am skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do// 'di chos/ mas kyi chos nyid de/ gal te bsrung por ni 'grub ma bsrubs na rnaM mi 'grub ste/ dge
243b7(dkon brtsegs): myi dge ba yang dang / mi lo ba yang ts+tsha lta rdzabs pado// pa thu / yo rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med mchos rnam med pa gam
243b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar chos dran pa'i ye shes skye ste/ gang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang / mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du byed pa dang gsum mo// de la bdag gis ni bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa pa
244a1(dkon brtsegs): / par bya'o// deni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa/ mchog dam par bakhyad par du 'phags pa bcu'i skur 'gyur te/ ban po dag gang zhen 'di lnga ste/ lus yongs su dag pas
244a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpe byad babang po dang spyig tsug bltar mi mthong bdang / pa ros gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad las shin du 'das pa dang / yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa re gsung sems can thams cad ma
244a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa rnam pa drug cu shin du yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin mi 'khrugs pa dang / so so yang
244a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rig pa yongs su dag pas don dang / chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa mi zad pa dang / byams pa chen po yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i yam la rab tu 'god
244a5(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po yongs su dag pas bskal pa dpag tu med par 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / stob pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
244a6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa dang / mi ririgs pa yongs su rdzogs pas par du gcod pa dang bar du gcod pa'i cho su yin par la/ tshogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
244a7(dkon brtsegs): da da ltar byung ba dang / dus gsum la mi chags pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs rdzogs pas rang byung gi ye shes pa / rtogs pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos blan med pad
