267a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sebs dpa' chen po btsun 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal de sems rab tu dang bar shes nas pa'i mtshogs su bcad pa 'di dag sras so// zas dang skom dang gos dang ba
267a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams// gzhon nu bdag la dgos pa yang med// bang ping med pa'i sems na nyir gzhag nas/ bdag chos kyi 'o nyar 'dir 'ongs so// 'jig rten don mdzad drang srong cher byung ba// mi mchog dri/ 
267b1(dkon brtsegs): pa med par snang zhes bya// de ni sdug bsngal mtha' 'byer chos ston te// sems can gang gis thos pas me' che 'thob// bskal pa snang phrag bya ba grangs med// sangs rgyab rnams ni brgya lam 'a
267b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// da ltar 'jig rten mun nug sngon gyur pa// yon tan dam pa mnga' bde skyes na// khyod ni 'dir 'dod pa'i yon tan chags// gzugs dang longs spyod rnams la rtag tu myos// sgyid myos de
267b3(dkon brtsegs): la srid myos pas na// chos kyi rgyal po lta bar yong mi 'gro// longs spyod mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ rnga rtse'i zil thigs 'dra zhes rgyal bas gsungs// gang phyir sangs rgyas thos kyang myos 'gyur
267b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal bu khrod kyi ma ma yin// khyod ni 'din bya bcub mchog zhugs la// sems can dag kyang gnyer te grol bar kyis// khyod bdag da ltar 'dod pa'i dran gyur na// ji ltar myos pas skye bo 'dul bar 'gyur// 
267b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsal spongs te nyon mongs rnams sol la// nga ni rgyal ba'i drung du 'gro bar gyis// brtson 'grub pa skyed de 'jig rten snying brtse gyis// dri ma'i dus na gdung bar gyur ta re// rgyal bus tshigs su bcad pa 'di
267b6(dkon brtsegs): thos nas/  rgyar spangs te gus pa rab bskyed nas// brtson 'grus 'bar ba'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te// gang sngon bdag gis gnod pa kyis bzod par gsol// bdag ni rgyal srid thams cad spang ba
267b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod dang de bzhin longs spyod kun mi tshol// brgyal tha ba'i sgron dang dregs spangs te// myur du bde bar gshegs pa'i gan du 'gro// de ni srog chags bye ba brgyad cus bskor// me tog na bza'
267b8(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bdug pa thogs// dri ma med par snang ba skyes bu mchog/ rgyal ba de yi drung du nye bar song // bde bar gshegs kyi gan du phyin nas kyang // zhabs la phyag 'tsho ba nas mchong byas te// de
268a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa da ye san sngar 'dug/ rgyal bu de yis tshig ni 'di smras so// gang phyir skyomang sems kyis bskal bas na// brtson 'grus 'bar ba bdag gi ston pa mgon// ji ltar de ni
268a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ris lags na// de la lan du phan pa babyed patshul// bdag ni 'jig rten mgo la bzod par gsol 'chos kyi rgyal la gus pa gangam bgyis// de dag thams cad rings por bshags// bdag gi
268a3(dkon brtsegs): nongs pa 'jig rten mgon mkhyen mdzod// sems can don du snying rje bskyed nas su// bdag ni byang chub mchog la rab zhugs te// byang chub dam mchog ma thob par du ni// slan chad bag med spyod pa mi bgyi'o// 
268a4(dkon brtsegs): de yis rgyal sred rnam spangs te// sems can byeb brgyad bu rnams kyis bskor// byang chub dam pa 'di ni yong sa tshol zhing // mngon srung rgyal ba'i bstan la rab tu byung // rgyal bas de dag gi ni bsam mkhyen nas// 
268a5(dkon brtsegs): byabachub lam mchog rab tu bstan pas na// chos thos sems can rtag tu dag pa rnam pa// thams cad kyis kyang rjes 'thun bzod pa lab// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am bskal ba las lhag par de bzhin

268b1(dkon brtsegs): yang gnyis bu krung na yang de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyi bzhen/ byang chub bems dpa' 'ams dpa chen po thams pa 'ad ni tshe 'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu nor dpal zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de ltar sngon kyang

268b4(dkon brtsegs): las yin no// rigs kyi bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sdud par 'gyur ba'o// na bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi las las shin
268b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'da' ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi shing yongs su skyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / lus dang ngag dang yid brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang da

268b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud par 'gyur ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bsam pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes dang / dbang po yongs su shes pa'i ye
268b8(dkon brtsegs): shes dang / nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i sman sbyin pa'i yeng shes dang / nyon mongs pa'i nad thamang cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yi bakhrugs pa'i ye shes te/ rigs kyi bu rin po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis

269b3(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mnyan la shin du snyan pa'i gsung // skyes bu dam pa bde rab sbyin pa dran mchog blo gros thugs// bde gshegs mos pa mchog dang bden pa lnga dang mis mchod pa// ci slad 'dzum pa 'di mdzad phan pa mdzad pas

269b6(dkon brtsegs): som 'od dang dpal ni rabargyas pa// bde bar gshegs pa 'jam mngang phan yam dzad pas bka' stsol cig/ gser ri 'di 'dra ba dul zhugs grub pa bsod nam pa ye shes 'gro// mkhas pas rtag tu rab bsngags 'jig/

269b8(dkon brtsegs): yid mnyam mos pa mnyam pa khrel yong dpal gyis rab tu rgyas// yon tan bcu rnams shin du rgyas pa'i mtshan ni rab rdzogs pa// bde gshag pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa thub pa dam pa bka' stsol cig/ kun du
270a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyi ye shes du pa gsum chags pa mad par 'jug/ sems dang yid sbyar dbang ba gang da thams can bsam pa gang // sems can kun kya bsam bca 'dra thams cad skad cig maldan/ 
270a2(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ges gang slad 'dzum mdzad rigs don bdag la gsungs// nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha yang yid kyang rab tu dga'// mi'i tshogs pa la gnas pa thal sbyar phyag 'tshal gyis// gang thos lha
270a3(dkon brtsegs): mi mun pa'i dus rnams sal 'gyung ba// mi mchog gis ni bdud rtsi'i romachog dbye bar gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

270a5(dkon brtsegs): gtsug gi ning bu rin po che 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' se
270a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po che 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi them snyed mnyes par bya kyi srang du byas btsun par byas/ ri mor bras shing mchod nas thams cad du yang tshangs par
270a7(dkon brtsegs): da / mas gag sa ga sa pa gsus pa dag pa sem smin pa kyal po// gas blas chub sems dpa gtan me na mas me pa na
270a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dri ma med pa la 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde ba gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ 
270b1(dkon brtsegs): byas bu 'dul ba lib lo skur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang marnams bston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam che 'thung ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'brang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de'i sa gzhin
270b2(dkon brtsegs): dga'o di sa rig par gyur pa de dag kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gzir bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med pa de yang 'byor ba/ rgas pa/ byang rgyar sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi gnas su 'gyur
270b3(dkon brtsegs): ro// dang byang chub sems dpa'i rin po me ma gtogs par rin po che gzhan 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ming rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
270b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de dag gi longs spyod dang kun spong ba thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'jig rten gyi khams der lha dang mi 'byung ba de dag
270b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// de na mi 'ong ba dang ngan por rnams 'i ying yang med par 'gyur ro// den pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po chel
270b6(dkon brtsegs): bkran med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan 'thung bar mi 'gyur // lha dang mi de dag thams cad kyang jus te skye bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi kham pa den bud med dang 'khrig cing 'dra ba'i ming yang med
270b7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can long ba 'am/ zhar ba 'am na po 'am/ mung po 'am/ yan lag mtshang bar 'gyur la gang yang med de/ de dag thams cad kyang lus mtshan kris legs par ba
271a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i thabatub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang daphyag tu med par 'gyur ro//  co tshad kyang bskal ba ba ma na bcurtsa gtas ba byung // da
271a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de yang byang chub dang rab tu ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ ming rje chen po darab tu ldan pa/ theg pa chen po dang rab tu ldan pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ston par mi 'gyur ro/ 
271a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyangs na sung sa gyis gobar 'gyur ro// de dag cang chos kyi gro tshig riris sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rjes pa rtogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs par
271a4(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ tshig gcig gis tshig thams cad la 'jug pa'o// tshig
271a5(dkon brtsegs): cig po de yang gang zher 'di lta ste/ tshig mi zad pa'o// tshig mi bad pa de yang gab nan/ tshig mi bad pa zhes kyab ni gang mang btus lams cad cing sdang 'ad ba byed mi nus pa'o// tshig mi zad pa de yang gang zhe na/ 'di rtsa
271a6(dkon brtsegs): / a zhes bu pa ni tshig mi zad pa ste/ a zhes bya ba la zhugs na yi ge'i 'bru thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de ltar na yi ge thams cad rimi bad pa ste/ yi ge 'bru gnyis snga bri med par thos par bya mi nus
271a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ge'i 'bru re re nas brjod kyi yi ge yang yi ge gnyis dang 'brel ba ma yin no// de bas na tshig gcig po de nyid rnam par rig pa'i tshig ste/ gang rnam par rig pa'i tshig de yang rnam par rig pa'i tshig ces
271a8(dkon brtsegs): ga par mi byed rnam par rtog par mi byed do// de lta tshig de mi tog rnam par mi rtog par dgos pa byed de/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig gi gsung sa la 'jug pa'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe
271b1(dkon brtsegs): ba rin po che 'byung ba de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa 'am bskal pa las lhag par 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med
271b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de'i bsngags pa brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam rin po che sazung ba de'i chom bstan pa 'amam gyis mi khyab pa de yongs su brjod pang yon tan yongs du
271b3(dkon brtsegs): bzang par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ni yon tan gyi rnam pa bkod pa tshad med pa de snyed 'thung bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin po ches bdag nyid yung bstan pa
271b4(dkon brtsegs): thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba sres nas bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad
271b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// chos rnams kun gyis ro gshegs// 'khrul pa'i skyon rnams thams cad las// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du 'das// ye shes chen po khyod de mtshar// sangs rgyas bye ba de snyed la// bdag gis
271b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon mtshod gang bgyis pa// de dag thams cad mngon paras byer// 'das dang sa bongs dus rnam pa dang // de bzhin da su thung ba yi// bdag gi spyod dang de bzhin du// srog chags kun gyi ba tu ma khyen// nub pa
271b7(dkon brtsegs): 'drad 'dra bar// 'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur zhes// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyim padag lung bstan// bdag ni mi tshom yod mchis// sa rnams thams cad 'gags kyang gdang // nyi rnam pa'
271b8(dkon brtsegs): las lhung yang gdang // bcom ldan khyod kyi nal smon sa// byin ci log zhi gsung mi 'byung // ye shes ldan la shes par che// des ni bdag la bden tshig gis// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan pas/ 
272a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas blan mdapa 'akrur// thugs pas yad ni mkhyen pasan// bdag ga spyo pa ma' drung nga // sangs rgyam gang ya na dubar// de 'dra nyid du ca bstan to// rdzogs sa
272a2(dkon brtsegs): kye gsung thos nas// mchos la mchis dbang po chem// sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur// mchog ge spyod pa spang bar bgyi// bdag gi slong pa ci 'drab// smon cim pa rnam sbyangs pa// de bas
272a3(dkon brtsegs): shin du dpag yas par// bdag gi spyod pa smad par bgyi// 'di ni le los mi 'da' pas// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i smod pa 'di// zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su// byang chub spyod pa spyad par
272a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag na byang chub lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyis ni slo bstsal// ri srid 'dren par ma gyur pa// de srid brtson 'grus me gtong ngo // rtag tu byang chub mchog gzhol te// sems can thams cad gnyer
272a5(dkon brtsegs): rabakyi// byang chub dang bden du btsal// de dag bdag gis bsrung bar bsti// byang chub sems dpa' gtsug na rin po ches tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags stong phrag bdun cu
272a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mams bskyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dri ma med par skye bar sems kyis smon de tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i
272a7(dkon brtsegs): poche dgrub pa des byang chub thob par gyur pa de na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar gyur cig ce ba smras pa dang / de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan te/ 
272a8(dkon brtsegs): na bcom ldan 'das kyis mo dang ldan pa kun dga' sa bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' tshol kyi rnam grangs 'di brang shig/ chongs shig stsogs shig kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la ya
272b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag yab tu ston cig/ kun dga' tha rags kyi bu'am/ rigs bu so gas mchos kyi rnam gras 'ad 'chang ngam klog pa de dag shA med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa byang chub snang lung ston to// 6
272b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyibu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs sus rnams la la stong du ci bzhed ces sbyin pa byin pa bam/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigapa kyi
272b3(dkon brtsegs): bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos te/ 'chang ngam klog gam/ de khon bzhin du nan tan byed na/ 'di ni de bas 'asod napas ches yang ste/ tshad med grang ba med par khong du chud bar bya'o// den pa
272b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung sags na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar
272b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar zung shika/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i man ngag ces bya bar
272b6(dkon brtsegs): yang zung shig/ gtsug na rin po che sa gus pa zhes bya bar yang rung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de med ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug na rin chen dang / byang chub
272b7(dkon brtsegs): sem pa dpa' de dag thams cad dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / skra dang mi dang / ska ma yin dang dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yo sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
272b8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong zhag brgya ba las/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa rdzogs so// // rgyag kyi mkhan pog
273a1(dkon brtsegs): dam grangs le'u srong phrag brgyab las le'u bzhi bcurtsa brgyad pa sti 'phags pa sgyum dpa' bri gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa/ bam po dang po// phyag skang du/ Ad+ya shrI mA la dang ping can darnams gzhan d+hu
273a2(dkon brtsegs): nga skad du/ 'phags pa kra mo dpal phreng gi seng ge'i sgra zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// pang sa rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di grang bdag yis thas pa du ni na
273a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rkyal bu rgyal bred kyi nga la mgon med zas srin gyi kun dka' dpan 'thugs so// de nas de ci yul ko sa la'i tshul po gsal tal dang / btsun mo dam pa btsun mo phreng ldan mas
273a4(dkon brtsegs): mod pa sa phre chos rtogs nas 'ang pom lon pa'i ba skabs phrag ta ma glengs pa/ rgyal po chen po cem khyod kyi pral mo sngam dpal phreng ni 'dzangam shing gsal bab cing ma khas te/ gal te des bcom ldan 'das mthong
273a5(dkon brtsegs): na chog pachung tshom rtogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chom bstan pa sa yang tshamam mchim par zung // den 'i rgyal logs panas kyis 'dun mo ma rnas pa 'dzin sa gru // 
273a6(dkon brtsegs): phreng banam du rtseg gis sgra mo dpa la phrengs po nus pa zhig satang gong ma chag go// de na cem smras pa dang / btsun mo zeng ldan ma pa rgal po gas la rgyal gyi tshig des nyanan pa ko sa ma'i rgyal po gsas rgyal dang / 
273a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun ma phreng thurnams bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bcags pa nam pa du ma bris te/ nang ga ma med ba na thal sa pa zhes byapa de'i lag tu phren mig bslar nas dem bar rtsas pangs/ grob byer ba
273b1(dkon brtsegs): mams 'dum sa/ mapa la thas can ma ldan kun [।]ma tha mam pa sa rnams ldan// danam snyam dpa sa zangags pa ma la nus
273b2(dkon brtsegs): phrin cig de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas lago la gtugs te bdag nyid kyis phrin yig bklags nas/ phrin yig ye don pa'ang ngon pa nges par bzung ste/ don du nges par bzung nas mgo lcogs te yamatshan
273b3(dkon brtsegs): dra bzu nas lnga mo dpal phreng gis na dgong sakral/ bu mtshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smram po// sangs rgyas zhes bya'i zla 'di ra// 'jig rten dgan shin tu dkur// zhal te ga 'di bden cu ngan// bad/ 
273b4(dkon brtsegs): kau stan/  ldan yangs byas de// 'jig rten don du kyang kru// de ni 'dag sa thul pa yis// bstan pa'i ched du da sbyin // denas de yi na cig pa// mgon po gsheg
273b5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' la zhugs// bsam kyis mi khyag sangs rgyas mu// 'od zeng 'grod cing bzhugs pa mthong // de nas de men yon// zhum pas 'khor bcas langs nas kyang // spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas// smra ba'i
273b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog la bstod pa ni// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang // deb la dpag pan 'ang yod ma mchis/ khar ma yam dpe blam mchis pa'i// jigarten mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon po khyod kyi sku gzugs dang / 
273b7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes la yang bas ma mchis// khyod kyi sangs rgyas chos mi bas// de bas thub khyod skyabs kyang lags// bsam yas cal ldan khyod kyi pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi skyon rnams bsal// nyams ma mchis
273b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sa brnyes pa// chos rgyal khrod la phyag 'tshal lo// shes byathams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// ye shes klu yi dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi// mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
274a1(dkon brtsegs): / gzhal las khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpel pa 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bsam las chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas gzugs khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nad ltar bgon
274a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyabs// byang chub sa pon rnam par bskyed// skan chad krid pa gzhan dgas// thub pas bdag la phan gdags mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngon chernams su la mo khyod// ngas
274a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bya// lha mo dpal phreng gis gsol pa// bdag gis 'di dang gzhan dag tu// bsod nams gang dang gang bgyis pa// bsod
274a4(dkon brtsegs): nams de yis mgon po khrod// rtag tu bdag gis mthong bar shog/ de nas lha mo dpal phrang dang lhan cig tu btsun mo kun dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs so// 
274a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'dus pa'i nang du lha mo dpal phrang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te/ lha mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa'i yon tan dag
274a6(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa'i bsod nams bsags pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis lha mo khyod bskal pa tshad med grangs med par khwa dang mi'i rgyal srid phun sum tshogs pa myong bar 'gyur te/ tshe rab sa
274a7(dkon brtsegs): mas cad du yang nga mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngal mngon sum du 'di lta bu'i bstod pa bsngags pas bsngags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med grangs med pa
274a8(dkon brtsegs): gagal yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// da phyin chad bskal pa brgya stong phrag grangs med pa nyi shu na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po zhe
274b1(dkon brtsegs): 2 'gyur te/ de'i tshe yang la/ mo khyod kyi sangs rgyas gzhing de ngan song dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag
274b2(dkon brtsegs): gad kyang med na pa yang med/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i gnod pa yang med do// mi dge ba'i las kyi las rnams kyi ming yang mi grags par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing derang sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag gis
274b3(dkon brtsegs): degazhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang 'di ltar bde ba dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang dpal dang gzi rjid dang / gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis zil gyis non par
274b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro// lha mo sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ro// lha mo deng/ 
274b5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i na pa ga byas pa'i sems can rnams de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de 'du bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha mo dpal phreng gi lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa thos nas lha dang mi dpag tu med pa dag gis sangs
274b6(dkon brtsegs): trAs pa zhing de skye bar smon lam btab po// de dag thams pa dkyang 'jig rten gyi khams dang sme bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de napa lha mod pa la phreng gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du 'das
274b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid lung bstan pa thos nas phal mo skur te yi dam chen po bcu yang dag par blangs so// bcu gang zhen 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das da slan mad bdag gis tshul khrims kyi dus las 'da' ba'i sems bskyed pa ma
274b8(dkon brtsegs): / bcom ldan 'das yid ma dang po 'din byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar zag gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das sman chad bdag gis blam dag la ma gus pa'i sems pa
275a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa ma bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam gnyis pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar zug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis gang du yang sems
275a2(dkon brtsegs): can la khro ba dang / gnod mams kyi sems bskyed par mi brtse rtse/ bcom ldan 'das yid ma gsum pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snang ba'i ma jug gi par du bdag gis yang dag par byung ngo // bcom ldan
275a3(dkon brtsegs): da slan chad bdag gis gzhan gyi dpal dang / gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dag la phra dog gi sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam bzhi pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gis
275a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'dasar gan chad bdag gis phan kham pa ma cam la yang ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam lnga pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mtha
275a5(dkon brtsegs): thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das da slan chad bdag gis bdag nyid kyis longs spyod pa'i slad du nor yongs su bzung ba mi bgyi ste/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das sems ca
275a6(dkon brtsegs): dbul po kru lnga zhing ma gnam mchim pa yongs su smin par sa kyi sa srung du yongs su gzung ba 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das yi ma drug pa'idi yang byang rgyab kyi snying po'i mar thug gi bar du bdag gis pang
275a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das rang mi ma mchim pa'i sems dang / chag par mi me pa dang rdzog pa mamatsham pang sems can yang ga zang brngub ca ni/ bcom ldan 'dis yi ma bdun pa 'di sa bya chu kyi
275b1(dkon brtsegs): nga bdag gis par dag par dang ngo // bcom ldan 'das daskan chad bdag zhes sems can mgon ma mchis pa dang / ga rang stsal ba dang bcangs pa dang nad kyis nyam thag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang
275b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa 'a bo dang bongs par gyur ba dang / tshig ma chen po'i 'tshe bar dag mthong na/ de dag la sman ma btags par gom pa gcis kyang dang bar mi bkri'i/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can sdug pasnga
275b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyam thag pa de dag mthong na sdug bsngal de dang de dag las yongs su zar bar bgyis la nor gyi bsdu bas bsrubs nas smad kyis bdag mchi bar bsgres te/ bcom ldan 'das yi dam brgyad pa 'di yang
275b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'dasar blan chad bdag gis phag/ 'tshong dang / bya ba la sogs pa sdig pa'i las kyis 'tsho zhing de bzhin gshegs pas
275b5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal ba'i chos 'dul ba las nyams pa'i chos can dag mthong na yal bar ma dong ni/ bcom ldan 'das grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong dal dang / yul lakhor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang la khor gang dang gang
275b6(dkon brtsegs): dgan bdag gis mchid nyan pa de dang de dag tu da smras pa'i dgas pa rnams lani ma bug/ sman gdags pa'i rigs pa rnams pa ni sran gdags par 'chal pa/ de ba'i phyim ner/ bcom ldan 'das tsha dgus
275b7(dkon brtsegs): da /  ga sa ngag rten dam pa ma than duganas pa gyu ba'i tha pa/ dam pa byos kun du gan par kya nga sa pa kyi rnam papa la shA khring zhing na seM rnams
275b8(dkon brtsegs): 'grib par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rjes su skong bar bgyid pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid ma dgu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthang jug
276a1(dkon brtsegs): gabang du bdag gipa yang dag par blang ngo // bcom ldan 'das sgran chad bdag gis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las bskrad par mi ba rtsa/ sems gcig tsam yang bskyed 'a mam
276a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i tshes gzung ba las bskyed na pag pa chen po bskrad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das theg pachen po bsrud na pa rol tu phyin pa bskrad par 'gyur ro// bcom
276a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa baspyad na theg pa chen po las mi 'dun par 'gyu ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem pa dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po gang rtsig pachen po las ma dres pa de ridam pa'i chos po
276a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa la mi 'dun par 'gyur zhing rung nyam du gnas par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni byis pa so mo'i skye bo'i sang mchi ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis nyes dmigs
276a5(dkon brtsegs): dngad/ gnod pa chen po mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa las ni bdag dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phan yon dpag tu ma mchis pa'i don yongs su
276a6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i yid ma bcu pa 'di yang byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du bdag gis yang dag par byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi dang / 
276a7(dkon brtsegs): na po bcu po 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gra blangs pa lags te/ 'di la chos kyi nyid bdag gi dbang dgyur ba lags pa// bcom ldan 'das son pa mngon sum du gung du lags kyang semasad
276a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa bachung ngul la dag kye ma yi ma chen po bcu po 'di dag ni lcogs par da/ 'o snyam du bdag lar chos pa'am/ yid gnyis 'chal ba de shin bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyim yun ring bor gnod pa dang / 
276b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba dang lung ba 'ag te/ bcom ldan 'das dedag nyid la sman gdags pa'i skad du bcom ldan 'das kyi sun sngar bden pa byin gyi brlabs 'dib kyi bar 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag da med na
276b2(dkon brtsegs): bkang dag blangs pa'i yi dam chen po bcu po 'di dag la bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag je ska klub pa de bzhin du babyed par 'gyur ba ltan/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'dis 'khor gyi dkyil lajo
276b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dir lha'i me tog char 'bab par gyur cig/ lha'i sgra grag par gyur cig/ des kyang bdag gi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di len par gyur cig/ lha mo dpal phreng gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i tshe lha'i me
276b4(dkon brtsegs): tog gi chang chen po babarnam par snang las lha'i sgra grag par gyur te/ des bden pa'i byin gyi brlab sa de mnos nas lha mo de de bzhin no// ji ltar khyod kyis bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs byas pa de ni de bzhin du 'gyur / 
276b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du ma yin no zhe byas so// de nas zad du byung ba'i tshe 'phrul de yang mthong / sgra'i sgra mnos pa de yang thos nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor cho mom med cing mchog tu dga' bar gyur te/ lha mo dpal phreng
276b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mi 'bral zhing 'grogs par smon lam btab po// 'khor de thams car kyang de bzhin du 'bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// de nas khra mo dpal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
276b7(dkon brtsegs): snga smon lam chen po gsum btang po// gsul gang zhen/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bden pa'i byin kyi brlabs 'das sems can dang gsul mchis pa bdag la sman btags pa gang lags pa'i bsod
276b8(dkon brtsegs): nams 'asags pa'i dge ba'i dra ba des bcom lda 'das bdag cher ba sa thams cad du dam pa'i chos togs pa thob par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po dang po lags so// bcom
277a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'atshas tags pa dam pa nas kyang ngal pa dang yongs su byabam mchis pa sems can rnams lachas ston par gyung ga/ bamam ldan 'das 'don bdag gasman
277a2(dkon brtsegs): las chen po gnyis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam pa'i chos bstan pa de yang lus dang srog la me lta par dam pa'i chos bsrung ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'tshal / 
277a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi smon lam chen po gsum pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni smon lam chen po gsum po de dag 'debs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dpal phreng gi smon
277a4(dkon brtsegs): lam chen po yul che ba gsum po 'di dag lung ston pa mdzad de/ lha mo 'di lta ste dper na gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad ni rnam ma pa'i khams kyi khongs su 'dum shing yongs su gtogs la khongs su
277a5(dkon brtsegs): lha mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang smon lam chen po 'di gsum gyi khongs su 'dus shing khongs su gtogs la khongs su chud do/ 
277a6(dkon brtsegs): da ni de ltar du la che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lham dpal grong gis 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das 'di la smon lamachen po'i yul bstan pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthub bdag gi
277a7(dkon brtsegs): sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha po khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis spyod spobs par gyis shig de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces
277a8(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// com rdzas das kyang chub sems dpa'i phrin lam gang gA'i drung kyi byes skyed gang dag lags pa de da ga thams cad kyang 'di gyur dam pa'i tshem yongs su gsung ba'i ldan lam chen pagakyi
277b1(dkon brtsegs): sa 'dus shi ngams da / tsam ldan 'dapa dam pa'i chos yongs sa ldan pa ltar yul cha ba gags sa// ngan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis snyam dpal phreng la lags sa nas bya ba zin te/ stsa
277b2(dkon brtsegs): legs so legs so// lAm khyed ni shes rab pabam sa/ thabs kyis yongs su bgos pa'i shes rab dang ldan no// lha mo sems can gang dag spyod kyis tshas bstan pa'i don rtogs pa de dag ni dkon payin te/ 
277b3(dkon brtsegs): denge son sa sangs rgyab du ma la dag pa' rtse ba bskyed bskyed pa yin no// lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i yongs su gzung ba bstan pa ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du 'das pa dang / la 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'de bzhin gshes
277b4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyis kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pa de nyid bshad do// 'chad do chad par 'gyur ro// lha mo pa 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs pa'i rang rngub mchog thob nas dam pa me ngas yongs su gzu
277b5(dkon brtsegs): babastan pa rnam pa du mar ston te/ b+ha mo do ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba bstan pangs rnam pa du mar bshad kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan rnams kyi ma zar 'am mu thug pa med do// de bzhin gshes
277b6(dkon brtsegs): grobs pa la yang mtha' 'am su thug pa med do// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su len pa ni de ltar don che'o// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa na de ltar phan len che'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal
277b7(dkon brtsegs): sa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mor do'i dus la bab par shes na
277b8(dkon brtsegs): daslabs par byes sheg/ de nas lam ldan 'das kyis gan nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mod pa la phreng gim 'di na ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dapa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin zhesangs cas kyi
278a1(dkon brtsegs): nga 'ad sa snyen rdzun marnan pa dang / ga na pa ma thun dpa kyim nga ldan pa la so// ma ldan na canas pa ma
278a2(dkon brtsegs): nga na pa sto gsas kyi men pa la sbyirten gyi khabs pa skye gnas de ni mi gi kyi lag sa 'dog 'chogs pa dang / dmas snachogapa pa 'brung dang /  dran tho sa
278a3(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa bzhi tshab kyi phung po chen po de las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa theg pa chen po yang dag par 'grub pa'i 'thung khungs dang / skyes gnas su gyur pa de las kyang
278a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad dang / chos snang ba'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug thams cad dang / 'jig rten las 'das
278a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bde ba lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma myong ba gang lags pa thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dper nas chen po ni bur chen po bzhi'i rten bgyid pa lags te/ bzhi po de dag gang zhin 'di
278a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chab kyi phung mchen pa rgya mtsho dang / rimang pa thams cad dang gnas pa dang rnga dang / shing ge la ba dang sman dang me tog dang / nags chal mams cad dang / sems can gyi tshogs thams cadakyi
278b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan /  me kros rkyen ngan pa das kun du/  ldan nas dgas gas ga/ rags kyi tham dam tsham yams lan phan sa can papas kyang kyis 'a
278b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhi khyer ba lags so// bzhi gang zhen 'di la ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma sems can dag pa'i ba shes gnyen dang bral zhing thol pa dang mi ldan la chos can ma lags pa rnams lha dang mi'i phun bum
278b3(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la spyor ba nis chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer pa lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig nyan thos kyi theg pa la spyod par
278b4(dkon brtsegs): kyid pa ni ma chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor bar bgyid pa ni sa chen po pas kyang ches khur chen
278b5(dkon brtsegs): byer ba lags so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo sems can kha cig theg pa chen po la stong bar bgyid pa nas chen po pos kyang ches khur chen po khyod ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das pan ba de dgan
278b6(dkon brtsegs): krur chen po lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi su 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni khur chen po 'di bani khyed pa lags te/ sa chen po pas kyang ches rten tu gyur pa dang / sa
278b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po bas kyang ches khur chen po khyang ba dang / khur mtha' yas pa khyer ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi gzhi rten du gyur pa dang / byabs pa bgyis pa dang snying rje can dang / sman par 'chal ba dang snying
278b8(dkon brtsegs): brtse ba dang chos kyis 'jig rten gyim zhes bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper nas chen po ni rin po che lnga pa zhi'i 'byung gnas lags te/ sA phan po de dag gang zhe na/ rin po cheran thang ba ces pa
279a1(dkon brtsegs): //  tha ga la lag na ga nga nas dang /  na / 'byung banas lag
279a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ji ltar sa chen po rin po che sna bzhi po 'di dag gi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can
279a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis rin po che'i mchog chen po rin po chathams cad kyi dam par dgyur pa bzhi la rnyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen dge ba'i bshes gnyen rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu modo la brten nas sems can nas
279a4(dkon brtsegs): ses lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par bgyid pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi khri rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / ra
279a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi theg par nye bar 'gro ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thob par bgyi ba rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nye bar 'gro ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chos mthon po thong
279a6(dkon brtsegs): bad babye brnyed par 'gyur ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brten nas sems can rnams kyis rin po chathams cad kyi mchog ngo mtshangs
279a7(dkon brtsegs): dazung ba'i dzin pa che chen po'oni mi da par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gter chen po na po ma pa' yal pa'i 'thung gnas zhes pa kyi ba de nidas pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i tshig bla dgas lagasas
279a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i ches yongs su 'dzin pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bkyi na bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang
279b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos lags so// bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pacwa
279b2(dkon brtsegs): yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa' chos yongs su 'dzin pa nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i
279b3(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni sems can gang dag sbyin pas yongs su smin par rabakyi ba de dag na sbyin pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ tha na lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong bas kyang
279b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pa rnams dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag
279b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis yongs su sbyin par bgyi pa'i sems can de dag ni dbang po drug pa rdzamal pa dang / lus dang rab dang / yid kyilas yongs su dag pas yongs su smin par babyed de/ phan spyod las gyis kyas
279b6(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sems bsrung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de lta de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom
279b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das sems can gang dag bzod pas yongs su smin par bkye ba'i sems can de dag la ni de dag gis de la spyos brgyad de gtse bar bgyis kyang gnod sems ma mchis shing sman par 'tshal ba dang / bzod pa'i
279b8(dkon brtsegs): skabs dam pa dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ than bzhin gyi mdangs kyis kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gad
280a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i babod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag brtson 'grus kyis yongs su smin par bsdu ba'i sems can dag ni sems mthum zhing lel
280a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ma chis pa dang / 'dun pa chen po dang brtson 'grus rtsom pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ phan rang gi spyod lam bsgrims pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ 
280a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag bsam gtan gyis yongs su
280a4(dkon brtsegs): smin par bgyi ba'i sems can de dag ni sems mi g.yeng ba dang / yid phyi rol du mi rku ba dang / dran pa 'khrul pa ma mchis pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ zan bkyis nas yun ring du lags
280a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / smras nas yun ring du lags pa mi bskrad pas kyang de dag gi sems srung zhing yongs su smin par bgyid de/ de dag de ltar yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di ni de
280a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam gnyen gyi pha rol du phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyis yongs su smin par bkye ba'i sems can de dag ni sems can gyi don 'dri ba dag la le lo ma mchis par
280a7(dkon brtsegs): ston pa dang / bkun bcos thams cad dang / rig pa dang papo'i gnas thams cad kyi mthar phyir pas yongs su smin par bgyid de/ thun pa 'o ga'i gnas chen po dag/ tu yang de dag gi sems srung gang long
280a8(dkon brtsegs): bu smin par byed de/ de dag de myang yongs su smin par bgyis pas dam pa'i chos la gnas par 'thur ba 'dan de'i gesaras kyi rol tu phyin pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la legs pas
280b1(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyid pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid pha rol tu phyin pa rnams lags so// 
280b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus don chen po bstan pa gzhan yang bdag gis spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi khyod spobs par gyis
280b3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes bgyi ba ni bcom ldan 'das
280b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang gzhan ma lags la/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa po nyid dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzi
280b5(dkon brtsegs): pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa des ni bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du yan lag gsum yongs pa
280b6(dkon brtsegs): gtong bar 'gyur te/ gsum gang yin 'di ltar lus dang srog dang longs spyod rnams te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lus yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi sku 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mu dang
280b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa rga ba dang / na ba dang 'chi ba dang bral ba mi shigs pa/ rtag pa brtan bzhi ba/ zer dbug pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'ang
280b8(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo sreg yongs su gtong bas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par 'phrul par gnas pa 'khor ba'i phyi ma'i mtha'i bu dang mnyam pa 'chi 'pho dang bral ba/ mtha' yas pa rtag pa yon tan bsam gyis
281a1(dkon brtsegs): / khyab pa dang ldan pa thams cad pa gapar ro// bcom ldan 'dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bum yongs spyong yos su gtong bas ni sems can 'ams cad kyis mtshad pa 'khor ba'i phyim ma
281a2(dkon brtsegs): / su dang mnyam pa/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa/ bas par mi 'gyur 'a rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rtag par rgyun mi 'chad cing rtag tu gnas pa/ yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa
281a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yan lag gsum po 'di dag yongs su gtong bas ni yon tan shin du rmad du byung ba gsum pa de dag
281a4(dkon brtsegs): tho par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyar lung ston par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig dam pa'i cho ba rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge
281a5(dkon brtsegs): snyen ma rnams kyi zhing gnyis su gyur pa sde sdeng chad de/ phyogs phyogs su gyes nas cod par gyur pa na g.yom mchis shing kya gru ma mchis la sku ma mchis par chos la dga' zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du chos
281a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs pa 'jug par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rags kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bumo de zhugs pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad las lung brgyan banges par thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su
281a7(dkon brtsegs): dzin pa ni lta rtson 'grul chen po lags pa snyam pa dag byed de/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid kun du byung pa la gas te/ ye shesasu su dpalags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad cin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
281a8(dkon brtsegs): yeng bdag lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lham dpal phreng gi sa dam pa'i chol longs su 'dzin pa bstan pa la rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ lha mod de bzhin te/ lha mo dam
281b1(dkon brtsegs): los su na pani 'dod 'grus chen po me no// lha mod pe dpe stong ba dang dz+nyAn papa gan du dag par bkun du shin kyang nga ba 'gyur /  da byed pa skyed do// su mo bzhin du dam pa tshol yongs su 'dzin pa ni chung
281b2(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can la 'dod par gru su srud pa ske ga 'dod pa med de// ma ma na bdu thaMg can pa dmi pa myo mongs sa 'dzid pa'i skang gdab chu ni kya byed spelas pa 'don par byed pa de ltar gdod par
281b3(dkon brtsegs): 'asrung ba dang / dkyar bya dan byed pa dang de sbyang smre sngag pa 'don par byed pa dge ba'i tshum gzhan gcig kyang ma mdzang //  mod pa na palang gi mchog rgyam chog gis ni 'ad gyur ding mamo bdang cu zhing gis pa langs
281b4(dkon brtsegs): / tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan te mngon par brjed cing yang dag par mngon par brjid do// lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa yang chung ngu zin kyang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang / rgya chen por gyur
281b5(dkon brtsegs): pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon to// lha mod per na ri 'ahrul po ris kyis ni 'di ltar mtho ba dang / chu che bas rinag po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing mngon pa
281b6(dkon brtsegs): lhag geng 'dug go//  mod bzhin du theg pa chen po pa'i lus dang srog la mi lta zhing / phan gdags pa sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'den pa yang 'di ltar rgyas pa dang sa chen por gyur pas rdeg pa chen po
281b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lag par du zhugs pa lus dang srog la kya ba rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon na gzhan dag gi lta'i smos ste/ lha mo de bas na sems can nams dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba nyid yang dag par
281b8(dkon brtsegs): dragazhug par kye/ yang dag par bstan par bya yang dag par gapeng bskyed par bya/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya gzung bar byad dgod par bya'o// lha modam pa tshal yongs su 'angan pa ni de ltar don ce'o// de ltar 'a
282a1(dkon brtsegs): / n+ye'o// de ltar phan lon che'o// lha mo gal te bzhal pa grangs med dpag tu med par dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ngas bshad du rin kyang lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su
282a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa'i yon tan dang / phan yon bshad pa de dag gi mtha' 'am mu thug par mi 'gyur ro// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de ltar yon tan mtha' yas pa dang ldan no// lha mo dam pa'i chos yongs su
282a3(dkon brtsegs): gsung ba sangs tu sa thams cad kyis bzhed 'das bkun pa ded khyod kyis bshad pa spobs par gyis shig/ de nas lha mo pal phreng gis bcom ldan 'das la leg pa so zhes gsal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya
282a4(dkon brtsegs): ba mnos te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos zhes pagyi bdon theg pa chen po'i chas bya dgapa po// de ci'i slad du byed/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
282a5(dkon brtsegs): ga pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad ni theg pa chen pos rab tu bye ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na klung chen po bzhi ni mtshom dros pa las 'byung
282a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nyan pa pa da rang sangs rgyas 'bas ca dang / 'jig tan pa dang 'garten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang rig pa chen po las 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dper na pa'o/ 
282a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gang yang lags pa dag dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang ldan dang / nags tshal de dag thams cad des chen po la rten cangs chen po la gnas te skye zhi 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das da
282a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyan pos da nga mang sa rgyas kyi theg pa gang lags padag dang / 'dag rten pa dang 'dig rten lal 'das pa'i dge ba'i tshel gang lags pa de gamams cad zig pa chen po la te ci theg pa chen po la gnas sbyin
282b1(dkon brtsegs): la la rgyas par gyus// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas thag 'dran pa la gnas gang reg pa can po yongs pa babang na nyan thos dang nga sangs rgyas kyi zag pa thams ca dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'a ga rten las 'ad
282b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing gnas te yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos gnas pa dang / dam pa'i chol nub pa dang / so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba dang rab tu 'byung ba dang / 
282b3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par rdzogs pa gnas drug pa 'di dag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan cing brtagapa pa gang lags pa'i gnas dru po de dag kyang rdeg pa chen po'ing songs pa la sa byung ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhed/ bcom
282b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ngam pa'i chos gnas pa zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das pag pa chen po gnas pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
282b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa'i chol nub par 'gyur ba zhes bgyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni theg pa chen po'i dgongs pa can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po nub pa nyid ni dam pa'i chos nub pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das
282b6(dkon brtsegs): po so sa dang 'dus 'arjes gyi pa'i chos 'di nyi ni don gcig te/ mi ge'i 'thuni pa dang lagapa po// bcom ldan 'das 'dul bzhis 'gyi ba 'di ni bag pa chen po pa rnams kyi 'aslab pa lags so// de tsa'i sbed du zhe na/ 
282b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi slad du rab tu 'thung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags papa 'di ltar 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba dang rang
282b8(dkon brtsegs): thung bdang / brten par rdzogs pa zhes pa gyi ba'i btags pa 'di ni bag pa chen po'i choga'i rgyal khrims kyi ru tsal dpa 'i la ma ldan sa sad sa dang sasangs kyigapa la rab tu 'thung ba dang nyen / 
283a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi slad du rab tu 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni ma mchis kyi/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
283a2(dkon brtsegs): slad du nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams rab tu 'brang zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de zhin gshegs pa nyid
283a3(dkon brtsegs): bas su mchi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sang brgyas
283a4(dkon brtsegs): dmas kyang 'du byed thams cad la mi ba dad par 'jigs pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das dper na gshed ma par la gri gzas pa bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas/ 
283a5(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang nges par 'byung ba shin tu bde ba thob pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/ skyabs su gyur pa ni skyabs gzhan tshol ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can
283a6(dkon brtsegs): bas ma mchis pa rnams gang dang gang gis 'jigs spag pa de dang de las 'byung ba tshol bde bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang 'jigs pa de mchis te/ 
283a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa des spags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi bar gas len pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang
283a8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang skye ba'i chos kyi lhag ma dang bcas pa lags te/ 
283b1(dkon brtsegs): sa ldan 'das de dag gi phreb sabs pa yangs mches so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni bsten par bgyi pa'i lhags dang bcas pa lags te/ de sa na de dag ni dgapa' 'gas/ las man+ta phyin pa ma lags te de dag gi bgyir/ 
283b2(dkon brtsegs): gang lags so// de dag gi spang bar bkye ba'i chos gzhan yang mang du mchis te/ de dag sa blangs pas dag btsam pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i dpyod sa dang ring ba lags so// 
283b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das yongasasu mya ngan las 'das pashes brtse bden de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
283b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa brnyes pas yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa lags la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ma lags kyi
283b5(dkon brtsegs): slad 'o// bcodam ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das banas bgyi ba di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ deci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa rang
283b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni mya ngan lar 'das pa brnyes pa sa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa las pA la/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni yon tan
283b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis 'i khyab pa dang ldan pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa shes bgyi ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
283b8(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na sra ngan las 'das pa badres pas spang bar 'gyi ba'i ldan thams cad spangs shing 'chog tu yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa lags pa
284a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa na pa dag patsam rnam pa dang / ra sangs rgya nas pa ni smon gyi ga sa rnam sa dang cas pa/ yongasas mdug pa'i chos can zhugs par slad du// btsam+b+ha ldan sa ngas sun
284a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das ba zhes bkye ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
284a3(dkon brtsegs): kya ngan las rnas pa brnyem pa'i nga dus/ bcom ldan dasade myu gas pas dgra com pa rnam sadang/ rangs sa rgyas rnams kyad myang ngan las 'das pa'i byi sa dang ring ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das
284a4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam par grol bal po mar rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mtha' dbugs byin pa rjes su dran pa bzhi po gang lags pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa can dang / 
284a5(dkon brtsegs): dag sa dang bcas pa dang / drang ba'i don dang rnam par dbyeste byung bstan par bgyi pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'che 'bani 'ad ga nyi pa lags te/ gnyis ga na/ rgyun chad pa'i 'chi
284a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bsngom pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'pho lags so// bcom ldan 'das del rgyan chad pa'i 'i cha 'bon nyid mchems skyong ba dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyi lags so// bcom ldan 'das yongs
284a7(dkon brtsegs): su bsngos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'chi 'dzin dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen po dbang thob pa dang / yid kyi lus rnams lags te/ byang
284a8(dkon brtsegs): pakyi snying po la thug gi bar du lags so// bcom ldan 'das dal 'chi 'pho'adi gnyis las rkun chad pa'i 'chi 'bo'i dbang du bgyis te/ bdag gi skye ba bad do snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs
284b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lug ma dang rnas pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bkyes pa la brten nam bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa bsten to snyam du dag bcom pa rnams dang / rang
284b2(dkon brtsegs): mangs rgya rnams kyi shes pa 'byung bags so// byis pams skye ba dang dang meb kyi dang bcas pa tham pa cid dang / slob pa bdun pa dag gi sating mtshams gyur bdang bcas pa zhon mongs pa rnams srang btsun/ 
284b3(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pa de spangs pa la brten nas bya ba byas so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so nas bgyi na/ 
284b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom lngas spang bar bgyi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i dbang du bgyis nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so snyam du dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
284b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan ci shes so sum pa'i shes pa de yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa yang ma lags/ skye ba thams cad yongs su 'tshal nga las byung ba
284b6(dkon brtsegs): yang ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la yang nyon mongs pa rnams ma spangs pa dang / skye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs sum 'tshal pa
284b7(dkon brtsegs): yang mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dag ni rnam pa gnyis te/ gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa yang rnam pa
284b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhi ste/ bzhig shin/ 'di ltar lta ba gcig la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / gzugs kyi 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang / srid 'i
285a1(dkon brtsegs): / 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis ste/ bcom ldan 'das gnas kyis 'di po dag gis nyon mongs pa kun na sa ldang ba thams cad myed lags so// bco ldan 'das de dag
285a2(dkon brtsegs): klad gcig pa ste/ sems kyi skad cig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas mchis pa ni sems dang mi ldan pa lags so/ 
285a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gnas kyi sa bzhi po 'di dag gi nang na stobs che ba gang lags pa de ni nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhir byung ba ma rig pa'i gnas kyis stobs che ba'i grangs sam/ cha'am/ bgrang
285a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ dpa'am/ chur yang mi bzod lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lags te/ srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i sa zhes kyang bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
285a5(dkon brtsegs): / dper na bdud sdig can ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du gtogs kyang 'di ltar gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / 'khor dang / dbang phyug gis gzhan 'phrul dbang bye/ 
285a6(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams zil gyis gnon to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa'i gnas kyis srid pa'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis zhes bgyi bas kyang gnas kyis bzhi po 'di dag zil gyis rga
285a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nyon mongs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma las 'das bsnyed kyi rten du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bzhi dang yang yun ring po nas lhan cig gnas pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi shes pas mi
285a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis ni stobs che ba lags so// bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/ bca
285b1(dkon brtsegs): wa da dper na len pa'i rkyen gyis zag pa dang bcas pa'i las rtse ska las gang pa 'asrid pags ma 'byung ba bzhan du/ bcom ldan 'das ma ga pa'i gnas kyis 'byin gyis bkra pa ma ches pa'i las brgyalas
285b2(dkon brtsegs): dgrib co la rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang pob pa rnams kyi yid kyi lus gsum 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis nis gsum po 'di dag tu yid kyi lus
285b3(dkon brtsegs): klusum po 'di dag 'byung ba dang / bkab ma mchis pa'i las mngon par sgrub pa'irten lags so// bcom ldan 'das rkyen ma mchis na can 'byung ste/ de lta lags pa lam riga'i gnas kyis ni yid kyi lus pa
285b4(dkon brtsegs): las kyi rkyen lags pa'i slad du srid po'i 'dod chags la gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang ming 'dra ba lags so// de lta la phas kyang srid pa'i 'dod chags lnga gnas pa'i gnas kyis dang la
285b5(dkon brtsegs): thun mong ldan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis bzhi po dag las tha dad pa kho na lags te/ yongs su grol ba'i sa pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis sa spang ba dang kyi ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
285b6(dkon brtsegs): shAgyi ye she byas gzhos par bgyi sa lags s+ho// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dgra ba com pa rnams dang / rangs u t+ya sa rnams kyis ni gnas kyis pani spangs kyang dag pa zad pa la dbang
285b7(dkon brtsegs): dgrabacom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyal rnams dang / srid pa zam par rag togs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyis sa bsgribs shing tshad la yongs su dkris
286a1(dkon brtsegs): ljongs par bgyis pas chos dedang de dag rab tu ma 'chal cing mi rtogs so// bcom ldan 'das chos de dang de dag ma 'tshal cing ma mthong bas spang bar 'gyi ba'i chos dang de dgas
286a2(dkon brtsegs): spongs shing byang bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das spang bar bsti pa'i chos de dag ma spangs shing byang bar ma bgyis pa pa bcom ldan 'das de dag skyon las rnam par grol balhags dang bcas pa lags kyi/ spyod thams
286a3(dkon brtsegs): las rnam par grol ba ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni rnam par dag pa lhags dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can ni ma legasas// bcom ldan 'das de dag na sngag
286a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag skyon las rnam par grol ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags kyi/ skyon thams cad las rnam
286a5(dkon brtsegs): la ba ni ma lags pa dang / rnam par dag pa lhag ma dang bcas pa'i chos can lags kyi/ thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos can nam lags pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lags kyi/ yon ta
286a6(dkon brtsegs): sems cad dang ldan pa ni ma lags pa de dag ni bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal ba lhag ma dang bcas pa lags so// sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon sum du bgyis pa lhag ma dang bcas pa lags
286a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam bskams pa lug ma dang bcas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug bsngal yongs su 'tshal 'a lhags dang bcas pa dang / sdug bsngab kun 'byung ba spangs pa lhag
286a8(dkon brtsegs): le pa dang / zug 'ardal ga mags 'du gyis palhan sa dang bcas pa dang / sdig bsngal 'azhig granga'i 'amang sgoms partags dang cas bad ni com ldan 'das de yan lagag tsus/ 
286b1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa dang / de'i yan la gshe su ngan las 'das pathob pa lags so// bcom lan 'das de dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag sdug pasngapa thams cad yos
286b2(dkon brtsegs): su la dang /  pa sa pan 'byung ba thams pa kyangs pa dang / sdug bsngal gag pa thams cad mngon sumadu bkyis bdang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i ma thams da pa sgoms pa dang pag 'dudas/ 
286b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mi rtag pas bcom zhing rtag tan pa'i 'jig rten du rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang bsil ba'i dngopo po'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni skyob pa ma mchis pa dang / skyabs ma mchis
286b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi slob pa dang / skabs lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das pa'ang ngan du 'byed pa'i chos can dag ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob papa legs kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes mnyam
286b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis byu na las 'das baTIg/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba mnyam pa dag gis mya ngan las 'das ba zab/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa'i ye shes gzigs pa mnyam be dag gis mya ngan las/ 
286b6(dkon brtsegs): das pacwo 'i slang du'o// btsa ldan 'ad sa lhags pas ma ngan las 'das pa'i dbye ni rig cig ste/ 'di ga pa da rnam par gron pa'i nga ba rgyangs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang sa dag
286b7(dkon brtsegs): rig pa'i gnas kyi sem spangs shing byed par ma bgyis pA de dgan bcom ldan 'das mya ngan sas 'das pa'i dbyangs su gcig pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar rig pa dang rnam par grol bar ro mtshungs dam lags sa/ 
286b8(dkon brtsegs): daci'i sra pan/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa gnas kyis ma spang sa shing ma sbyangs pas na spang bar bgyi pa'i chos gang+gA klung gi byem las 'das pa snyed ma spangs shing ma sbyangs pa'i srid du ste/ bcom ldan
287a1(dkon brtsegs): / glang ba brtse ba'i chos gan brang babyem las 'das pa sad de dag ma spangs shed ma sangs pas chos gni gang gi bu ma las 'das bsnyad mthong cing mngon sum dum bgyis par gyur pa'i
287a2(dkon brtsegs): du'o// bcom ldam na 'de la lags pas ma drug pa'i gnas kyis slorabs sa sha bar bye babarnyan nangs pa dang ba'i ni mangs thamams cad 'byung ba'i 'byung kun pa ltag ste/ bcom ldan 'das de
287a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi nye ba'i non mongs pa dang / zhi gnas kyi nye ba'i nan mongs pa dang / lhag mthong ginye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin mi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / 
287a4(dkon brtsegs): ngas par 'jug pa'i nye na mangs padang / nal 'byong kyan pa'i dzin mongs pa dang / shes pa'i nyeba'i nan mongs pa dang / 'bras TI ba'i can mongs pa dang / tshogs pa na ba'i tsan mongs pa da / 
287a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang 'byung lags so// bcom ldan 'das nye ba'i nyon mongs pA ga d+ha'i klung gi bye ma lngas 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya
287a6(dkon brtsegs): gas pa dag ya kya ma pa gnas kyisems byung gags// sa na das ga 'azhinas gyis nan na da / nanas snang bcomam na kyi d+hA nga / 
287a7(dkon brtsegs): zhid/ rkye // ma lan dang gnanas/ gang pag gas pa gan c-i cigapa ste sems tham pa dang rgyu sa pa ldan lags pa/  ldan das sa ga pa'i nan pa
287a8(dkon brtsegs): sa mchis pa'i du gas mchis pa rnasams dang maldan pa gas sa/ bcom ldan 'das spang bar bgyi ba'i tshas ga N+DI klung gi byis las 'das bskyed ga dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya chul kyi
287b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gzhong ging spang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag 'a bas cad kyigazhi dang rten ni 'dis dam reg pa'i gnas ces lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper nas yon rjenam 'gang sde lags pa dang / rtswa dang / shing gal ba dang / sman
287b2(dkon brtsegs): d+ha/ nags tshal de dag thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das sa la brtan cang pa la gnas te skyeg 'phel la rgyas par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'dasas chen po tshog cing gigal mig da 'bangar gyur te ma mchis pa
287b3(dkon brtsegs): nis sngon gyi rnam pa ga ni lags padag dang / tsU dang / shing gal ba dang / sman dang / nags cha 'a de dag thams cad kyang tshig cing nig la mi gda' bar 'gyur zhing ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom
287b4(dkon brtsegs): das de bzhin du spang bar bgyi ba'i chos gda'i klung gi phye ma las 'das pa snyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis gzhom par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa la rten cing ma rig pa'i
287b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas kyis la gnas te skye zhing 'phel la rgyas pa 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i gnas kyis spangs shing sbyangs tam mchis par gyur na ni spong bar bgyi ba'i chos gad 'a klung gi bye ma las 'das pa steng
287b6(dkon brtsegs): dadag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyis dgos par bgyi ba de dag thams cad kyang spangs shing spangs te ma mchis par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag rnam
287b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dagra sa shing sangs rgyas kyi chos bsas kyis mi khyab pa ka'i klung gi tha ma las 'das bskyed pa rnyes pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rgyas chos thams cad la slob 'am mchis pa'i mngon par mkhyen 'barnyes te
287b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa dang / thams cad gzigs pa dang / skyon thams cad spangs pa dang / yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi rgyal po// chos kyi dbang phyug/ chos thams cad la mda' sbyar ba'as
288a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs nas nga 'asla ba bad do// chungs 'angag ba bsnyen to// bya ba byas so// 'di lta ba nyid las gzhan mi shes sonas seng ge'is sgrogs par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltal
288a2(dkon brtsegs): bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra 'di ni nges pa'i don lags te/ don 'di ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan par bgyi ba yang lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so
288a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes la yang rnam pa gnyis te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na ma mchis pas bdud bapan bcom ste pham par mdzad nas chos kyi
288a4(dkon brtsegs): rig rten thams cad pas mngon par 'phags pa sems can thams cad kyis blta bar bgyi ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa brnyes te/ shes bya'i sra thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i chos kyi dbang
288a5(dkon brtsegs): gam ngad pa na 'di las lhag par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba'i sa med do zhes yang dag par gzigs te/ stobs bcu po dag pa stobs dang ldan zhing mi 'jigs pa'i pabla na med pa'i mchog tu yang dag pa
288a6(dkon brtsegs): shegs// shes byathams cad pa sgrib pazhimang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par gzigs nas 'di lta bu nyid las gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i ye shes kyis seng ga'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do// 
288a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i 'jigs las rgal ba de ma thag tu rnam par grol bdag gi bde ba nyams su myong ba rnams ni 'di ltar bdag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rnams
288a8(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su grol gyis/ bdag gis ni phyin chad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du yang dag par mthong ste/ bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas 'dis
288b1(dkon brtsegs): nyid las gzhan mi shes so nas bgyi ba togs nas dbug sa phyin pa'i mchog mya ngan las ldang sna pa'i sa las sor tog go// bcom ldan 'das de dag gis togs nas kyang sa de la rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i chos
288b2(dkon brtsegs): nad 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par bdag gis ni 'di ltar lhags dang bcom pa'i mthob ste/ bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chu ba nges par gyur/ 
288b3(dkon brtsegs): / de ci'i spyad du seMn/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'du ba'i slad du ste/ com ldan 'ad mig pa chen po zhes
288b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na theg pa gsum pa 'di dag ni theg pa gcig kho na grangs su mchin// bcom ldan 'das reg pa gcig rtags pas
288b5(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'dres bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces brtse bde ni mngan las 'das phyi'i dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas
288b6(dkon brtsegs): /  ldan 'dagag nelas 'das pa kyi zhes pa ba da zhin pa shegs pa chos skye ga zlad gi lagasas/  ldan 'das rlon gyi gas
288b7(dkon brtsegs): shegs gcig pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan ma lag sa/ chos kyi sku yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid chos kyi snga lpags
288b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mtha' ni theg pa gcig gi ma pa' lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa gcig gi mtha' zhes bgyi bden theg pa gcig gi mdzad sbyang ba
289a1(dkon brtsegs): dgas pagasas// da s+ho//  / rnas da zhin ga shegs parnams ngas kyi mam ma ches pa la gnas pa ma lags te/ bcon ldan 'das da/ 
289a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni phyi ma'i mtha' khur thug par gnas pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni 'dag rten la sman pa
289a3(dkon brtsegs): slad du dus kyi mtha' bachis pa'i thugs rje can dang / dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i thugs dam mnga' ba ma lags te/ kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir dus kyi mtha' med par snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dus kyi datha'i med
289a4(dkon brtsegs): yid ma bcas pa'i sems can a la la shes pa'i bdag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas smra ba lags so// kye 'jig rten la phan pa'i phyir chos/ mi zad pa dang
289a5(dkon brtsegs): chosartag pa dang / chos brten pa dang / skyabs kyi sems can a la la zhes mchi bdag kyang de zhin gshegs pa nyid la yang dag par smra bas sla ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas 'di
289a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni skabs la mchis pa dang / slob pa ma mchis pa'i 'jig rten na phyi ma'i mthar thug par skabs mi zad pa dang
289a7(dkon brtsegs): bas rtag pa dang / skyabs brtan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos zhes bgyi ba de ni theg pa gcig gi la mi bstan pa'i tshig bla dgas lags sa bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun zhes bgyi
289a8(dkon brtsegs): thig pa gsum pa chi tshigs kyi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das srubs 'di gnyis ni de'i yan lag gi skabs shes pakyi ste stabs kyi rab ma lagasas// de ci'i sred dushe na/ 
289b1(dkon brtsegs): na na thag pa gcig shesal bstan pa thos samams kyi sa rtogs pa ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i ma na theg pa gcig gi lam man pa'i chos gyis ni kyi bci yang ma mchis so// 
289b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i tshogs kyapa ririgs pa dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchis pa dang / 'byung ba'i sabs tshol ba dang / slobs pa dang / bgyi bdang bcas pa dang / blan med pa
289b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gugs pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na skyabs 'di gas ni skabs kyi rab ma lags te/ dus kyi mtha' mchis pa'i skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can ga da
289b4(dkon brtsegs): baphrin gshegs pas 'atul bde dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi ban chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dad pas chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun pa yang skyabs su chi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos
289b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa ma bangon par dad pas skabs su mchi ba gnyis la skyabs su mchi bar bgyi ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su mchi bi ni chos nyid kyi rgyu 'thun pa la mngon par dang
289b6(dkon brtsegs): pas mchi bar bkyi 'am lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la sbubs su mchi bani skyabs su mchi ba yang dag pa lags sa// bcom ldan 'das skabs su mchi ba gnyis kyang yang dag 'ar na de
289b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la skabs su mi shes bgyi pa'i mthal lags par 'od du chud par 'gyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcod ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang gzhan snga lags/ skabs gnyis po yang gzhan ma lag
289b8(dkon brtsegs): zhin gshegs pa nyid byabs gsum lags pa//  dunan/ bcom ldan 'das me pa na cigagasam tan pa tshal zhi ba mi gaganas pa'i bumachog giga' / 
290a1(dkon brtsegs): / gshegs pa'i seng gege smraso so yang dag par reg pa pazhi dang ldan pa lags pa'i slad 'o// bcom ldan 'das mos 'di la 'dag la de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gnyis 'othabs kyi
290a2(dkon brtsegs): bas 'grubs pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po bdag nyid kyi skad du lags so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa 'di gnyis kyi yang ni mamachis te/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag parnyan 'di la theg pa gcig po ni theg pa la
290a3(dkon brtsegs): pa lags te theg pa gsum yang dag par 'du'o// bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'a'ags pa'i bden pa thog par mngon par rtogs pa'i shes pa gcig pus ni gnas kyi sa
290a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig spong bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes pa de gcig pus yongs su 'tshal ba la sogs pa yon tan bzhi po rnams mngon sum du bgyid par 'gyur zhing don bzhi po dag nyid chos nyid kyis shin
290a5(dkon brtsegs): brtogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa la shes pa bzhi 'pho ba dang dmigs pa bzhi 'pho ba ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes pa
290a6(dkon brtsegs): de mi 'pho ba'i chos can lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyis spong ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa dang po ni yang dag pa'i shes pa
290a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa rnam pa gnyis kyis gnas kyis spong po na ma mchis so// 
290a8(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyam thams cad kyi spyad yul ma lags pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis nyon mangs pa thams cad kyi sbubs spong lags so// bcom ldan 'das
290b1(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i sbubs thams cad 'byed pa'i ma bar byen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa'i ye shes zhes 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa 'chal ba dang nimathar phyin pa'i shes pam lag
290b2(dkon brtsegs): zan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu grags pa'i shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das lachag sada'i don de ni nyan zam dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas ma lags so// bcom
290b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dis nyan thos dag sangs rgyas thams cad ni yon tan tshad mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nga'i lan ldag gi yon tan dang ldan pa'i slad du nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'phags pa zhes bgyiro// 
290b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bgyi ba de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa ma lags/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan ma lags te/ bden pa 'di dag
290b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thog mar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mngon par mkhyen la so sor rtogs nas de mngon par
290b6(dkon brtsegs): glang ba ni zlab cing bral brtags par dka skye yod du chud par dka' shing brtag mi rus la tog gro'i slod la lags te/ mthas shing 'dzangs pas rig pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so/ 
290b7(dkon brtsegs): yang // bam ldan 'das 'tho ba pa'i ma pa na gshegs na po mnapa thad du/ bcom ldan 'as de pazhin gsheg mi'i steng zhide zhin ga shegs kyi
291a1(dkon brtsegs): / lags te/ nyan ros dang / rang sa ba rgyas thams cad kyi snong tshul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshesas pa'i snying pon 'phags pa'i den pa'i don pa shad pa 'di'i gnas lags
291a2(dkon brtsegs): chom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas thub pas na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don yangabab cing bral brtags pa dka' sna rtogs pade dka' thaMd brtag mi rnas la tog go spyod pa sa lags te/ 
291a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa shes 'gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang nyan mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs kyi mthas dkris pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la po tsham
291a4(dkon brtsegs): 'chis pa de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi skabs nas rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi skal yang the tshom ma mchis pa legs so// 
291a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dgongs pa'i mthar phyin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa 'dig
291a6(dkon brtsegs): yid rje' shing dang rnams pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis ni dag par dka' zhing rtags padu dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags
291a7(dkon brtsegs): bden pa'i don bshad pa rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi ba mchis pa dang / bgyi ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa'i
291a8(dkon brtsegs): dan pa gad par bkyib mchil pa ni 'phags pa'i ban pa bzhi bstan pa dang / btags pa cad mchis pa lags so// de bo'i srang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das gagan kyi pa bgyid du stsal kyang sdug
291b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngams na pa sa 'tshal nga/ sngag pasnga la kun srung bathams dathang ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa gro lam thams cad bsgom par me u 9/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags bsnga lakhong ba pa yang
291b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa mchis so// mya dran las 'das pa la yang 'dus byas dang 'dus ste byas pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bshad par bgyi bsdamachis pa gang lags
291b3(dkon brtsegs): pani bcom ldan 'das de la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa dang / btags pa dag dpag d+hA maM mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slang chen/ bcom ldan 'das bangag nad kyis pa la yang zin pa'i skug
291b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su 'tshal ba dang zin pa'i sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba thams cad snang ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad mngon sum du bgyi ba dang / zin pa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam
291b5(dkon brtsegs): bskom par nus pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phagras pa'i bden pa bzhi bstan pa bshad pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam pa brgyad du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
291b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhir gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangal chu ba rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa'i don bstan pa bgyi ba ma mchis pa bzhi po dag la rdzogs par ma dad pa legs so// nyan thos nams/ 
291b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rab 'bring tha ma'i chos rtogs pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings togs pa ma lags pa'i slad
291b8(dkon brtsegs): ru// bcom ldan 'das/ dpe'i slad du bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dan par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa ni 'don pa shad pa'i kyi mamachis padag 'a rdzogs
292a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad ni yongs sum
292a2(dkon brtsegs): sa ma sa pad mas pa ma bye du gas gang bas smra sa / ban ldan 'das 'a kyi rung thoms nga slo la dmas du 'dog / 
292a3(dkon brtsegs): don sum du mdad de/ bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa ni chos chud gson pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi khyod ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas
292a4(dkon brtsegs): ches pa/ ma bgyis pas skyes pa/ mi bas pakhas pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa/ brtan pa/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sbubs nas nges par grol ba/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thad
