292a5(dkon brtsegs): ri gnas pa/ grol bar shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gaN+DI klung gi bye ma las 'das bsnyed dang ldan pa ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i ming gis bstan pa'i srid du ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la de bzhin gshegs
292a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa'i skabs nas nges par grol ba zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po shes pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes lags te/ 
292a7(dkon brtsegs): shin gshegs pa'i snying pon nyan pas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ston sa thong ma dogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyi gan thugs su tshun mngon sum du ma da do// bcom ldan 'das
292a8(dkon brtsegs): gan gshegs pa'i snying 'i stong banyid shes pani 'di gnyis lags te/ gnyis gang zhen/ 'dil ste/ bcom ldan das da nga zhan gshegs pa'i snying pa nyin mangs pa mams cad pa srubs de sa dang du
292b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma grol das shes pa rnams kyis gang pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa'i snying po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos pa dang mi gnas shing grol bas shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab pag d+ha'i klung gi byem las
292b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa snyed dag gi'am snang ba lcagasas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sna srung nyid nas 'arnas pa 'du gnyis lani nyan rjes chen podag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid la yid ches pas 'jug par/ 
292b3(dkon brtsegs): bas te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stong pa nyid shes pa ni phyin ci lag gi dmigs pa bze' dag la 'jug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas nyan thos dang / rang
292b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis sdug bsngal 'gog pa thams cad sngon ma mthong sngon ma rtogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ni thugs su chun cing mngon sum du mdzad do// nyen mongs pa'i skabs thams cad 'joms pa
292b5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i tshe thams cad kyang bsgoms so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i badzin pa bzhi po 'di dag la bden pa gsus ni mi tig pa lags so// bden pa gcig ni rtag pa lags s+ho// 
292b6(dkon brtsegs): tse'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bden pa gsum ni 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa'i skad dus/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid du gtogs pa de ni mi rtag pa lags so// ga mi rtag pa
292b7(dkon brtsegs): de ni badzin pa spu ba'i chos chen lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang brdzun bslu ba'i chos cad de nim den pa dang mi rtag lags te skyabs ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de la lags pas 'phags pa'i sdug
292b8(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ban pa dang / sdug bsngal dun byung ba bden pa dang / sreg brdzi 'dod 'ang groma'i mim 'dags pa'i don pa ring bdag pa gami dan pa dang teg pa lags / byab sam lagags tsha'o/ 
293a1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa nyid ni yadi dag par na bden pa dang / rtag pa dang / srungs lags so// bcom ldan 'das panas can thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul las 'das pa sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni bsam
293a2(dkon brtsegs): yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dper na dmus long gzugs la lta mi nus pa dang / bu btsa' ba'i gnas na mchis pa'i
293a3(dkon brtsegs): pa dgung bdun legs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la lta mi nus pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa yang byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa'i yul yang ma lags/ nyan thos
293a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i yul yang ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byis pas ma skye bo thams ca dra ldarnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni mtha' gnyis la lta ba'i phyin ci log pa rnams
293a5(dkon brtsegs): gdudags zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das nyan pas dang / rang bdas rgyas thams na kyi shes pa zhes bkyi bde ni shes pa dag 'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das mtha' gnyis su pa
293a6(dkon brtsegs): deni nye bar len pa'i bung pa dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rtog ge bdag gi tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di gnyis ni mthar lta ba zhes bgyi ste/ gnyis
293b1(dkon brtsegs): shen/ chad pa sna pa dang / rtag par lnga ba lpags so// bcom ldan 'dasagal te 'du byed namasA la me rtag par stan de ni dri'i chad par lta ba ma lags te/ de ni de'i yang dag nga'i lta ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
293b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang na las 'das pa la rtag par lnga bden de'i rtag par lta ba sa legs te/ de ni de'i yang dag pa'i lta ba lags sa//  tsishrI srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rtog ge bdag gi lta ba ni 'di lta bu lags te/ lus dang / 
293b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / tshor ba dang / sems pa rnams tshe 'di nyid la 'jug par mthong nas srid pa'i mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par mi bgyid cing ma 'tshal bas ldongs par gyur ba skad de chad par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom lnga
293b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das tog ge ba dag gi lta ba ni sems kyi rgyud la mongs shing sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la yang 'jug par me bgyid la/ rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul du ma gyur bskad de rtag par lta bar 'gyur ro// bcom
293b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das da ltar tog ka bdag gi lba ba ni dalta ba dag lags pa skad de dag ni dan de las thal bu'i skal ba dang / don de'i tha chad kyis pa dang / gzhan gyi mtshan nyid dang 'dres pa'i lta bas chad par rlom sems bkyi
293b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtag par rlob sems bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni zin pa'i phung po lnga po dang la byin cing gas par dgyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni martag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa
293b7(dkon brtsegs): sdukA bsngal bal bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag ma mchis pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
293b8(dkon brtsegs): de' gan gshegs pa'i chos kyi suni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa dag pas kyang sngon ma mthong legs so// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa lad
294a1(dkon brtsegs): bas rtag par 'du shes pa dang / bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i sems can dag ni bcom ldan 'das phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba
294a2(dkon brtsegs): ralaklas te/ bcom ldan 'das sngams can de dag ni yang dag pa'i lha ba can du 'gyur ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nyid rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
294a3(dkon brtsegs): bde pa'i ba ga rkyen pa dang / bdag gi pa rog rkyen pa dang / ba g-i ma la tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can gad dgang bzhin gshegs pa ma chos kyi sku la de l+r-ing ma
294a4(dkon brtsegs): dedag ni yang dag pa mthong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mthong ba gang lags pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sras thugs pas skyes pa dang / zhal nas skyes pa dang / chos les skyes pa dang
294a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bge skal la sred pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das shes pa dag pa zhes bgyi ba ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags te
294a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di sas bdag la lags so// btsam ldani 'das sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni shes pa dag pa'i slad tshul yang rna lags phub yang ma lags na/ btsam ldan 'das sdug paste 'gog
294a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa rton pa bzhi' shes pa can dag gi spyad yul ma lags shing yul ma lags palta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa gsum pa'i las dang po pa rmongs pa ma mchis
294a8(dkon brtsegs): 'chos can dgagasadon pa padang byud par 'gyur zhing dan rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phrad de bcom ldan 'das kyi bton pa bzhi pa san cing brtags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das ton pa bgro po 'dig ni/ 
294b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das don pa gcig du/ 'di la ste/ sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa ni rton pa'am sa na gis rtog 'jig rten las 'das pa lags te/ de ni yang dag par rton par baN+DI ba dang / 
294b2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying na 'khor ben tani ba lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nyid kyi dbang du bgyis nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mtha' med do nas pa da/ 
294b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi dbang rnams len pa la 'khor ba nas brdzi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi 'bo dang / skye ba shes bgyi pa'i chos gnyis kyi ming de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pa'i tshig bla dgas lags so// bcom ldan 'das
294b4(dkon brtsegs): shes brtsi ba dang / skyes shes bgyi ba 'di ni 'jig rten gyi tha sted lags so// bcom ldan 'das gum shes bgyi ba ni dbang po 'gags pa 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das skyes zhes brtse ba 'di ni dbang / 
294b5(dkon brtsegs): kasar ba rnams byung ba 'di lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la ni skye ba'am/ 'gum pa'am/ 'gro ba'am/ byung ba yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i
294b6(dkon brtsegs): snying po ni 'dub byas kyi mtshan nyid kyi yul las 'das pa lags s+ho// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang / brtan pa dang / ther zug pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das dril
294b7(dkon brtsegs): legs pa sa pazhin gshegs pa'i byeng pon pa dang du mi gnas kyang 'drings slos ma khrim pa'i shes lan shigagasadang / rten dang / gna' lags sa// bamam na 'a 'di zhi gshegs
295a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa'i snying poni 'brel ba ma mchis shing tha da du gnas la shes pa grol ba ma lags pa phyi ros kyi 'dus byas kyi gzhi dang / rten dang / gnas kyang lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te
295a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sno mas kyis na sug pasngalas skye ba dang / rtswa sasu 'dres pa 'i ni khyer ba sbyin pa dum margyas par 'atar pa spya /  ldan
295a3(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa drug po gang lags pa 'di dag dang / rnam par shes pa gang lags pa 'di dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos bdun po 'di dag ni mi gnas pa dang / skad cig pa da / sdug bsngal rnams myong
295a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i mthar mtshas pa dang / saM sta~M ba da / seM 'phag pa'i chos can sdug bsngal lhung ba legs pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying ba de ni sdug bsngal la yang skyob dang / myu nas
295a5(dkon brtsegs): rnas sa ba sa ba ldan par mos// bcos lda med na gshegs pa'i skyed po gis pags sems can sal gsu ga sa/ ke dag sa lags/ 
295a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying pa ni sems can 'jig tshogs la lta bar ltung ba dag dang / phyin ci log gis nyams par myur pa dag dang / stong pa nyid las sems g.yengs pa rnams kyi spyod yul
295a7(dkon brtsegs): me legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni dam pa'i chos kyi dbyings gyi stong pa lagasas// chos kyi sku'i snying pa lags so// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi snying po lags so// 
295b1(dkon brtsegs): nga shen kyis yos su dag shi chos 'i sring ba rdzogs so// bcom ldan 'dam de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nga bzhin gyis yongs su dag pagrob kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nye bar nyan mongs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul te
295b2(dkon brtsegs): babs ces pa byab pa snyab bdag 'byed do// deci'i srad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'dam dag 'amams na skad cig pas/ na mongs pa nams kyis nas nyon momos pa ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mi dag 'di sems kyang sna
295b3(dkon brtsegs): / sa m+b+ha sa na gas kyis sa ma /  sa nas lags na mams pa / sa sa sa ma char
295b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan dag 'di sems mi rnyeg pa'i chos canan par rnon mongs par khyab bcom ldan ras na pa na mongs bal sa tshim pa/ sems nye bar nyon mongs pa yang mchis pas bcom ldan 'das sems rang bzhin
295b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis yongs su dag pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i don ni khong du chud par dka' ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la bcom ldan 'das nyid spyan du gyur pa lags te/ ye shes su gyur pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams
295b6(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni mnga' bdag legs/ bcom ldan 'das na nyon pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mya me pal phreng gi rtogs par dka' bri'i den bshad pa gas na nas rjes su yi rang ba mangs
295b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no//  ma da pa'i / sems rang bzhin gyis pangs su dag pa'i na pa na mongs pa'i don ni rtogs par dga'o// lham chos 'di gnyis rtogs par dka' ba ste/ 'di sa ste sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dgra brjog
295b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba dang / sems de'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rtogs par dka' ba'o// lha me chos 'di gnyis nyan nus pa na
296a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa sa da pas 'gro bar bad de/ sprul pa shen thos gang ga nga dang ldan ni dag pa'i dbar byed pa de dag ni da pa snang bal brten nas chos dang ldan par spyad pa'i shes byas de 'i des pa ra gyur ro// 
296a2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang thun par srung pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba ni las dbang po'i rnam par rig pa med kyi spyad tshul la rnam par sna pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par lta ba dang / dgra btsam pa rnams kyi gnyid larnam par lta dang / 
296a3(dkon brtsegs): / mas la dbang du gyur pa rnams kyi bsam gtan la dga' ba dang / bde ba la rnam par lta ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul la rnam par lta ba ste lha mo rnam par lta ba'i rang bzhin rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa
296a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di da ldaldan modo la dang / da 'das pa'i gas 'ongs pa'i dus na pa'i nyan thos dad pa dang ldan ning dad pa 'a dbang du byed pa ded dag dang pa'i snang ba la brten ni sa ches dang 'thun par snad pa'i shes pas rang bzhin gyis pangs su dag pa
296a5(dkon brtsegs): nges pa la nges par 'gyur ro// lha mod dag gi ngas pa de nyid ni theg pa chen po'i lam du 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ lha mo de ltar na 'di la ste/ chos zab mo mo spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas
296a6(dkon brtsegs): phan pa mang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di la sman pa mang pa'i don bshad pa gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag spobs so/ 
296a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo dpal phreng gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bran+de chos nab modag
296a8(dkon brtsegs): ma mral ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang / bsad nams kyang mngadu skyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i lam du la dazhugs par 'gyur ba lags so// gsum gang shig bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi lu ba/ rigs
296b1(dkon brtsegs): sog dgang gis rig pa'i chos nga mod pa ldan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi grus/ rigs kyi bumo gang dag chos dang 'thun par sdud pa'i shes pa dang ldan dang / bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag
296b2(dkon brtsegs): chos zabam dgal bdag nyid kyi shes pa zhum par 'tshal nas 'di ni bdag gis mi shes te/ don 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyimi mkhyen par bad do nas bcom ldan 'das la sems rnams par gtod par babyed de/ 
296b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gtod pa de dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das gsum po 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ma ches zab ma dag la mams ma nyams par bdag nyid la srung ba dang / bsod nams kyang mang du sred pa dang / 
296b4(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i lam du yang dag par zhugs par 'gyur ba legs so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di ga las gzhan pa'i sems can glang lags pa de dag ni chos zab ma dag la nan gyis mchog tu bcu
296b5(dkon brtsegs): nas gob lob kyi sems 'dzin cing mngon par can te/ snyan par 'gyid kun tu smra bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag nad dag la dam pa'i chos la rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / gzhan mu stegs can dgas bon rul ba lag
296b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i thad du yang mchis la brlag par bgyil nem mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa bon rul par gyur pa de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par char gcad par bgyi lag
296b7(dkon brtsegs): / de nas lha ma pal phreng gis de skad cis gsor nas 'khor dang bcas byas bcom ldan 'das kyig bas la gtugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mod pa la phreng la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ lha ma khyod kyis dus dang
296b8(dkon brtsegs): skabs su chos zab mad gal bdag nyid yang dag par bsrung ba'i thabs kyi dan bstan pa bshad pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyid bya char bcad pa be shad pa legs so// lha mo khyod ni sangs tum 'bum phrag phye ba mang po la bsnyen pa
297a1(dkon brtsegs): byam bayin pas khyod nga sa pa ma pa // ma ma ldan gas sa ma ma da kyi lus pan rjes la bdagang na la ga
297a2(dkon brtsegs): na pa gaganags kyims pa da du phyu ma kyi sa gsas//  ma sa sram mtshas pas mamams
297a3(dkon brtsegs): mi shes shing mig mi 'dzums par skakhas bcom ldan 'das pa ldan pa med 'gyur to// gang khri ma bcom ldan 'das dag gi mig tung gis mi skabs par bye de'i cha lham dpal phreng ba khor dang bcas pa mchog dgas
297a4(dkon brtsegs): don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams rnam pa du mar bsngags shing sangs rgyas rdzas su dran pa yid la byed pa ma brjed bzhin du grong khyed 'am mad
297a5(dkon brtsegs): dong // de nas lnga mo pal phreng gis rang gi khyim thab rgyal pa grogs pa'i bu shes gnyen theg pa chen pa langs par bcug go// grong khyer chen po'i bud med kyi chags bram la bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen
297a6(dkon brtsegs): la btsud do// rgyal bgrags pa'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa'i 'khor kye'u la bdun lon pa yan chad thams cad theg pa chen po la btsud par gyur te/ de ltar grong byor ba thams cadan theg pa chen po la mngon
297a7(dkon brtsegs): daphyogs par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyang rgyal bu rgyal byad kyi tshal du byin tanang du gshegs nas ma dang ldan pa kun dga' bol yang bka' stsal cing / lha'i dbang po byin la yang dgongs sa// de nas lha'i dbang
297a8(dkon brtsegs): byin skad cig pang cig phud tsam nyid ma lha'i tshogs kyis yangs su bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngarang 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po 'acu byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bol
297b1(dkon brtsegs): sa kyi dpa kra gA de d+ha rjem dag par bstan te/  kau sheg tshus canam grangs 'di myong bas cung sheg/ kau sheg chos kyinam grangs dri lu byas sum nan rnams pa rnams pa shad cig/ kun dga' ba rgyad kyis kya ma
297b2(dkon brtsegs): hrIm grangs 'di nga shig/ kun dga' ba kyang kyis chos rkyenam grangs 'di 'kho bzhi pa dge sdang dang / dge slong ma dag / dge bsnyen dang / dag bsnyen ma dgal shi cigade nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po
297b3(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis di nas gsus/ sam ldan sa nirnamathas nas/ di sa ga nga /  mams kyis /  /  sa kyi rnam tha sa ni ldan sbyin sa
297b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ldan te/ kau she ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mdo sde 'di'i don thams cad ma lus par shes pa'am/ blta ba'am nye bar brtag par mi nus na sems can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos kau shi ka de ltar
297b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rnam grangs 'di ni zab la yon tan chen po'i 'byung gnas yin no// kau shi ka de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i yon tan gyi ming yongs su brjod pa tsam nig bshad kyis de lags par rab tu nyon la yod la zung shig
297b6(dkon brtsegs): dadangs khyod la bshad do// lha'i dbang po 'argya byin dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka
297b7(dkon brtsegs): gden de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnu na mtha' ba se pa ya dag par bskong zhes bya bar chu shig/  shig di ni mi chen thabasas kyis mi khyab bzhes byab yang mang shi/ spyan pa ma thams ca sna bsgrun pa
297b8(dkon brtsegs): ngagis bya bar ra nga sheg/ dam pa'i chos pangs su 'an pabasas kyis ma bya ba ba bstan pa zhes bya bar sa rung shig/ theg pa gcig tu pa dag par du ba bstan pa zhes byab bar 'a shob/ 'phags pa'i bden pa ldan
298a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa zhes bya ba yang nga shes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying bstan pa zhes bya ba ba nga shig/ chos kyis bstan pa zhes bya ba bang chung shin/ gang ba nyid rjedon kyidanam ba bdun
298a2(dkon brtsegs): nan+di lag gis bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa
298a3(dkon brtsegs): zung shig/ kau shi ka 'di ni lha ma dpal phred gi seng go'i sgra zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ kau shi ga mdo 'dir bstan pa gang dag bshad pa de dag thams cad na rgyu ba bcad pa dang / res pa'i don dang / rtan pa gcig pa zhes bya bar
298a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rung shig/ ko shi ka m+b+hi sa dol la phreng gi seng ge'i sgra bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ngas khyod kyi lag tu gtar kyis 'jig rten na dam pa'i chos de srid gnas pa srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams/ 
298a5(dkon brtsegs): ra sgrogs shig/ ston cig/ lha'i dbang po 'argya byin bris bcom ldan 'das la legs so nas gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing ku ni chub par byas nas lha'i dbang po
298a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya byi ni dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / gzhan yang gang der 'das par thar pa dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lngam yin dang / dri zar bces pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pal
298a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mtshag bcags pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u steng phrag brgya ba mas dpal phreng gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste 'ani bcu rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// 
298b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan po dzin mi tu dang / su na dra dang / bu chen gyi lo ba band ye shes sdes bsgyur cing nas te gtan la bab pa// 'phags par dgan mchog rtsegs pa chen po chos kyin ma grangs len stong phrag rgya ba le 'u ni u rtsa dpung
298b2(dkon brtsegs): dra nga sa pas nas pa// ya hU~M // !klu hru d+he/ me sa shAN+Da/  s+yA / 'gas pang gas nas dag pa chen pa'i / 
298b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas da krung kyim sems dpa' mas dal ldag 'tshal la// di na dgags rjes ma cig na/ rnam dus ga rgyam nal bar bya maston pa/ kreg dang na dang / dran / dang
298b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / bya'i tshogs du ma s+thA snyan pa 'byin pa/ shing blag sha dang / n+ya gr-i d+ha dang / tsan dan dang / mngan 'chad dang / sa la ka'i yal gas de skabs pa/ rtag tu matog dri nim po sil sar bkram pa den dges
298b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bya'i byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ zag pa zang gi/ rdul zad ba/ chos las mthugs pa/ bsam gtan dpa ton la gnas pa/ 'chags dang kri'i steng na 'dug na dad pa'i rgyal pa sa phyags dmangs
298b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa shA b+hag la// e gzhin du yang dag 'jogs gnas pa/ kha cig ni shing dudun gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka kun 'phra bar byed pa/ mabyung dus neng badzin pa/ smad mam da la da da/ 
298b7(dkon brtsegs): do sems dang / skyom bu dang / gnyid dang / le la dang bral ba sha sA ga dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag smin pa byin cing/ bya ba gang min pa

304a8(dkon brtsegs): kyang // de rgyal bdas pastan slobar sa su shi krigag pa lags pa na/ grang ba las tshanam par smin pasam parab kyi 'di rten myel yongs su na par gyung //  kyi

305a1(dkon brtsegs): dpang gtsun 'bru dang / tha ram shing ma btsir pa de la grub mi dmigs kyi bcir nas dmigs te/ rgun 'bru dang / bungs shing de'i zla ba de yang phung por gnas pa'am/ srungs par banas pa'am/ 
305a2(dkon brtsegs): da par mi dang do// khu ba de ni rkun 'bru de dang / bungs shing gi dram bu de'i da 'dus pa yang ma yin no// drang srang chen 'di bzhin du min pa de yang sbyin pa po'i lag pa'i nA mo dang / snying dang bral na nam par mi nas

309b8(dkon brtsegs): ga yid nam ser ba lta bur snang ba'o// nga srang chen po gnas de ni phreng brdzogs pa'i lha de dag lha'i bu ri mchog tu bang po'i gos dang ldan can/ ska bung dang / byed dang/ phung nu ngami 'i chug/ bad pa dang yid pa de'i
310a1(dkon brtsegs): / mchog dang ldan padag dang gnas so// den de dag gi cha'i tshad ni lo nyis stong ba'o// den tshe zad pa'i las 'byung ba ni shing gang gi dun 'dug gA TI / lo ma d+his/ la lag 'byang/ me
310a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dro ba 'gyur ba ste/ don gnas de dag mthang nas lha'i bum de dgang dag cig tu snying rje de skad ste sngags 'don te/ sems can de yang mtho ngas kyi phreng khyer d+ha'i shrI dang gi me tog dang / 'bras bus ma
310a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byas pa dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshigs dang 'dre ba yangs su btang nas bsod nams zad par 'byer ba 'di ni mtsho ris kyi nyes pa'o// drang srong chen po de nas lha'i bu mo de dag gis de'i mtha' skar nas nyam thag pa chen
310a4(dkon brtsegs): ska du ste/ kyai hud me rtag pa 'di ni snying rje med pa'o// 'di ltar snying la dga' ba skyes shing 'khor 'khod pa las mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par mtho ris nas ltung ngam/ e ma'o lha gzhon nu dmyur du
310a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bar gyur cig ces mya ngan byed pa na rims drag pos btab nas de rims drag pos non te/ de'i lus gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// lus 'ab rlabs gnas de nas 'chi 'phro bar 'gyur
310a6(dkon brtsegs): de'i ba 'di la na par 'gyur ro// de nas shi dus nas pa da ma das pa lathong pas ba yongs su yin to// drang srang chen po drang thogs seM gri ba 'i pa 'di sa skye bar bsti ste/ ma yi
310a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i tshe lhas 'azung ba ni mang lan gnas pan sa ton dang / sras dang / phred pa 'dod pa dang / 'bras bu sgo tshogs 'ad dang / nags tshel sna tshogs stug nga nyam mi dga' ba da pa'i gyur/ 'de ba 'ams// 
310b1(dkon brtsegs): mdul n+d+ha/  du 'a ba pa ldan pa yonapa su la ma mo sa/  da sa// du ma
310b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang nA gzhon nu btsas gas phreng bathags pa'i lha las nabams pas shin tu dgra' byi chen po ste'o// gos dkar ba la dga' bar 'gyur/ mangs pa dang ldan par 'gyur shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'dod pa pa nga
310b3(dkon brtsegs): chags shib gr-i dI / rmyaDI byar bgacan dang / dus stan dang / lA ma dang / pra ba'i gos ma mngon par dga' bar ur/ kun dka' ra la la dga' ba dang / pha rol 'byor ba yod na 'dod pa ste/ dra l+r-ing rtson pa 'di das
310b4(dkon brtsegs): kyai lha las ming skye bo'i sa su blta ba dag go// bam pa gnyis pasten ma drang srong chen po gzhan yang rgyal chen bzhin gyi k+tar skye ba'i lus dang / che 'apo'i ltam su wA ni drang drong chen po 'di la de man pa 'am/ 
310b5(dkon brtsegs): le kon med pa la zas pazang po dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / kun 'thung ba chu grangs dang / chu mig dang / mtsho'u drung / lteng ka dang / yum dang / rdzing bu dang // blon chu byin nas/ dad pa dang / yid rang tudag
310b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa ga da ma pa 'an na sa skyes pa ma sa dag tshul bra
310b7(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba dang mun par mi gyur/ de 'gres pa dang / skam pas nyen par mi 'gyur/ de'i lus bskam pa dang / ltung ba la sogs pas sngas bsngal par mi 'gyur/ bshad gcing byung bar mi gyur/ tshul las 'angs su rnams
310b8(dkon brtsegs): ga pa mi gyur/ de yul pa mi gyur ste/ de da/ mangs kyi zhe nga nanam kyi gyud pas kyang // de'i sa 'ang ye ga / gas pa shes pa de pas na
311a1(dkon brtsegs): / lha'i nang du skyed mos tshal dang / nags tshal stag pa'i nang du gnas par 'gyur ro// de mi khar lha'i ris de mthong nas bzhin me tog padul bur 'gyur/ de'i kha nas drinim por byung ba ku shes
311a2(dkon brtsegs): me tog sna tshogs dri dang ldan pa'i rlung rjes su 'thun pa ldang bar 'gyur/ de shi nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i rim gyi lha'i nangan pa ma 'dus nas skyed mos tshal na rje zhing 'dod pa mad pas rgyags dregs nas lag pa g.yas
311a3(dkon brtsegs): bas lha mo'i lte ba le rig par mthong nas/ de'i rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa la mdo'i ba par skye ba yongs su 'dzin to// de dge 'dun 'das nas dri ma med pa'i rna cha 'gul ba'i mdo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nur mngon par
311a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grub ste/ 'akod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / glu len pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod skyed nus so// drang srong chen pod la rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i ris kyis phyogs ni dngul dang ldong ngos rnam par bkra ba sna tshogs kyis sgra
311a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes par byas pa/ lha mo brgya stong gis legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i gnas mtha bi/ rang bzhin gyis mdzes pa/ reg na bde ba'i rlung ldab pa'o// drang srong chen po rgyab chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de dag gi bskyed mos tshal
311a6(dkon brtsegs): dgu 'ani lum pa/ nor bu'i sngon mas sdang bar byas pa/ shing gi phal ga dang rje mo la dpag bsam gyi shi ga rim bcos bu dang / rgyu dang la'i lA m+b+hi sbya ngas pa/ nags tshul gyi bar la
311a7(dkon brtsegs): med du 'dag 'dzin 'a du/  dang / rje dang / khang du wA byung // rlung sro chen po 'i gnas na gnas pa de pas las / de ga rnam pa di // 'dod de/

311b2(dkon brtsegs): phyos phyogs shin tu rtan ga ltangs pa yadang / da ma nyid bsus po gas shin tu rnam pa phyeg
311b3(dkon brtsegs): 'brang shing rnam par mdzes pas sprad spud pa/ ka la ping ka dang / bud pa'i tsho gas kyi sA lA bu dang ldan po/ gzugs rab tu che zhing shin tu gzhon sha chags pa/ g+ha dang / ber dang / sal snyan dang / 'dzum zhing rje bas rgyags

311b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ yul 'khor srung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mi gas b.rang dang / lus ngan pa dang rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag lha'i 'dod pa dang / bde ba dang / rtse ba mying zhing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang bde bang

312a1(dkon brtsegs): po che la la 'dod cing ce lag dang mdzar ba tsamang 'du shes skyed par 'gyur/ de de'i mngal dazhugs nas mngalan tshorang ba skye bar mi 'gyur// 'atu zag pa dang / chu ser 'byung bar
312a2(dkon brtsegs): me k+Sha ba/ de'i sa na bu myed / pa ma na dag dang / rlung ba dang /  sa sudzugs pa gyu nas/ de bcas pa da ga ldan nang mdzin ga seM
312a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i gtam thos na dga' bskye bar kya/ sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /  dral sred pa dang / shin tu rjen mapa'i byad rin cid spyad mis kyi la dga' ba 'a / brad myed la dbang
312a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rab tu chags par 'gyur/ yang dang yang zas 'dod par 'gyur/ gru dang / gar dang / sil snyan gyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/ mdog sngam shing sde sangs por 'gyur/ mig ste'i bai dUr+ya sngon po lta rgya
312a5(dkon brtsegs): ro// drang srong chen dro 'dri dag ni lus dang sems kyi rgyud kyi ga chags kyis bsris pas rgyal chen bzhi'i ngas nas shi 'phonga'i ltas su blta'o// drang srong chen po gang lal srog gcod pa spangs nas da cing
312a6(dkon brtsegs): da de smin pa sbyin ning / mabyin par len pa dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / bldag pa dang / gzhib pa dang / ye byad kyi khyang par spangs nas ni bu dang / gser dang / dngul dang / rdo rje dang / baidUr+yal
312a7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa rjes thams cad rab tu sbyin pa la bsnyen pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / mang dbyes nas dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog gi swA hU~M brul pa dang / mchod rten la mngon par phyag 'tshal
312a8(dkon brtsegs): la sog sanga'i rnam par smin pas tshe yongs su pa dang 'dus na lus la rten mongs phur bar 'gyur/ sdom pa'i dri ma dang / ding pa rnam par spangs nas rang gi dge ba'i rtsa brjes su dran ning 'chi ba'i dus kyi chongs

312b2(dkon brtsegs): lus la dngags rgod pa da sus gdangs par 'a 'gyur/ drub pa 'gyur ba ma yin/ yan lagadeng da lagakun du chud par ma 'gyur/ gA shes kyi mtshams 'jig par mi 'gyur/ yul gyi skyod na

312b4(dkon brtsegs): nas ltung bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ yid du mi 'ong bi la kha zas zos te khaM zas ma zhubs 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// gal ta mi'i phung po yongs su btang nas kyang lha'i nang gri rnam par shes
312b5(dkon brtsegs): pus sub bcu rtsa gsu mangs kyi lha rnams ma ma/ khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / gser dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dngul stong gis rnam par brgyan cing shin tu rnam par phye bas spros pa/ gser gyi nya dang / chu srin
312b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang / ta babs dang / bdan gyis mdzes par byas pa/ rol ma dbyangs sgra dang / si ma skan sna tshogs kyi sku snyan pa 'byung ba dang / gnas sna tshogs kyis bye skar ba/ shing 'dab rdzog

316a1(dkon brtsegs): chogs smug pa/ sug po'i mthongs na shes kyar dri ma med pa'i rdol pa shin phyi ba dang byas pa thun sumachogs pa ni rnyed dbang por ga zhi ba'i thub pa 'dod chags dang bral bas bsten pa
316a2(dkon brtsegs): nga/ de 'dod pa'i yongs skye na lce'i / spyi na 'tshags me gnas so//  srung chen po snyid mas tsha da pa ga nag sa ga thub gi smon pa ma mas ga / 
316a3(dkon brtsegs): da // drang srong chen po de ni nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'dus pa'i gnas brtan la yang bdag gras pa'i rigs su skyes pa/ bsamu gtan la gnas pa/ snying dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnasapa/ 
316a4(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i ting nga dzin mi snyoms par zhugs te 'dug go// drang srong chen bad nag bdun gyi bar du dbugs phyin mi rgyu'o// drang srong chen po byams phyi'i ting nge 'dzin la snrums par zhugs pa'i tshe 'dod rlung mi ltung // 
316a5(dkon brtsegs): dod chen pode sreg pa'i bskal pa'i chos me lcegacig tu gyur pa ni yang do'i lus grangs bra tsam yang chag par mi 'gyur ngo // de'i tshigs kyis ri'i rgyal por rab kyang rigs so// klu'i rgyal po dag 'bo dang / 
316a6(dkon brtsegs): dugs can rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbugs kyis kyang ri rgyal po rab 'jig pa/ rgya tsho chen po ba'i yang snyam par byed pa/ gtum zhing cher gdug pa'i shugs can tu'i rgyal po gnyis \u0f7f da
316a7(dkon brtsegs): dalang bdag do'i ting nge dzin gyi mjal gdug pa med par 'gyur ro// drang srong chen po gnas brtan pa lang bdag skyed mos tshal shi ri sha kan gnas shing bsam gtan la gnas par lha gzhon nu de dag dang / lha'i bus de dag/

316b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / yang du bstan pa'i sku dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i ste dang / ched du brjod pa'i tshwa dang / glang gyen sde dang / des 'byung ba'i sred ni skyes pa rabs kyi snod/ shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / mad du byung ba'i chos kyi sa
316b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dul ba'i sde da / mdo sde'i ldeng gi phyogs pang dag pa rang tu ston ti/ de dag dag ba dang / ded bskyed do// de lta skyed sos tshas den pasam gtan la gnas thams cid bde ba dang len par stod mos tshal shi rin

317b2(dkon brtsegs): gnas med 'ang zla bla nyis dang / m-i stod+mo ngos ltar ma med pa/ dri rang tugri pa pa'i spos dang matog gis mdzes par byas pa/ phreng ba dang byig pas bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ bud med pa kyi snying gis mongs/
